docs.text: 安装完以后，在 preferences - settings 里搜pandoc，进行如下的设定 { "workbench.colorTheme" : "Default Light+" , "pandoc.htmlOptString" : "--toc --standalone --number-sections --filter pandoc-crossref --filter pandoc-citeproc --bibliography=d:/Dropbox/mdeng/WORK/knowldegBase/refAll.bib -s --mathjax --css=d:/dropbox/mdeng/someBackup/pandocTemplate/template/css/github-pandoc.css --highlight-style=kate --template=D:/Dropbox/mdeng/someBackup/pandocTemplate/theorem-number-html/templates/pandoc-amsthm.html" , } 然后按 ctrl+k ,再按 P 键就可以了。
docs.title: vscode的pandoc插件

docs.text: 安装latex workshop 插件，并重启vscode 在setting里进行如下的设置 "latex-workshop.latex.toolchain" : [ { "command" : "xelatex" , "args" : [ "-synctex=1" , "%DOC%" ] }, { "command" : "bibtex" , "args" : [ "%DOCFILE%" ] }, { "command" : "xelatex" , "args" : [ "-synctex=1" , "%DOC%" ] }, { "command" : "xelatex" , "args" : [ "-synctex=1" , "%DOC%" ] } ] 生成pdf的快捷键为 ctrl+alt+B ，预览的快捷键为 ctrl+alt+v 或者 ctrl+alt+T 。参考该插件的说明文档里的 contributions 那一栏。 该插件 官方网站
docs.title: vscode中实现latex转pdf

docs.text: 目前为止的settings { "pandoc.htmlOptString" : "--toc --standalone --number-sections --filter pandoc-crossref --filter pandoc-citeproc --bibliography=d:/Dropbox/mdeng/WORK/knowldegBase/refAll.bib -s --mathjax --css=d:/dropbox/mdeng/someBackup/pandocTemplate/template/css/github-pandoc.css --template=D:/Dropbox/mdeng/someBackup/pandocTemplate/theorem-number-html/templates/pandoc-amsthm.html" , "files.exclude" : { "**/.git" : true , "**/.svn" : true , "**/.hg" : true , "**/CVS" : true , "**/.DS_Store" : true , "**/*.RData" : true , "**/*.Rhistory" : true , "**/*.gitignore" : true , "**/*.lnk" : true , "**/*.bak" : true }, "latex-workshop.latex.toolchain" : [ { "command" : "xelatex" , "args" : [ "-synctex=1" , "%DOC%" ] }, { "command" : "bibtex" , "args" : [ "%DOCFILE%" ] }, { "command" : "xelatex" , "args" : [ "-synctex=1" , "%DOC%" ] }, { "command" : "xelatex" , "args" : [ "-synctex=1" , "%DOC%" ] } ], "latex-workshop.latex.clean.enabled" : true , "matlab.mlintpath" : "D:\\Program Files\\MATLAB\\R2017a\\bin\\win64\\mlint.exe" , "matlab.matlabpath" : "D:\\Program Files\\MATLAB\\R2017a\\bin\\win64\\MATLAB.exe" , "files.autoGuessEncoding" : true , //自动猜测文件编码 , "workbench.colorTheme" : "Default High Contrast" , "workbench.iconTheme" : "vscode-great-icons" , "files.autoSave" : "off" , "markdownTableFormatter.enable" : true , "pandoc.pdfOptString" : "--toc --standalone --latex-engine=xelatex - V mainfont=Microsoft\ YaHei" , "languageTool.language" : "en" , "sync.gist" : "" , "sync.lastUpload" : "" , "sync.autoDownload" : false , "sync.autoUpload" : true , "sync.lastDownload" : "" , "sync.forceDownload" : false , "sync.anonymousGist" : false , "sync.host" : "" , "sync.pathPrefix" : "" , "sync.quietSync" : false , "sync.askGistName" : false }

docs.text: 编号和引用 所需要的插件： markdown-preview-enhanced 和pandoc(电脑直接安装)。 还是借助于pandoc的 --filter=pandoc-crossref (用法参考 pandoc.md )。 markdown-preview-enhanced 的设置如下： file - setting - package 在这个package下设置 选中 using pandoc parse options里写入： --filter=pandoc-crossref demo如下 $$ \begin{matrix} a=3 \end{matrix} $$ {#eq:a3} [ @eq :a3] 黑体 \newcommand{\bm}[1]{\boldsymbol #1} 然后 \bm ，比如： \(\bm{a}\)

docs.text: 主要参考 pandoc.md - 文献数据库为 ref.bib - md文件中引用方法为 [@hinton2006fast] ,其中 @ 后为bibtex的key - pandoc命令： --filter pandoc-citeproc --biblio ref.bib 但是 markdown-preview-enhanced 里的设置为 --filter=pandoc-citeproc,--biblio=ref.bib ，要用等号和逗号进行隔开。

docs.text: obsidian学习笔记 基本操作 ¶ [toc] 快捷键 ¶ ctrl/cmd+P 调出控制面板 ctrl+alt+<- 回到上一次操作，一版用于点击超链接返回到上一级 The list of default Keyboard shortcuts as of [[v0.5.3]] is: Function Shortcut Editor: save file Ctrl/Cmd S Create new note Ctrl/Cmd N Open command palette Ctrl/Cmd P Open quick switcher Ctrl/Cmd O Search in all files Ctrl/Cmd-Shift F Open graph view Ctrl/Cmd G Star current file Blank Unstar current file Blank Audio recorder: start recording Blank Audio recorder: stop recording Blank Open Markdown converter Blank Open today's note Blank Create new Zettelkasten note Blank Open random note Blank Navigate back Ctrl/Cmd-alt ← Navigate forward Ctrl/Cmd-alt → Open vault location Blank Use dark theme Blank Use light theme Blank Search current file Ctrl/Cmd F Toggle edit/preview mode Ctrl/Cmd E Delete current file Blank Split vertical Blank Split horizontal Blank Close active pane Blank Close all other panes Blank Open settings Ctrl/Cmd , Editing Function | | Shortcut -------------------- | - | ------------ Bold Selected Text | | Ctrl/Cmd B Italic Selected Text | | Ctrl/Cmd I Insert External link | | Ctrl/Cmd K Indent | | Ctrl/Cmd ] Unindent | | Ctrl/Cmd [ 内连接Internal Links ¶ [[My Favorite Band2]] 内连接指向的文本文件换了位置以后，obsidian会自动更新内连接。 可以再obsidian里修改内连接的标题，然后自动更新连接即可。 And if you decide that a title is not what you actually meant, you can change the file name at the top of this window, and Obsidian will automatically update all links to it. 的 Obsidian automatically creates files when you click a link to a file that does not exist. This means you can [[write naturally]] about [[whatever comes to mind]] and then go back and create the new notes at your leisure. This makes Obsidian a fantastic tool for thinking freely in notes without having to worry about where to file them. 标签 ¶ obsidian ¶ 比如要给出一个 obsidian 的标签，则 #obsidian 即可。 设置-然后插件-开启标签面板以后，右侧展开就可以显示标签面板。 折叠 ¶ 首先需要再设置里的Editor里打开折叠，然后在编辑模式下可以折叠文本 \[\begin{vmatrix}a & b\\ c & d \end{vmatrix}=ad-bc\] 将obsidian笔记本转成html ¶ 见https://github.com/kmaasrud/obsidian-html 下载下来进到文件夹，然后 python setup.py develop 然后： obsidian-html "D:\Dropbox\mdeng\WORK\knowldegBase\obsidian_GTD" -o "C:\Users\mdeng\Downloads\obsidian-html-master" 我对css的改进 ¶ Base2Tone-me.css 后面lmd注释后面的。 包括 - 对页边距调整 - list对齐问题 下载地址： https://github.com/Dmitriy-Shulha/obsidian-css-snippets 具体如下：(加到css文件的后面 参考 Lists - (un)ordered.md ) /* remove the yaml metadata from embed */ /* Remove embed yaml first separator */ . markdown-embed-content > hr : first-child { display : none ; } /* Remove embed yaml content */ . markdown-embed-content > hr : first-child + p { display : none ; } /* Remove embed yaml second separator (if empty) */ . markdown-embed-content > hr : first-child + hr { display : none ; } /* Remove embed yaml second separator */ . markdown-embed-content > hr : first-child + p + hr { display : none ; } /*降低页边距*/ /* In Edit mode, reduce space between the left edge (blue line) and the line numbering, and instead of toggling to "Readable line length" use max-width - thanks to Reggie*/ /* https://discord.com/channels/686053708261228577/702656734631821413/73219976395672781 */ . cm-s-obsidian { max-width : 750 px ; text-align : left ; padding-left : 0 ; } . markdown-source-view { padding-right : 0 px ; } . markdown-preview-view { max-width : 750 px ; text-align : left ; } /*list对齐*/ /* Reduce indentation in bullet lists */ ol { padding-inline-start : 18 px ; } ul { padding-inline-start : 18 px ; list-style-type : disc ; } /* Long bullet list: connect the same levels of bullets with vertical "lines" */ . cm-hmd-list-indent . cm-tab , ul ul { position : relative ; } . cm-hmd-list-indent . cm-tab :: before , ul ul :: before { content : '' ; border-left : 1 px solid rgba ( 0 , 122 , 255 , 0.25 ); position : absolute ; } . cm-hmd-list-indent . cm-tab :: before { left : 0 ; top : -5 px ; bottom : -4 px ; } ul ul :: before { left : -11 px ; top : 0 ; bottom : 0 ; /* change "left:" value for align of vert. line */ } 导出 ¶ 如果在md文件中使用![TOC]目录，导出的pdf中会有书签 其他关心的问题 ¶ 怎么显示toc 怎么显示标签面板 mermaid ​ 内连接Internal Links ¶ [[My Favorite Band2]] 块引用： [[A#B]] 会链接到 A.md 文件的 B 标题 内连接指向的文本文件换了位置以后，obsidian会自动更新内连接。 可以再obsidian里修改内连接的标题，然后自动更新连接即可。 And if you decide that a title is not what you actually meant, you can change the file name at the top of this window, and Obsidian will automatically update all links to it. 的 ​ Obsidian automatically creates files when you click a link to a file that does not exist. This means you can [[write naturally]] about [[whatever comes to mind]] and then go back and create the new notes at your leisure. This makes Obsidian a fantastic tool for thinking freely in notes without having to worry about where to file them. ​ ​ 标签 ¶ obsidian ¶ ​ 比如要给出一个 obsidian 的标签，则 #obsidian 即可。 ​ 设置-然后插件-开启标签面板以后，右侧展开就可以显示标签面板。 ​ 折叠 ¶ 首先需要再设置里的Editor里打开折叠，然后在编辑模式下可以折叠文本 ​ ​ \( \(\begin{vmatrix}a & b\\ c & d \end{vmatrix}=ad-bc\) \) ​ ​ 其他关心的问题 ¶ 怎么显示toc 怎么显示标签面板 mermaid ¶ ​ 插件 ¶ 五线谱渲染music-notion ¶ X:1 T:The Legacy Jig M:6/8 L:1/8 R:jig K:G GFG BAB | gfg gab | GFG BAB | d2A AFD | GFG BAB | gfg gab | age edB |1 dBA AFD :|2 dBA ABd |: efe edB | dBA ABd | efe edB | gdB ABd | efe edB | d2d def | gfe edB |1 dBA ABd :|2 dBA AFD |] Chorus music 和弦 X: 1 T: Chorus V: T1 clef=treble name="Soprano" V: T2 clef=treble name="Alto" V: B1 clef=bass name="Tenor" V: B2 clef=bass name="Bass" L:1/8 K:G P:First Part [V: T1]"C"ed"Am"ed "F"cd"G7"gf | [V: T2]GGAA- A2BB | [V: B1]C3D- DF,3 | [V: B2]C,2A,,2 F,,2G,,2| 注意语法： 1. L ⅛表示最小单位为⅛音符，这时候C1渲染成⅛音符; L ¼表示最小单位为¼音符，这时候C1渲染成¼音符 2. 对于高音谱号，C为中央C，小写的c，则高8度 4. "1"可以显示指法 5. ^F 表示升F, 6. 降调To flatten a note precede it with an underscore _B 表示降B calendar插件+day planner实现日程管理 ¶ 安装 day planner 和 calendar 插件 day planner 设置里 day planner mode 里设置为command mode calendar面板内打开创建今天的日记，然后在控制面板里选择 day planner: link today's day planner to the current note Paste URL into selection ¶ 粘贴url的时候用 ctrl+shift+v 相关资源 ¶ https://github.com/kmaasrud/awesome-obsidian 一些和obsidian相关的工具、css，比如Markdownload （网页剪裁工具，转换成markdown格式） http://abcnotation.com/ 这个给出了记号的查询。 https://music.meta.stackexchange.com/questions/2782/documentation-for-abcjs 也给出了一些记号 http://jackiegeek.gitee.io/obsidian-chinese-help/ obsidian群 obsidian基本使用 有一些主题推荐 参考 ¶ Obsidian使用分享汇总 提到了zotero的使用技巧 https://www.yuque.com/deerain/gannbs/isp8my 一些插件评价和介绍

docs.text: Base2Tone-me.css 后面lmd注释后面的。 包括 - 对页边距调整 - list对齐问题 下载地址： https://github.com/Dmitriy-Shulha/obsidian-css-snippets 具体如下：(加到css文件的后面 参考 Lists - (un)ordered.md ) /* remove the yaml metadata from embed */ /* Remove embed yaml first separator */ . markdown-embed-content > hr : first-child { display : none ; } /* Remove embed yaml content */ . markdown-embed-content > hr : first-child + p { display : none ; } /* Remove embed yaml second separator (if empty) */ . markdown-embed-content > hr : first-child + hr { display : none ; } /* Remove embed yaml second separator */ . markdown-embed-content > hr : first-child + p + hr { display : none ; } /*降低页边距*/ /* In Edit mode, reduce space between the left edge (blue line) and the line numbering, and instead of toggling to "Readable line length" use max-width - thanks to Reggie*/ /* https://discord.com/channels/686053708261228577/702656734631821413/73219976395672781 */ . cm-s-obsidian { max-width : 750 px ; text-align : left ; padding-left : 0 ; } . markdown-source-view { padding-right : 0 px ; } . markdown-preview-view { max-width : 750 px ; text-align : left ; } /*list对齐*/ /* Reduce indentation in bullet lists */ ol { padding-inline-start : 18 px ; } ul { padding-inline-start : 18 px ; list-style-type : disc ; } /* Long bullet list: connect the same levels of bullets with vertical "lines" */ . cm-hmd-list-indent . cm-tab , ul ul { position : relative ; } . cm-hmd-list-indent . cm-tab :: before , ul ul :: before { content : '' ; border-left : 1 px solid rgba ( 0 , 122 , 255 , 0.25 ); position : absolute ; } . cm-hmd-list-indent . cm-tab :: before { left : 0 ; top : -5 px ; bottom : -4 px ; } ul ul :: before { left : -11 px ; top : 0 ; bottom : 0 ; /* change "left:" value for align of vert. line */ }

docs.text: [[My Favorite Band2]] 块引用： [[A#B]] 会链接到 A.md 文件的 B 标题 内连接指向的文本文件换了位置以后，obsidian会自动更新内连接。 可以再obsidian里修改内连接的标题，然后自动更新连接即可。 And if you decide that a title is not what you actually meant, you can change the file name at the top of this window, and Obsidian will automatically update all links to it. 的 ​ Obsidian automatically creates files when you click a link to a file that does not exist. This means you can [[write naturally]] about [[whatever comes to mind]] and then go back and create the new notes at your leisure. This makes Obsidian a fantastic tool for thinking freely in notes without having to worry about where to file them. ​ ​
docs.title: 内连接Internal Links

docs.text: X:1 T:The Legacy Jig M:6/8 L:1/8 R:jig K:G GFG BAB | gfg gab | GFG BAB | d2A AFD | GFG BAB | gfg gab | age edB |1 dBA AFD :|2 dBA ABd |: efe edB | dBA ABd | efe edB | gdB ABd | efe edB | d2d def | gfe edB |1 dBA ABd :|2 dBA AFD |] Chorus music 和弦 X: 1 T: Chorus V: T1 clef=treble name="Soprano" V: T2 clef=treble name="Alto" V: B1 clef=bass name="Tenor" V: B2 clef=bass name="Bass" L:1/8 K:G P:First Part [V: T1]"C"ed"Am"ed "F"cd"G7"gf | [V: T2]GGAA- A2BB | [V: B1]C3D- DF,3 | [V: B2]C,2A,,2 F,,2G,,2| 注意语法： 1. L ⅛表示最小单位为⅛音符，这时候C1渲染成⅛音符; L ¼表示最小单位为¼音符，这时候C1渲染成¼音符 2. 对于高音谱号，C为中央C，小写的c，则高8度 4. "1"可以显示指法 5. ^F 表示升F, 6. 降调To flatten a note precede it with an underscore _B 表示降B

docs.text: [toc] vnote + 印象笔记进行markdown笔记管理 ¶ 用vscode进行markdown笔记的撰写 用ever monkey插件将md同步到印象笔记 用vnote对md进行本地的管理 用vnote进行文献管理 (无效，不采用) ¶ 新建一个文件夹 vnote-资料库 ，在这个文件夹下面建立两个文件夹 vnote-md索引 （所有的md笔记放这里） 具体资料 （所有的资料放这个文件夹里） 新建一个vnote笔记，为 vnote-资料库 ， md文件放 vnote-md索引 附件的路径无需设置 使用技巧 ¶ 利用linux命令自动生成索引 ¶ 下载 tree 命令的 二进制包，安装 tree 命令工具 打开进入 Tree for Windows 页面，选择下载 Binaries zip 文件。 解压压缩包，找到压缩包内的 bin 目录，将 bin 目录下的 tree.exe 复制 找到 C:\Program Files\Git\usr\bin 目录，将 tree.exe 粘贴到该目录下，安装即完成 在git bash下进行tree命令操作： tree -I '*svn|*node_module*|*cpp|*.cmake|*cpp~|*m|*tgz|*h' > 4.txt (忽略某些目录) 其他 ¶ md的名字和资料库中最后一个层次的文件夹名字相同。 直接将pdf拖拽到md文件里，产生超链接(以相对路径形式) 给md文件添加标签便于区分： 必选标签：ref 文献类型标签：book/paper/ 专业性标签，比如Riemannian manifolds 使用技巧 ¶ 如果有些文件夹导不进来，则可以对 _vnote.json 文件进行编辑，手动添加。
docs.title: vnote

docs.text:
[toc] 文献管理核心功能 ¶ 我关注如下文献管理是否能实现如下几个核心功能 1. 自动根据pdf生成数据库。批量导入 2. 自动补全信息 3. 自动更新文件，类似：Tools - Options - Watched Folder。 （文件夹里删除了，数据库能够自动删除？） 4. 多级目录 5. 批量添加标签 Zotero文献管理 ¶ 具体实施步骤： ¶ zotero的设置 首选项 的 高级 的 数据存储位置 里设置 D:\Dropbox\mdeng\WORK\zotero-资料库\database 注： 数据存储位置 （为数据库的存储位置，而不是具体文献的存储位置），文献的附件默认是存储在 数据存储位置 子目录的 storage 下。 首选项 --- 高级 --- 文件和文件夹 ---- 链接附件的根目录 ---- D:\Dropbox\mdeng\WORK\zotero-资料库\zotfileSorted （这样在别的电脑也设置成相对目录也能打开了） 这两个路径别搞反了 zotfile的设置 Source Folder for Attaching new Files 设置为zotero附件的存储位置，也就是 d:\dropbox\mdeng\WORK\zotero-资料库\database\storage\ Location of Files 设置为标准的格式文件存储位置: d:\dropbox\mdeng\WORK\zotero-资料库\ZotfileSorted use subfoled defined by选中，并写上 /%c ，则zotfile会按照collection对文件进行分类 ( 这点很重要 ) 高级选下里-重命名-设置为 always rename 实际操作(把 filter 子文件夹下的 adaptive 的所有文献导入数据库中)： zotero: 新建分类 filter ，然后建 adaptive 子分类 zotero, 按住shift键，将文献导入到 adaptive 子类下（按住shift键就是附件直接剪切到 数据存储位置 子目录的 storage ） 添加合适的标签 选中这些文献，然后右键-manage attachments → Rename，就自动对文献进行重命名，并保存到zotfile的 location of files 指定的文件夹下了，也就是 d:\dropbox\mdeng\WORK\zotero-资料库\ZotfileSorted . 注：对于zotfile无法解析的文件，则会残余在zotero的附件默认存储目录下 未找到匹配的参考文献 PDF不包含OCRed文本 标签快捷键参考： https://iseex.github.io/2019-01/zotero-refs-skills/ markdown 安装 markdown here 参考 ,重启后，预览ctrl+alt+m zotero的插件 ¶ zotfile 文件管理插件 ¶ 相关设置 general settings Source Folder for Attaching new Files 这个是对于没有附件的条目新增附件时自动选取该文件夹下最新modified的文件，我设置为zotero的默认存储位置，也就是 d:\dropbox\mdeng\WORK\zotero-资料库\database\storage\ ,这样一旦有新附件了，zotfile就能检测到，复制到 Location of Files 这个是最关键的，设置为你刚刚设置的附件地址，这个地址一定要是网盘的同步盘地址，因为在这个地方选择了custom location后，zotfile会自动将附件全部移到这个文件夹中。要在不同的电脑上选择同一个位置，不同点就在于不同的电脑名，但因为设置过根目录所以就会忽略。 use subfoled defined by选中，并写上 /%c ，则zotfile会按照collection对文件进行分类 renaming rules 里选中Change to lower case 高级选下里-重命名-设置为 always rename 注意： Source Folder for Attaching new Files 的附件不会移动到到 location of files 。所需要的操作就是选中要移动的文献，然后right-click → manage attachments → Rename 注意：如果不能实现mac和windows下同步的话（由于路径问题），我是安装zutilo插件解决的。安装完以后，设置zutilo首选项，显示可以修改附件的路径的菜单。 然后选中所有文献，修改路径，路径替换 旧路径为 /Users/yuexin/Desktop/mdeng/WORK/zotero-资料库/zotfileSorted\ 新路径为： /Users/yuexin/Desktop/mdeng/WORK/zotero-资料库/zotfileSorted/ . 就可以在mac上也能打开文件了。 zotfile还能实现和平板之间的传输 Syncing PDF attachments with your iPad or Android tablet ¶ 以坚果云为例进行说明 电脑端坚果云文件夹路径为 D:\Dropbox\JianGuoYun\我的坚果云\zotero （zotero为我新建的文件夹，用于存放批注的pdf) zotfile里tablet preference里设置文件夹路径为 D:\Dropbox\JianGuoYun\我的坚果云\zotero IPAD PDF EXPORT添加坚果云的webdav即可。 To read and annotate PDF attachments on your mobile device, zotfile can sync PDFs from your Zotero library to your (mobile) PDF reader (e.g. an iPad, Android tablet, etc.). For this purpose, Zotfile sends files to a location on your PC or Mac that syncs with your PDF reader App (PDF Expert, iAnnotate, GoodReader etc.), and gets them back when you have finished reading them. Set up a folder on your PC or Mac that syncs with your tablet reader application. Files that are copied to this folder should automatically appear in your PDF reader application. One possibility is Dropbox, which is free for up to 2GB of space and works with most PDF reader apps. More detailed instructions as well as alternative options should be available on the website of your PDF reader App. Open the 'Tablet Settings' tab in the zotfile preference window and enable the option 'Use ZotFile to send and get files from tablet'. Change the zotfile location for files on the tablet to the folder that syncs with your pdf reader app ('Base Folder' on the 'Tablet Settings' tab). (optional) Set up subfolders that make it easy to sort your files in the tablet folder so that you can easily find them on your tablet. You can now start sending pdfs (or other files) to your tablet. Simply right-click on a zotero item and select 'Send to Tablet' under 'Manage Attachments'. When you are done reading and annotating your pdf, just get the file back from the tablet by clicking on 'Get from Tablet' under 'Manage Attachments'. ZotFile will automatically remove the file from your tablet folder and extract the annotations from the pdf file to a zotero note. ZotFile adds a saved search for modified files on tablet which updates automatically and can be used to sync attachment files that have been changed zotfile导出笔记 ¶ 导出后复制到md文件里，可以用obsidian直接打开进行管理即可。 备注和高亮是可以自动导出成笔记的，但是注释和文本框不行。 zotore里的高级首选项里可以打开编辑器设置笔记格式： formatAnnotationHighlight :
"%(content)" (%(cite))
zotero-better-bibtex ¶ 我的设置如下：citation key format里设置为： [auth:lower][year][veryshorttitle:lower] 安装完以后在首选项里选key格式，如果要换key格式，则 - 先在key 格式里填上 [zotero:clean] 。然后选文献右键 refresh ，如果还没反应，则需要选 unpin bibtex key 。 - 然后在首选项里填上新的key，再refresh 对于中文文献key太长的解决方案参考： http://blog.sciencenet.cn/blog-531760-1009203.html 先pin bibtex key，然后在修改 其他 里key为 bibtex:..... 其他基本知识 ¶ 关于database和attached files 1. 一条参考文献包含很多信息，标题、作者、来源、年份等等，zotero把这些信息归称为DataBase；同时，一个文献条目会有相应的PDF文件，可能还会有其他的附件文件，如视频、音频、图像等，zotero把这些信息归称为Attatched Files。对于DataBase，zotero服务器可以免费无限制地帮你存到它的服务器上，你可尽情地把你的文献信息同步上去；对于Attatched Files，zotero只能免费给你提供300M的空间。对于付费用户，则可以扩展空间，甚至可获得无限制的空间。 zotero将附件存放在zotero目录下的storage文件夹中 原生zotero会默认在storage文件夹下将附件保存在以杂乱符号为名的子文件夹中，不便于查看和整理，而且没有办法让用户修改。这样就会造成，当你脱离zotero软件去访问网盘文件夹时，PDF都被存于一个个名字像乱码一样的文件夹中，让你无从寻找想要的文件。 zotfile这款小插件就正好能一举两得地既能实现database与files的分离，又能自定义storage下的文件保存样式，比如以年份为文件夹名归类各PDF。 关于复制还是剪切还是超连接 直接拖拽是复制，shift+拖拽是剪切，ctrl+shift+拖拽则相当于创建超链接。 - Cmd-drag on OS X, Shift on Windows and Linux to move the files into Zotero and remove them from their original location - Ctrl-Shift-drag on Windows/Linux, Cmd-Option-drag on OS X to leave files in their original location and link to them from Zotero. (同时ctrl+shift就可以了) From 、 其他文献管理软件 ¶ Citavi 对比 Zotero Mendeley 拖拽导入 支持(ctrl+shift或shift) 支持 批量添加标签 支持，先选中再拖拽 支持 多级目录 支持 支持 监视目录 不支持 支持 ​ ​ ​ PDF 文档内搜索 zotero数据库恢复 ¶ A 电脑迁移到 B 电脑 A电脑的数据库目录： - 数据库目录，记作 A-database-path : D:\Dropbox\mdeng\WORK\zotero-资料库\database (该目录下有 zotero.sqlite 数据库文件，注意下日期和大小是否对) - zotfile管理的附件存储路径为 A-zotfile-savepath : d:\dropbox\mdeng\WORK\zotero-资料库\ZotfileSorted 将这些文件夹直接拷贝到B电脑 B电脑的数据库目录： - 数据库目录，记作 B-database-path : d:\lmd\personal\zoterolib\zotero-资料库\database\ - zotfile管理的附件存储路径为 B-zotfile-savepath : d:\lmd\personal\zoterolib\zotero-资料库\zotfileSorted\ 在B电脑能上进行如下的操作： 安装zotero，安装zofile插件 打开zotero，首选项-高级-文件和文件夹-数据存储位置选择 B-database-path （数据 zotero.sqlite 所在文件夹） 参考 zotero官方文献 zotfile preferences下的 source fold for attaching new files设置为 B-database-path 下的storage目录 location of files 里的custom location选 B-zotfile-savepath : cmd下创建一个软连接: mklink -J A-zotfile-savepath对应的目录 B-zotfile-savepath对应的目录 就可以了。 参考文献 ¶ 知识管理软件 Zotero 的使用 zotfile官方

docs.title: 具体实施步骤：

docs.text: 相关设置 general settings Source Folder for Attaching new Files 这个是对于没有附件的条目新增附件时自动选取该文件夹下最新modified的文件，我设置为zotero的默认存储位置，也就是 d:\dropbox\mdeng\WORK\zotero-资料库\database\storage\ ,这样一旦有新附件了，zotfile就能检测到，复制到 Location of Files 这个是最关键的，设置为你刚刚设置的附件地址，这个地址一定要是网盘的同步盘地址，因为在这个地方选择了custom location后，zotfile会自动将附件全部移到这个文件夹中。要在不同的电脑上选择同一个位置，不同点就在于不同的电脑名，但因为设置过根目录所以就会忽略。 use subfoled defined by选中，并写上 /%c ，则zotfile会按照collection对文件进行分类 renaming rules 里选中Change to lower case 高级选下里-重命名-设置为 always rename 注意： Source Folder for Attaching new Files 的附件不会移动到到 location of files 。所需要的操作就是选中要移动的文献，然后right-click → manage attachments → Rename 注意：如果不能实现mac和windows下同步的话（由于路径问题），我是安装zutilo插件解决的。安装完以后，设置zutilo首选项，显示可以修改附件的路径的菜单。 然后选中所有文献，修改路径，路径替换 旧路径为 /Users/yuexin/Desktop/mdeng/WORK/zotero-资料库/zotfileSorted\ 新路径为： /Users/yuexin/Desktop/mdeng/WORK/zotero-资料库/zotfileSorted/ . 就可以在mac上也能打开文件了。 zotfile还能实现和平板之间的传输
docs.title: zotfile 文件管理插件

docs.text: 以坚果云为例进行说明 电脑端坚果云文件夹路径为 D:\Dropbox\JianGuoYun\我的坚果云\zotero （zotero为我新建的文件夹，用于存放批注的pdf) zotfile里tablet preference里设置文件夹路径为 D:\Dropbox\JianGuoYun\我的坚果云\zotero IPAD PDF EXPORT添加坚果云的webdav即可。 To read and annotate PDF attachments on your mobile device, zotfile can sync PDFs from your Zotero library to your (mobile) PDF reader (e.g. an iPad, Android tablet, etc.). For this purpose, Zotfile sends files to a location on your PC or Mac that syncs with your PDF reader App (PDF Expert, iAnnotate, GoodReader etc.), and gets them back when you have finished reading them. Set up a folder on your PC or Mac that syncs with your tablet reader application. Files that are copied to this folder should automatically appear in your PDF reader application. One possibility is Dropbox, which is free for up to 2GB of space and works with most PDF reader apps. More detailed instructions as well as alternative options should be available on the website of your PDF reader App. Open the 'Tablet Settings' tab in the zotfile preference window and enable the option 'Use ZotFile to send and get files from tablet'. Change the zotfile location for files on the tablet to the folder that syncs with your pdf reader app ('Base Folder' on the 'Tablet Settings' tab). (optional) Set up subfolders that make it easy to sort your files in the tablet folder so that you can easily find them on your tablet. You can now start sending pdfs (or other files) to your tablet. Simply right-click on a zotero item and select 'Send to Tablet' under 'Manage Attachments'. When you are done reading and annotating your pdf, just get the file back from the tablet by clicking on 'Get from Tablet' under 'Manage Attachments'. ZotFile will automatically remove the file from your tablet folder and extract the annotations from the pdf file to a zotero note. ZotFile adds a saved search for modified files on tablet which updates automatically and can be used to sync attachment files that have been changed
docs.title: Syncing PDF attachments with your iPad or Android tablet

docs.text: 我的设置如下：citation key format里设置为： [auth:lower][year][veryshorttitle:lower] 安装完以后在首选项里选key格式，如果要换key格式，则 - 先在key 格式里填上 [zotero:clean] 。然后选文献右键 refresh ，如果还没反应，则需要选 unpin bibtex key 。 - 然后在首选项里填上新的key，再refresh 对于中文文献key太长的解决方案参考： http://blog.sciencenet.cn/blog-531760-1009203.html 先pin bibtex key，然后在修改 其他 里key为 bibtex:.....
docs.title: zotero-better-bibtex

docs.text: 关于database和attached files 1. 一条参考文献包含很多信息，标题、作者、来源、年份等等，zotero把这些信息归称为DataBase；同时，一个文献条目会有相应的PDF文件，可能还会有其他的附件文件，如视频、音频、图像等，zotero把这些信息归称为Attatched Files。对于DataBase，zotero服务器可以免费无限制地帮你存到它的服务器上，你可尽情地把你的文献信息同步上去；对于Attatched Files，zotero只能免费给你提供300M的空间。对于付费用户，则可以扩展空间，甚至可获得无限制的空间。 zotero将附件存放在zotero目录下的storage文件夹中 原生zotero会默认在storage文件夹下将附件保存在以杂乱符号为名的子文件夹中，不便于查看和整理，而且没有办法让用户修改。这样就会造成，当你脱离zotero软件去访问网盘文件夹时，PDF都被存于一个个名字像乱码一样的文件夹中，让你无从寻找想要的文件。 zotfile这款小插件就正好能一举两得地既能实现database与files的分离，又能自定义storage下的文件保存样式，比如以年份为文件夹名归类各PDF。 关于复制还是剪切还是超连接 直接拖拽是复制，shift+拖拽是剪切，ctrl+shift+拖拽则相当于创建超链接。 - Cmd-drag on OS X, Shift on Windows and Linux to move the files into Zotero and remove them from their original location - Ctrl-Shift-drag on Windows/Linux, Cmd-Option-drag on OS X to leave files in their original location and link to them from Zotero. (同时ctrl+shift就可以了) From <https://forums.zotero.org/discussion/57640/adding-existing-pdfs-without-creating-new-copies> 、

docs.text: A 电脑迁移到 B 电脑 A电脑的数据库目录： - 数据库目录，记作 A-database-path : D:\Dropbox\mdeng\WORK\zotero-资料库\database (该目录下有 zotero.sqlite 数据库文件，注意下日期和大小是否对) - zotfile管理的附件存储路径为 A-zotfile-savepath : d:\dropbox\mdeng\WORK\zotero-资料库\ZotfileSorted 将这些文件夹直接拷贝到B电脑 B电脑的数据库目录： - 数据库目录，记作 B-database-path : d:\lmd\personal\zoterolib\zotero-资料库\database\ - zotfile管理的附件存储路径为 B-zotfile-savepath : d:\lmd\personal\zoterolib\zotero-资料库\zotfileSorted\ 在B电脑能上进行如下的操作： 安装zotero，安装zofile插件 打开zotero，首选项-高级-文件和文件夹-数据存储位置选择 B-database-path （数据 zotero.sqlite 所在文件夹） 参考 zotero官方文献 zotfile preferences下的 source fold for attaching new files设置为 B-database-path 下的storage目录 location of files 里的custom location选 B-zotfile-savepath : cmd下创建一个软连接: mklink -J A-zotfile-savepath对应的目录 B-zotfile-savepath对应的目录 就可以了。

重装前的准备工作 ¶ 卸载wsl linux系统相关 ¶ visual studio code ¶ 新方法：直接在preference里打开setting sync登录outlook邮箱就可以同步了。 以下是老方法 利用setting-syn插件将设置和插件备份到github, 参考 GitHub Token: 0badd5c87f3739e766a4597b9b43d757028b7851 (KEY) GitHub Gist: d49adc4eff5709d3530d79db9ff63c71 （ID） GitHub Gist Type: Secret 备份环境变量 ¶ backEnviron.bat 备份total commander配置文件 ¶ backupTotalCommander （这一步不需要了，现在用的版本是 D:\dropbox\mdeng\software\必备-win\Total Commander v9.51.62_64bit\TotalCMD ) 同步下onenote同步到网络 ¶ 注意不要删除onedrive文件夹下的文档文件夹，这个是同步用的。 如果不小心把onedrive文档文件夹下的笔记本超链接删了，则需要在有onenote笔记本的电脑上，设置属性，更改位置，将笔记本路径更改到该文件夹即可。 先更改到 d:\onedrive\文档 ，然后再更改到网盘 c:\user\mdeng\onedrive 里 （直接更改到c盘那个会提示改不了。） 重装后的步骤 ¶ 安装软件列表 ¶ 系统类 - FreeFileSync （不要用Synctoy） - everything - 护眼之星 - shadowsocks - dropbox (目前用不着) - total commander (绿色版 不用安装) - VcXsrv /linux系统相关 办公类 - MiKTeX 2.9 - zotero （参考zotero.md） - Foxit PhantomPDF - pandoc - office,onenote - mathtype - vnote 不用安装，绿色的 - document node (用思维导图方式显示markdown) - 印象笔记 - eudic 欧路词典 编程相关 - git - visual studio code - matlab - Microsoft Visual Studio 14.0 (2015) 安装顺序： ¶ STEP 1 基本软件 ¶ 首先安装如下几个软件： 1. chrome 2. Qfind pro 并建立NAS网盘映射 3. obsidian 打开NAS里的笔记本 4. 护眼之星 5. everything (C盘) 6. 7zip STEP 2 QSYNC ¶ Qsync，并设置好同步[[NAS学习#^6ce744|see]] STEP 3 科学上网设置 ¶ windows-shadowsocks-4.1.6（最新） 科学上网。 然后chrome安装 SwitchyOmega 插件。设置见[[电脑重装系统#^1eabc0]] STEP 4 系统软件 ¶ Total commander: D:\dropbox\mdeng\software\必备-win\Total Commander v9.51.62_64bit\TotalCMD 配置文件是该文件夹user下的 User.ini 创建系统备份 ¶ 注意有些软件安装在D盘里，所以如果还原的话，除了STEP1-STEP3的相关软件，其他安装在D盘的软件需要重新安装 见[[电脑重装系统#win10系统备份]] 将系统桌面设置在D盘 STEP5 安装matlab/zotero ¶ 安装zotero和zotfile、better bibtex、zutilo插件，具体设置见[[zotero]] 安装chrome的zotero插件 安装matlab 2020 SETP 6 安装miktex ¶ STEP 7:安装和配置vscode ¶ 安装vscode （安装在 D:\Program Files\Microsoft VS Code\Code.exe ） 开启setting-sync（preference里打开setting sync登录outlook邮箱就可以同步了。） 检查 setting.jason 里的配置( preference-setting sync is on 然后 show synced data )，安装相应的软件到路径。比如： D:\Program Files\SumatraPDF\SumatraPDF.exe STEP 8: 安装pandoc/document node/freefilesync ¶ 安装pandoc beyond compare document node freefilesync SETP 9 ¶ dism++ 备份 STEP1-8 最好是把D盘里program file两个文件夹也备份了。 thinkbook-20201209-step1to8.wim 先备份到D盘，然后复制到NAS里: \192.168.0.139
as ackup\win10 STEP 10安装vs ¶ ![[Pasted image 20201209203021.png]] STEP 11安装其他 ¶ sourcetree doxygen+graphviz visio STEP 12 LINUX WSL2 ¶ 见[[7-linux_wsl2安装#^2b4c01]]最新的安装方式直接下载客户端就可以了 STEP 13 ¶ quicker STEP LINUX相关 ¶ xftp6,xshell 6, vnc viewer 印象笔记 STEP 14 ¶ typora visual studio code 插件还原 ¶ 先安装setting sync插件 利用setting-syn插件将设置和插件备份到github, 参考 GitHub Token: 0badd5c87f3739e766a4597b9b43d757028b7851 (KEY) GitHub Gist: d49adc4eff5709d3530d79db9ff63c71 （ID） GitHub Gist Type: Secret onenote设置 ¶ onenote options里save &backup backup Folder: C:\Users\mdeng\AppData\Local\Microsoft\OneNote 改成D:\Dropbox\mdeng\someBackup\OnenoteBackup， 将间隔设置为3天。onenote应该会自动同步的，这么做是以防万一。设置完以后重启下onenote，手动备份下。 （每次重新安装系统的时候重新手动备份下。） pandoc设置 ¶ 1) 安装完以后需要：每次重新安装pandoc的时候，将这里的文件(d:\Dropbox\mdeng\someBackup\pandocTemplate\pandoc插件)拷贝到pandoc.exe所在文件夹 添加环境变量，测试all2html.bat是否能够正常运行 一些软件具体设置 ¶ everything设置用total commander打开 ¶ 工具 - 选项 - 上下文菜单 ： 将: 打开(文件夹) 、和 打开路径 全部设置成： $exec("D:\dropbox\mdeng\software\必备-win\Total Commander v9.51.62_64bit\TotalCMD\TotalCMD64.exe" /O /T /L="%1") $exec(“c:	otalcmd\TOTALCMD.EXE” /T /O /L=”%1") Where: “c:	otalcmd\TOTALCMD.EXE” — your TC install directory /O — If Total Commander is already running, activate it and pass the path(s) in the command line to that instance (overrides the settings in the configuration dialog to have multiple windows) /T — Opens the passed dir(s) in new tab(s) (for usage with /O) /L= — Set path in left window 参考 SwitchyOmega ¶ ^1eabc0 情景模式：proxy 代理协议：socks5 代理服务器： 127.0.0.1 代理端口：10801 （这个和ss软件设置要保持一致） 情景模式：auto switch 里，条件设置： *.google.com 对应的情景模式选proxy win10系统备份 ¶ 方法1 采用系统自动的（不好用） ¶ 备份-转到备份还原(win7)-创建系统映像，然后备份保存的位置选择 \192.168.0.139
as ackup\win10 备份后的路径为 \Nas4f513d
as ackup\win10\WindowsImageBackup\LAPTOP-T9AM7QKA 还原的时候应该只用选择 \192.168.0.139
as ackup\win10 即可。 参考 https://support.microsoft.com/zh-cn/windows/%E5%A4%87%E4%BB%BD%E5%92%8C%E8%BF%98%E5%8E%9F%E7%94%B5%E8%84%91-ac359b36-7015-4694-de9a-c5eac1ce9d9c#1TC=windows-7 实测不行，恢复的时候找不到镜像 方法2 dism++ ¶ 采用dism++软件，备份位置为 \192.168.0.139
as ackup\win10 先备份到D盘，然后复制过去 安装dropbox (目前用不着) ¶ 代理选择：socks5 127.0.0.1 1080 由于我的d盘里已经有了dropbox文件夹，因此需要如下设置： 将d盘里的 dropbox 文件夹重命名为 dropbox_ dropbox首选项----同步----dropbox文件夹--点移动-然后选则D盘(dropbox的上层目录) 将生成的dropbox文件夹删除，然后将原来那个 dropbox_ 又重命名为 dropbox 另外一种解决方案： 1. Select the Dropbox folder location, if not in the default location. ○ Important: Because this process removes the previous settings and configuration, if you wish to avoid re-downloading your Dropbox content you will need to manually choose the location for Dropbox to sync to. If you don't manually choose a location, you'll create a new Dropbox folder and start to download your content again. 1. To select your established Dropbox folder on your drive, click Advanced Settings after choosing which folders to sync. （主要是这一项） Then choose the parent folder of your already established Dropbox folder. For example, if you have your Dropbox folder in the path D:\OtherDrive\Folder\Dropbox, select the folder D:\OtherDrive\Folder. 最新更新，本地有dropbox文件夹，同步可能会冲突，解决方案如下： 1. 将本地的dropbox文件夹重命名为dropbox_ 2. 安装dropbox,然后选择性同步-要选择本地dropbox_包含的文件夹（比如mdeng），然后设置为在线访问 3. 然后进行同步（同步完成以后） 4. 利用freefilesync对dropbox_和dropbox进行比对更新， 将mdeng再设置为本地访问 参考资料1 参考资料2

docs.text: 代理选择：socks5 127.0.0.1 1080 由于我的d盘里已经有了dropbox文件夹，因此需要如下设置： 将d盘里的 dropbox 文件夹重命名为 dropbox_ dropbox首选项----同步----dropbox文件夹--点移动-然后选则D盘(dropbox的上层目录) 将生成的dropbox文件夹删除，然后将原来那个 dropbox_ 又重命名为 dropbox 另外一种解决方案： 1. Select the Dropbox folder location, if not in the default location. ○ Important: Because this process removes the previous settings and configuration, if you wish to avoid re-downloading your Dropbox content you will need to manually choose the location for Dropbox to sync to. If you don't manually choose a location, you'll create a new Dropbox folder and start to download your content again. 1. To select your established Dropbox folder on your drive, click Advanced Settings after choosing which folders to sync. （主要是这一项） Then choose the parent folder of your already established Dropbox folder. For example, if you have your Dropbox folder in the path D:\OtherDrive\Folder\Dropbox, select the folder D:\OtherDrive\Folder. 最新更新，本地有dropbox文件夹，同步可能会冲突，解决方案如下： 1. 将本地的dropbox文件夹重命名为dropbox_ 2. 安装dropbox,然后选择性同步-要选择本地dropbox_包含的文件夹（比如mdeng），然后设置为在线访问 3. 然后进行同步（同步完成以后） 4. 利用freefilesync对dropbox_和dropbox进行比对更新， 将mdeng再设置为本地访问 参考资料1 参考资料2

docs.text: 42的makefile学习及cmake改写 ¶ makefile #cmake ¶ *FLAGS ¶ CFLAGS ¶ CFLAGS = -Wall -Wshadow -Wno-deprecated -g $( ANSIFLAGS ) $( GLINC ) $( CINC ) -I $( INC ) -I $( KITINC ) -I $( KITSRC ) $( GMSECINC ) -O0 $( ARCHFLAG ) $( GUIFLAG ) $( SHADERFLAG ) $( CFDFLAG ) $( FFTBFLAG ) $( GSFCFLAG ) $( GMSECFLAG ) $( STANDALONEFLAG ) $( NOS3FSWFLAG ) $( GLFWFLAG ) 其中： ANSIFLAGS有两种情况： * #ANSIFLAGS = -Wstrict-prototypes -pedantic -ansi -Werror* ANSIFLAGS = CINC = INC = $(PROJDIR)Include/ KITINC = $(KITDIR)Include/ 其中： KITDIR = $(PROJDIR)Kit/ KITSRC = $(KITDIR)Source/ GMSECINC的值取决于GMSECFLAG，如果GMSECFLAG为空，则GMSECINC也为空。如果 *GMSECFLAG = -D _ENABLE_GMSEC_* ，则 GMSECINC = -I $(GMSECDIR)include/ 如果GUIFLAG为空，这时候不需要显示界面，则： GUIOBJ = GLINC = LIBS = -ldl -lm LFLAGS = ARCHFLAG = 否则： GUIOBJ = $( OBJ ) 42GlutGui.o $( OBJ ) glkit.o #GLINC = -I /usr/include/ GLINC = -I $( KITDIR ) /include/GL/ LIBS = -lglut -lGLU -lGL -ldl -lm LFLAGS = -L $( KITDIR ) /GL/lib/ ARCHFLAG = SHADERFLAG = -D _USE_SHADERS_ 因此gcc在CFLAGS调用的时候为 gcc -D _USE_SHADERS_ 含义就是gcc定义了宏 _USE_SHADERS_ ，该宏的默认值为1. see[[gcc学习#gcc -D选项]] 。推断程序里用到了 _USE_SHADERS_ 这个宏 makefile CFDFLAG = #CFDFLAG = -D _ENABLE_CFD_SLOSH_ makefile FFTBFLAG = #FFTBFLAG = -D _ENABLE_FFTB_CODE_ ```makefile #GSFCFLAG = GSFCFLAG = -D USE_GSFC_WATERMARK ``` makefile GMSECFLAG = ```makefile STANDALONEFLAG = #STANDALONEFLAG = -D AC_STANDALONE ``` makefile NOS3FSWFLAG = #NOS3FSWFLAG = -D _ENABLE_NOS3_FSW_ makefile #GLFWFLAG = GLFWFLAG = -D _USE_GLFW_ LFLAGS ¶ 取决于GUIFLAG，如果 GUIFLAG = -D _USE_GUI _, 则 LFLAGS = -L $(KITDIR)/GL/lib/ 否则为空。 生成42可执行文件 ¶ 42 : $( 42OBJ ) $( GUIOBJ ) $( SIMIPCOBJ ) $( FFTBOBJ ) $( SLOSHOBJ ) $( KITOBJ ) $( ACOBJ ) $( GMSECOBJ ) $( CC ) $( LFLAGS ) $( GMSECBIN ) -o $( EXENAME ) $( 42OBJ ) $( GUIOBJ ) $( FFTBOBJ ) $( SLOSHOBJ ) $( KITOBJ ) $( ACOBJ ) $( GMSECOBJ ) $( SIMIPCOBJ ) $( LIBS ) $( GMSECLIB ) 42OBJ变量由一系列.o文件组成，见下文 GUIOBJ取决于GUIFLAG, 没有界面则为空 SIMIPCOBJ取决于GMSECFLAG，如果为空的话，则： SIMIPCOBJ = $( OBJ ) SimWriteToFile.o $( OBJ ) SimWriteToSocket.o \ $( OBJ ) SimReadFromFile.o $( OBJ ) SimReadFromSocket.o 由4个.o文件组成 FFTBOBJ取决于FFTBFLAG，后者为空的话，则前者也为空。默认为空。暂时不管 SLOSHOBJ取决于CFDFLAG，默认为空 KITOBJ KITOBJ = $( OBJ ) dcmkit.o $( OBJ ) envkit.o $( OBJ ) fswkit.o $( OBJ ) geomkit.o \ $( OBJ ) iokit.o $( OBJ ) mathkit.o $( OBJ ) nrlmsise00kit.o $( OBJ ) msis86kit.o \ $( OBJ ) orbkit.o $( OBJ ) radbeltkit.o $( OBJ ) sigkit.o $( OBJ ) sphkit.o $( OBJ ) timekit.o ACOBJ取决于STANDALONEFLAG，STANDALONEFLAG为空的话（默认），则 ACOBJ = $(OBJ)AcApp.o ，否则ACOBJ为空。 GMSECOBJ取决于GMSECFLAG，默认为空 GMSECBIN取决于GMSECFLAG，默认为空 EXENAME = 42 GMSECLIB取决于GMSECFLAG，默认为空 42OBJ ¶ 42OBJ变量的组成 ¶ 42OBJ由如下.o文件组成： ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42main.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42exec.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42actuators.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42cmd.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42dynamics.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42environs.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42ephem.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42fsw.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42init.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42ipc.o ​ $(OBJ)orbkit.o : $( KITSRC ) orbkit . c $( CC ) $( CFLAGS ) -c $( KITSRC ) orbkit.c -o $( OBJ ) orbkit.o $(OBJ)radbeltkit.o : $( KITSRC ) radbeltkit . c $( CC ) $( CFLAGS ) -c $( KITSRC ) radbeltkit.c -o $( OBJ ) radbeltkit.o $(OBJ)sigkit.o : $( KITSRC ) sigkit . c $( CC ) $( CFLAGS ) -c $( KITSRC ) sigkit.c -o $( OBJ ) sigkit.o $(OBJ)sphkit.o : $( KITSRC ) sphkit . c $( CC ) $( CFLAGS ) -c $( KITSRC ) sphkit.c -o $( OBJ ) sphkit.o $(OBJ)timekit.o : $( KITSRC ) timekit . c $( CC ) $( CFLAGS ) -c $( KITSRC ) timekit.c -o $( OBJ ) timekit.o ACOBJ ¶ $(OBJ)AcApp.o : $( SRC ) AcApp . c $( INC ) Ac . h $( INC ) AcTypes . h $( CC ) $( CFLAGS ) -c $( SRC ) AcApp.c -o $( OBJ ) AcApp.o LIBS ¶ ifneq ($(strip $(GUIFLAG)),) GUIOBJ = $( OBJ ) 42GlutGui.o $( OBJ ) glkit.o #GLINC = -I /usr/include/ GLINC = -I $( KITDIR ) /include/GL/ LIBS = -lglut -lGLU -lGL -ldl -lm LFLAGS = -L $( KITDIR ) /GL/lib/ ARCHFLAG = else GUIOBJ = GLINC = LIBS = -ldl -lm LFLAGS = ARCHFLAG = endif ifneq ($(strip $(NOS3FSWFLAG)),) LIBS += -lpthread endif CMAKELists.txt改写 ¶ 源代码 ¶ cmake_minimum_required ( VERSION 3.5.1 ) project ( 42maniexe ) SET ( CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE "Debug" ) SET ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "$ENV{CXXFLAGS} -O0 -Wall -g2 -ggdb" ) # SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "$ENV{CXXFLAGS} -Wall -ggdb3 -O0 -gcodeview -std=c99") SET ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "$ENV{CXXFLAGS} -O3 -Wall" ) # include_directories("/usr/include/eigen3") # 添加Pangolin依赖 # find_package(Pangolin REQUIRED) # include_directories( ${Pangolin_INCLUDE_DIRS} ) # Basic directories # HOMEDIR = ./ # PROJDIR = ./ # KITDIR = $(PROJDIR)Kit/ # OBJ = $(PROJDIR)Object/ # INC = $(PROJDIR)Include/ # SRC = $(PROJDIR)Source/ # KITINC = $(KITDIR)Include/ # KITSRC = $(KITDIR)Source/ # INOUT = $(PROJDIR)InOut/ # GSFCSRC = $(PROJDIR)/GSFC/Source/ # IPCSRC = $(SRC)IPC/ set ( GMSECFLAG NULL ) set ( GUIFLAG NULL ) # message(${GMSECFLAG}) set ( KITDIR ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Kit ) set ( OBJ ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Object ) set ( INC ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Include ) set ( SRC ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Source ) set ( KITINC ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Kit/Include ) set ( KITSRC ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Kit/Source ) set ( INOUT ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /InOut ) set ( GSFCSRC ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /GSFC/Source ) set ( IPCSRC ${ SRC } /IPC ) include_directories ( ${ INC } ) include_directories ( "${KITINC}/" ) include_directories ( ${ KITSRC } ) message ( "KITINC=${KITINC}" ) add_definitions ( -D_USE_SHADERS_ -D_USE_GSFC_WATERMARK_ -D_USE_GLFW_ ) ## 添加源文件 file ( GLOB SOURCES42 "${SRC}/*.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/*.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Kit/Source/*.c" ) # "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/World/Downing Models/*.cpp" message ( "SOURCES42=${SOURCES42}" ) list ( REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/AppReadFromCmd.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/SimReadFromCmd.c" "${KITSRC}/texkit.c" "${KITSRC}/msis86kit.c" ) #忽略掉的文件 ## 避免出现多个main函数的情况，因此需要手动去除这些文件 set ( MULTIPLEMAIN "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Development/HeapSort.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Development/SelectMedian.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Development/ServerClient/FifoServer.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Utilities/AddAlphaToPpm.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Utilities/BuildStarCat.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Utilities/PpmToGlyph.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Utilities/Tle2Kep.c" ) list ( REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 ${ MULTIPLEMAIN } ) #忽略掉的文件 42main不用这些文件，否则会出现同个函数有重复定义的情况 # 忽略掉ACIPCOBJ if ( ${ GMSECFLAG } STREQUAL "NULL" ) # GMSECFLAG为空 set ( ACIPCOBJ "${IPCSRC}/AppReadFromFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppWriteToSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppReadFromSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppWriteToFile.c" ) else () set ( ACIPCOBJ "${IPCSRC}/AppReadFromFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppWriteToGmsec.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppReadFromGmsec.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppWriteToSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppReadFromSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppWriteToFile.c" ) endif () list ( REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 ${ ACIPCOBJ } ) if ( ${ GMSECFLAG } STREQUAL "NULL" ) # GMSECFLAG为空 set ( SIMIPCOBJ "${IPCSRC}/SimWriteToFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimWriteToSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimReadFromFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimReadFromSocket.c" ) else () set ( SIMIPCOBJ "${IPCSRC}/SimWriteToFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimWriteToGmsec.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimWriteToSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimReadFromFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimReadFromGmsec.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimReadFromSocket.c" ) endif () # list(REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 ${SIMIPCOBJ}) #忽略掉的文件 42main不用这些文件，否则会出现同个函数有重复定义的情况 AcApp需要忽略的 # 如果GUIFLAG为空，则忽略掉一些源文件 if ( ${ GUIFLAG } STREQUAL "NULL" ) # GMSECFLAG为空 list ( REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 "${KITSRC}/glkit.c" "${SRC}/42GlutGui.c" "${SRC}/42glfwgui.c" ) #忽略掉的文件 42main不用这些文件，否则会 else () endif () if ( ${ GMSECFLAG } STREQUAL "NULL" ) # GMSECFLAG为空 list ( REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/SimReadFromGmsec.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/SimWriteToGmsec.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/SimWriteToGmsec.c" "${KITSRC}/gmseckit.c" ) #忽略掉的文件 message ( "GMSECFLAG=${GMSECFLAG}" ) else () # GMSECFLAG不为空， search ifneq ($(strip $(GMSECFLAG)),) in makefile endif () # Create a sources variable with a link to all cpp files to compile # set(SOURCES42 # "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/42init.c" # ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/*.c # ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Kit/Source/*.c #) SET ( EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } ) # LINK_LIBRARIES(-lpthread -lm -ldl) #add_library(rtklib SHARED ${SOURCES42}) add_executable ( 42mainexe ${ SOURCES42 } ) target_link_libraries ( 42mainexe -lpthread -lm -ldl ) #add_executable( visualizeGeometry plotTrajectory.cpp) #target_link_libraries( visualizeGeometry ${Pangolin_LIBRARIES} ) # 待确认 # LFLAGS = -L $(KITDIR)/GL/lib/ 主要思路和步骤 ¶ makefile cmakeLists 设置变量 KITDIR = $(PROJDIR)Kit/ set(KITDIR ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Kit) 设置包含路径 先将-I $(INC)赋值给CFLAGS；然后在生成.o文件的时候调用CFLAGS include_directories( ${INC} ) 添加宏定义 SHADERFLAG = -D_USE_SHADERS_ 然后gcc ${SHADERFLAG}的时候相当于 gcc编译的时候定义了宏_USE_SHADERS_ (格式gcc D宏名) | add_definitions(-D_USE_SHADERS_ )这里 USE_SHADERS `为宏 添加库 LIBS = -ldl -lm ,然后gcc的时候调用这些库 target_link_libraries(42mainexe -lm -ldl) 添加源文件 file(GLOB SOURCES42 "${SRC}/*.c" ） 去掉不必要的文件 list(REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/AppReadFromCmd.c"） 改写的时候几点注意事项： set(SRC ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source) 后面使用SRC目录下的文件的时候，需要加 / 程序里有多个main程序，需要仅保留一个。后面考虑可以添加多个执行文件 有些文件取决于特定变量 GMSECFLAG 的值，因此需要根据 GMSECFLAG 的值去除一些不编译的文件；其他的还有GUIFLAG、 vs2019下远程编译 ¶ 操作步骤见[[2-vs2019的远程linux下cmake开发]]
docs.title: 42的makefile学习及cmake改写

docs.text: CFLAGS = -Wall -Wshadow -Wno-deprecated -g $( ANSIFLAGS ) $( GLINC ) $( CINC ) -I $( INC ) -I $( KITINC ) -I $( KITSRC ) $( GMSECINC ) -O0 $( ARCHFLAG ) $( GUIFLAG ) $( SHADERFLAG ) $( CFDFLAG ) $( FFTBFLAG ) $( GSFCFLAG ) $( GMSECFLAG ) $( STANDALONEFLAG ) $( NOS3FSWFLAG ) $( GLFWFLAG ) 其中： ANSIFLAGS有两种情况： * #ANSIFLAGS = -Wstrict-prototypes -pedantic -ansi -Werror* ANSIFLAGS = CINC = INC = $(PROJDIR)Include/ KITINC = $(KITDIR)Include/ 其中： KITDIR = $(PROJDIR)Kit/ KITSRC = $(KITDIR)Source/ GMSECINC的值取决于GMSECFLAG，如果GMSECFLAG为空，则GMSECINC也为空。如果 *GMSECFLAG = -D _ENABLE_GMSEC_* ，则 GMSECINC = -I $(GMSECDIR)include/ 如果GUIFLAG为空，这时候不需要显示界面，则： GUIOBJ = GLINC = LIBS = -ldl -lm LFLAGS = ARCHFLAG = 否则： GUIOBJ = $( OBJ ) 42GlutGui.o $( OBJ ) glkit.o #GLINC = -I /usr/include/ GLINC = -I $( KITDIR ) /include/GL/ LIBS = -lglut -lGLU -lGL -ldl -lm LFLAGS = -L $( KITDIR ) /GL/lib/ ARCHFLAG = SHADERFLAG = -D _USE_SHADERS_ 因此gcc在CFLAGS调用的时候为 gcc -D _USE_SHADERS_ 含义就是gcc定义了宏 _USE_SHADERS_ ，该宏的默认值为1. see[[gcc学习#gcc -D选项]] 。推断程序里用到了 _USE_SHADERS_ 这个宏 makefile CFDFLAG = #CFDFLAG = -D _ENABLE_CFD_SLOSH_ makefile FFTBFLAG = #FFTBFLAG = -D _ENABLE_FFTB_CODE_ ```makefile #GSFCFLAG = GSFCFLAG = -D USE_GSFC_WATERMARK ``` makefile GMSECFLAG = ```makefile STANDALONEFLAG = #STANDALONEFLAG = -D AC_STANDALONE ``` makefile NOS3FSWFLAG = #NOS3FSWFLAG = -D _ENABLE_NOS3_FSW_ makefile #GLFWFLAG = GLFWFLAG = -D _USE_GLFW_
docs.title: CFLAGS

docs.text: 取决于GUIFLAG，如果 GUIFLAG = -D _USE_GUI _, 则 LFLAGS = -L $(KITDIR)/GL/lib/ 否则为空。
docs.title: LFLAGS

docs.text: 42 : $( 42OBJ ) $( GUIOBJ ) $( SIMIPCOBJ ) $( FFTBOBJ ) $( SLOSHOBJ ) $( KITOBJ ) $( ACOBJ ) $( GMSECOBJ ) $( CC ) $( LFLAGS ) $( GMSECBIN ) -o $( EXENAME ) $( 42OBJ ) $( GUIOBJ ) $( FFTBOBJ ) $( SLOSHOBJ ) $( KITOBJ ) $( ACOBJ ) $( GMSECOBJ ) $( SIMIPCOBJ ) $( LIBS ) $( GMSECLIB ) 42OBJ变量由一系列.o文件组成，见下文 GUIOBJ取决于GUIFLAG, 没有界面则为空 SIMIPCOBJ取决于GMSECFLAG，如果为空的话，则： SIMIPCOBJ = $( OBJ ) SimWriteToFile.o $( OBJ ) SimWriteToSocket.o \ $( OBJ ) SimReadFromFile.o $( OBJ ) SimReadFromSocket.o 由4个.o文件组成 FFTBOBJ取决于FFTBFLAG，后者为空的话，则前者也为空。默认为空。暂时不管 SLOSHOBJ取决于CFDFLAG，默认为空 KITOBJ KITOBJ = $( OBJ ) dcmkit.o $( OBJ ) envkit.o $( OBJ ) fswkit.o $( OBJ ) geomkit.o \ $( OBJ ) iokit.o $( OBJ ) mathkit.o $( OBJ ) nrlmsise00kit.o $( OBJ ) msis86kit.o \ $( OBJ ) orbkit.o $( OBJ ) radbeltkit.o $( OBJ ) sigkit.o $( OBJ ) sphkit.o $( OBJ ) timekit.o ACOBJ取决于STANDALONEFLAG，STANDALONEFLAG为空的话（默认），则 ACOBJ = $(OBJ)AcApp.o ，否则ACOBJ为空。 GMSECOBJ取决于GMSECFLAG，默认为空 GMSECBIN取决于GMSECFLAG，默认为空 EXENAME = 42 GMSECLIB取决于GMSECFLAG，默认为空
docs.title: 生成42可执行文件

docs.text: 42OBJ由如下.o文件组成： ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42main.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42exec.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42actuators.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42cmd.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42dynamics.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42environs.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42ephem.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42fsw.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42init.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42ipc.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42perturb.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42report.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42sensors.o ​ 42OBJ --组成→ 42nos3.o 42OBJ = $( OBJ ) 42main.o $( OBJ ) 42exec.o $( OBJ ) 42actuators.o $( OBJ ) 42cmd.o \ $( OBJ ) 42dynamics.o $( OBJ ) 42environs.o $( OBJ ) 42ephem.o $( OBJ ) 42fsw.o \ $( OBJ ) 42init.o $( OBJ ) 42ipc.o $( OBJ ) 42perturb.o $( OBJ ) 42report.o \ $( OBJ ) 42sensors.o \ $( OBJ ) 42nos3.o

OBJ = $(PROJDIR)Object/ # INC = $(PROJDIR)Include/ # SRC = $(PROJDIR)Source/ # KITINC = $(KITDIR)Include/ # KITSRC = $(KITDIR)Source/ # INOUT = $(PROJDIR)InOut/ # GSFCSRC = $(PROJDIR)/GSFC/Source/ # IPCSRC = $(SRC)IPC/ set ( GMSECFLAG NULL ) set ( GUIFLAG NULL ) # message(${GMSECFLAG}) set ( KITDIR ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Kit ) set ( OBJ ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Object ) set ( INC ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Include ) set ( SRC ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Source ) set ( KITINC ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Kit/Include ) set ( KITSRC ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /Kit/Source ) set ( INOUT ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /InOut ) set ( GSFCSRC ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /GSFC/Source ) set ( IPCSRC ${ SRC } /IPC ) include_directories ( ${ INC } ) include_directories ( "${KITINC}/" ) include_directories ( ${ KITSRC } ) message ( "KITINC=${KITINC}" ) add_definitions ( -D_USE_SHADERS_ -D_USE_GSFC_WATERMARK_ -D_USE_GLFW_ ) ## 添加源文件 file ( GLOB SOURCES42 "${SRC}/*.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/*.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Kit/Source/*.c" ) # "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/World/Downing Models/*.cpp" message ( "SOURCES42=${SOURCES42}" ) list ( REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/AppReadFromCmd.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/SimReadFromCmd.c" "${KITSRC}/texkit.c" "${KITSRC}/msis86kit.c" ) #忽略掉的文件 ## 避免出现多个main函数的情况，因此需要手动去除这些文件 set ( MULTIPLEMAIN "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Development/HeapSort.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Development/SelectMedian.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Development/ServerClient/FifoServer.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Utilities/AddAlphaToPpm.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Utilities/BuildStarCat.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Utilities/PpmToGlyph.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Utilities/Tle2Kep.c" ) list ( REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 ${ MULTIPLEMAIN } ) #忽略掉的文件 42main不用这些文件，否则会出现同个函数有重复定义的情况 # 忽略掉ACIPCOBJ if ( ${ GMSECFLAG } STREQUAL "NULL" ) # GMSECFLAG为空 set ( ACIPCOBJ "${IPCSRC}/AppReadFromFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppWriteToSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppReadFromSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppWriteToFile.c" ) else () set ( ACIPCOBJ "${IPCSRC}/AppReadFromFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppWriteToGmsec.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppReadFromGmsec.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppWriteToSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppReadFromSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/AppWriteToFile.c" ) endif () list ( REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 ${ ACIPCOBJ } ) if ( ${ GMSECFLAG } STREQUAL "NULL" ) # GMSECFLAG为空 set ( SIMIPCOBJ "${IPCSRC}/SimWriteToFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimWriteToSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimReadFromFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimReadFromSocket.c" ) else () set ( SIMIPCOBJ "${IPCSRC}/SimWriteToFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimWriteToGmsec.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimWriteToSocket.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimReadFromFile.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimReadFromGmsec.c" "${IPCSRC}/SimReadFromSocket.c" ) endif () # list(REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 ${SIMIPCOBJ}) #忽略掉的文件 42main不用这些文件，否则会出现同个函数有重复定义的情况 AcApp需要忽略的 # 如果GUIFLAG为空，则忽略掉一些源文件 if ( ${ GUIFLAG } STREQUAL "NULL" ) # GMSECFLAG为空 list ( REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 "${KITSRC}/glkit.c" "${SRC}/42GlutGui.c" "${SRC}/42glfwgui.c" ) #忽略掉的文件 42main不用这些文件，否则会 else () endif () if ( ${ GMSECFLAG } STREQUAL "NULL" ) # GMSECFLAG为空 list ( REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/SimReadFromGmsec.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/SimWriteToGmsec.c" "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/SimWriteToGmsec.c" "${KITSRC}/gmseckit.c" ) #忽略掉的文件 message ( "GMSECFLAG=${GMSECFLAG}" ) else () # GMSECFLAG不为空， search ifneq ($(strip $(GMSECFLAG)),) in makefile endif () # Create a sources variable with a link to all cpp files to compile # set(SOURCES42 # "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/42init.c" # ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/*.c # ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Kit/Source/*.c #) SET ( EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } ) # LINK_LIBRARIES(-lpthread -lm -ldl) #add_library(rtklib SHARED ${SOURCES42}) add_executable ( 42mainexe ${ SOURCES42 } ) target_link_libraries ( 42mainexe -lpthread -lm -ldl ) #add_executable( visualizeGeometry plotTrajectory.cpp) #target_link_libraries( visualizeGeometry ${Pangolin_LIBRARIES} ) # 待确认 # LFLAGS = -L $(KITDIR)/GL/lib/
docs.title: 源代码

docs.text: makefile cmakeLists 设置变量 KITDIR = $(PROJDIR)Kit/ set(KITDIR ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Kit) 设置包含路径 先将-I $(INC)赋值给CFLAGS；然后在生成.o文件的时候调用CFLAGS include_directories( ${INC} ) 添加宏定义 SHADERFLAG = -D_USE_SHADERS_ 然后gcc ${SHADERFLAG}的时候相当于 gcc编译的时候定义了宏_USE_SHADERS_ (格式gcc D宏名) | add_definitions(-D_USE_SHADERS_ )这里 USE_SHADERS `为宏 添加库 LIBS = -ldl -lm ,然后gcc的时候调用这些库 target_link_libraries(42mainexe -lm -ldl) 添加源文件 file(GLOB SOURCES42 "${SRC}/*.c" ） 去掉不必要的文件 list(REMOVE_ITEM SOURCES42 "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/IPC/AppReadFromCmd.c"） 改写的时候几点注意事项： set(SRC ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source) 后面使用SRC目录下的文件的时候，需要加 / 程序里有多个main程序，需要仅保留一个。后面考虑可以添加多个执行文件 有些文件取决于特定变量 GMSECFLAG 的值，因此需要根据 GMSECFLAG 的值去除一些不编译的文件；其他的还有GUIFLAG、

docs.text: Basalt Visual-Inertial Mapping with Non-Linear Factor Recovery ¶ 安装 ¶ 参考： https://github.com/VladyslavUsenko/basalt-mirror git clone --recursive https://gitlab.com/VladyslavUsenko/basalt.git cd basalt ./scripts/install_deps.sh mkdir build cd build cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo make -j8 install_deps.sh install_deps.sh 的作用是判断操作系统是ubunutu还是mac，如果是ubuntu则执行 install_ubuntu_deps.sh install_ubuntu_deps.sh的内容如下： #!/bin/sh sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y gcc g++ cmake git libtbb-dev libeigen3-dev libglew-dev ccache libjpeg-dev libpng-dev liblz4-dev libbz2-dev libboost-regex-dev libboost-filesystem-dev libboost-date-time-dev libboost-program-options-dev libgtest-dev libopencv-dev - cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo RelWithDebInfo 为进行执行速度最佳化，但仍然会启用 debug flag CMakeLists.txt 详细解析： ¶ cmake_minimum_required ( VERSION 3.10 ) include ( "thirdparty/basalt-headers/cmake_modules/PreProjectWorkarounds.cmake" ) project ( basalt ) set ( CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake_modules/" ${ CMAKE_MODULE_PATH } ) if ( NOT EIGEN_ROOT ) set ( EIGEN_ROOT "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/basalt-headers/thirdparty/eigen" ) endif () string ( TOLOWER "${PROJECT_NAME}" PROJECT_NAME_LOWERCASE ) find_program ( DPKG_PROGRAM dpkg DOC "dpkg program of Debian-based systems" ) if ( DPKG_PROGRAM ) execute_process ( COMMAND ${ DPKG_PROGRAM } --print-architecture OUTPUT_VARIABLE CPACK_DEBIAN_PACKAGE_ARCHITECTURE OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE ) endif ( DPKG_PROGRAM ) find_program ( LSB_RELEASE_PROGRAM lsb_release DOC "lsb_release program of Debian-based systems" ) if ( LSB_RELEASE_PROGRAM ) execute_process ( COMMAND ${ LSB_RELEASE_PROGRAM } -rs OUTPUT_VARIABLE LSB_RELEASE_ID_SHORT OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE ) if ( ${ LSB_RELEASE_ID_SHORT } EQUAL "20.04" ) set ( DEBIAN_DEPENDS "libtbb2, liblz4-1, libbz2-1.0, libboost-filesystem1.71.0, libboost-date-time1.71.0, libboost-program-options1.71.0, libboost-regex1.71.0, libopencv-dev, libglew2.1, libjpeg8, libpng16-16, librealsense2, librealsense2-dkms, librealsense2-gl, librealsense2-utils" ) elseif ( ${ LSB_RELEASE_ID_SHORT } EQUAL "18.04" ) set ( DEBIAN_DEPENDS "libtbb2, liblz4-1, libbz2-1.0, libboost-filesystem1.65.1, libboost-date-time1.65.1, libboost-program-options1.65.1, libboost-regex1.65.1, libopencv-dev, libglew2.0, libjpeg8, libpng16-16, librealsense2, librealsense2-dkms, librealsense2-gl, librealsense2-utils" ) elseif ( ${ LSB_RELEASE_ID_SHORT } EQUAL "16.04" ) set ( DEBIAN_DEPENDS "libtbb2, liblz4-1, libbz2-1.0, libboost-filesystem1.58.0, libboost-date-time1.58.0, libboost-program-options1.58.0, libboost-regex1.58.0, libopencv-dev, libglew1.13, libjpeg8, libpng12-0, libstdc++6, librealsense2, librealsense2-dkms, librealsense2-gl, librealsense2-utils" ) endif () endif ( LSB_RELEASE_PROGRAM ) string ( TIMESTAMP PROJECT_VERSION_REVISION "%Y%m%d%H%M" ) set ( CPACK_GENERATOR "DEB" ) set ( CPACK_DEBIAN_PACKAGE_MAINTAINER "Vladyslav Usenko <vlad.usenko@tum.de>" ) set ( CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_MAJOR "0" ) set ( CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_MINOR "1" ) set ( CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_PATCH "0-${PROJECT_VERSION_REVISION}~${LSB_RELEASE_ID_SHORT}" ) set ( CPACK_DEBIAN_PACKAGE_DEPENDS ${ DEBIAN_DEPENDS } ) set ( CPACK_PACKAGE_FILE_NAME "${PROJECT_NAME_LOWERCASE}_${CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_MAJOR}.${CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_MINOR}.${CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_PATCH}_${CPACK_DEBIAN_PACKAGE_ARCHITECTURE}" ) set ( CPACK_RESOURCE_FILE_LICENSE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/LICENSE" ) include ( CPack ) # Configure CCache if available if ( NOT CMAKE_C_COMPILER_LAUNCHER AND NOT CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_LAUNCHER ) find_program ( CCACHE_PROGRAM ccache ) if ( CCACHE_PROGRAM ) message ( STATUS "Found ccache: ${CCACHE_PROGRAM}" ) set ( CMAKE_C_COMPILER_LAUNCHER ${ CCACHE_PROGRAM } ) set ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_LAUNCHER ${ CCACHE_PROGRAM } ) else () message ( STATUS "Dind't find ccache" ) endif () else () message ( STATUS "Compiler launcher already set. Not configuring ccache." ) message ( STATUS "CMAKE_C_COMPILER_LAUNCHER: ${CMAKE_C_COMPILER_LAUNCHER}" ) message ( STATUS "CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_LAUNCHER: ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_LAUNCHER}" ) endif () if ( NOT CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE ) set ( CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Release ) endif () if ( NOT CXX_MARCH ) set ( CXX_MARCH native ) endif () set ( CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17 ) set ( CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON ) set ( CMAKE_CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF ) set ( CMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON ) # Flags used for CHECK_CXX_SOURCE_COMPILES set ( CMAKE_REQUIRED_FLAGS "-Wno-error" ) # save flags passed by user set ( BASALT_PASSED_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}" ) set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "-O0 -g -DEIGEN_INITIALIZE_MATRICES_BY_NAN" ) # cmake default: "-g" set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO "-O3 -g -DEIGEN_INITIALIZE_MATRICES_BY_NAN" ) # cmake default: "-O2 -g -DNDEBUG" set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "-O3 -DNDEBUG" ) # cmake default: "-O3 -DNDEBUG" set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_CIDEBUG "-O0 -DEIGEN_INITIALIZE_MATRICES_BY_NAN" ) # CI version with no debug symbols set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_CIRELWITHDEBINFO "-O3 -DEIGEN_INITIALIZE_MATRICES_BY_NAN" ) # CI version with no debug symbols # base set of compile flags set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "-Wall -Wextra -Werror -Wno-error=unused-parameter -ftemplate-backtrace-limit=0" ) # clang-specific compile flags if ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang" OR CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "AppleClang" ) set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -Wno-exceptions -fcolor-diagnostics -frelaxed-template-template-args -Wno-error=deprecated-declarations" ) if ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang" AND CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_VERSION VERSION_GREATER_EQUAL 10 ) # These are disabled to avoid lot's of warnings in Eigen code with clang 10 set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -Wno-misleading-indentation -Wno-error=deprecated-copy" ) endif () # - Added TBB_USE_GLIBCXX_VERSION macro to specify the version of GNU # libstdc++ when it cannot be properly recognized, e.g. when used # with Clang on Linux* OS. Adopted from https://github.com/wjakob/tbb if ( NOT TBB_USE_GLIBCXX_VERSION AND UNIX AND NOT APPLE ) if ( "${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" STREQUAL "Clang" ) string ( REPLACE "." "0" TBB_USE_GLIBCXX_VERSION ${ CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_VERSION } ) endif () add_definitions ( -DTBB_USE_GLIBCXX_VERSION= ${ TBB_USE_GLIBCXX_VERSION } ) endif () else () set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -Wno-error=maybe-uninitialized -Wno-error=implicit-fallthrough" ) if ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_VERSION VERSION_GREATER_EQUAL 9 ) # These are disabled to avoid lot's of warnings in Eigen code with gcc-9 set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -Wno-error=deprecated-copy" ) endif () endif () # Set platform / compiler specific compile flags and checks if ( APPLE ) # Need to investigate how to reliably detect and use OpenMP on macOS... set ( USE_OPENMP_DEFAULT OFF ) # Among others, setting CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK to LAST fixed issues # with installed Mono that contains old headers (libpng, ...). # See: https://github.com/openMVG/openMVG/issues/1349#issuecomment-401492811 set ( CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK LAST ) if ( CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION VERSION_LESS 19.0.0 ) # use brewed llvm's libc++ include_directories ( "/usr/local/opt/llvm/include/c++/v1" ) link_directories ( "/usr/local/opt/llvm/lib" ) add_compile_options ( "-nostdinc++" ) #set(STD_CXX_FS c++fs) # Workaround for cmake not to filter the manually added standard include path # See: https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/issues/19227#note_669894 list ( REMOVE_ITEM CMAKE_CXX_IMPLICIT_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "/usr/local/opt/llvm/include/c++/v1" ) endif () if ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang" ) message ( STATUS "Detected macOS with non-Apple clang" ) elseif ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "AppleClang" ) message ( STATUS "Detected macOS with Apple clang" ) # Apple clang on macOS < 10.14 Mojave is too old if ( CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION VERSION_LESS 18.0.0 ) message ( WARNING "Detected Darwin version ${CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION}, which is earlier than macos 10.14 Mojave. Apple clang is too old and not supported. Use clang from homebrew." ) endif () else () message ( WARNING "Detected macOS with unsupported compiler ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" ) endif () elseif ( UNIX ) set ( USE_OPENMP_DEFAULT ON ) # assume libstdc++ set ( STD_CXX_FS stdc++fs ) if ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang" ) set ( LINUX_CLANG 1 ) message ( STATUS "Detected Linux with clang." ) message ( WARNING "Clang on Linux is currently not fully supported. You'll likely need to get a recent version of TBB." ) elseif ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU" ) message ( STATUS "Detected Linux with gcc." ) else () message ( WARNING "Detected Linux with unsupported compiler ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" ) endif () else () message ( WARNING "Only Linux and macOS are currently supported" ) endif () # OpenMP option and compile flags option ( USE_OPENMP "Use OpenMP (e.g. for parallel computation in Eigen)" ${ USE_OPENMP_DEFAULT } ) if ( USE_OPENMP ) message ( STATUS "OpenMP Enabled" ) set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -fopenmp" ) else () message ( STATUS "OpenMP Disabled" ) endif () # setup combined compiler flags set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -march=${CXX_MARCH} ${BASALT_PASSED_CXX_FLAGS}" ) set ( EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR_HINTS ${ EIGEN_ROOT } ) find_package ( Eigen3 3.3.7 EXACT REQUIRED MODULE ) include_directories ( ${ EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR } ) message ( STATUS "Found Eigen headers in: ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR}" ) if ( NOT EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR MATCHES "^${EIGEN_ROOT}" ) message ( WARNING "Found Eigen headers are outside of specified EIGEN_ROOT '${EIGEN_ROOT}'" ) endif () find_package ( TBB REQUIRED ) include_directories ( ${ TBB_INCLUDE_DIR } ) message ( STATUS "TBB_INTERFACE_VERSION: ${TBB_INTERFACE_VERSION}" ) if ( TBB_INTERFACE_VERSION LESS 11004 ) # enable global_control header for earlier TBB versions (Ubuntu 16.04, 18.04) add_definitions ( -DTBB_PREVIEW_GLOBAL_CONTROL ) endif () find_package ( OpenCV REQUIRED core imgproc calib3d highgui ) include_directories ( ${ OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIR } ) message ( STATUS "Found OpenCV headers in: ${OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIR}" ) message ( STATUS "Found OpenCV_LIBS: ${OpenCV_LIBS}" ) add_subdirectory ( thirdparty ) include_directories ( thirdparty/basalt-headers/thirdparty/Sophus ) include_directories ( thirdparty/basalt-headers/thirdparty/cereal/include ) include_directories ( thirdparty/basalt-headers/include ) include_directories ( thirdparty/CLI11/include ) include_directories ( thirdparty/fast/include ) include_directories ( include ) add_library ( basalt SHARED src/io/dataset_io.cpp src/io/marg_data_io.cpp src/calibration/aprilgrid.cpp src/calibration/calibraiton_helper.cpp src/calibration/vignette.cpp src/utils/vio_config.cpp src/optical_flow/optical_flow.cpp src/vi_estimator/keypoint_vio.cpp src/vi_estimator/keypoint_vio_linearize.cpp src/vi_estimator/keypoint_vo.cpp src/vi_estimator/vio_estimator.cpp src/vi_estimator/ba_base.cpp src/vi_estimator/nfr_mapper.cpp src/vi_estimator/landmark_database.cpp src/utils/keypoints.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt PUBLIC ${ TBB_LIBRARIES } ${ STD_CXX_FS } ${ OpenCV_LIBS } PRIVATE rosbag apriltag opengv ) add_executable ( basalt_calibrate src/calibrate.cpp src/calibration/cam_calib.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_calibrate basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_calibrate_imu src/calibrate_imu.cpp src/calibration/cam_imu_calib.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_calibrate_imu basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_vio_sim src/vio_sim.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_vio_sim basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_mapper_sim src/mapper_sim.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_mapper_sim basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_mapper_sim_naive src/mapper_sim_naive.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_mapper_sim_naive basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_mapper src/mapper.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_mapper basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_opt_flow src/opt_flow.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_opt_flow basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_vio src/vio.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_vio basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_time_alignment src/time_alignment.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_time_alignment basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_kitti_eval src/kitti_eval.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_kitti_eval ) find_package ( realsense2 QUIET ) if ( realsense2_FOUND ) add_executable ( basalt_rs_t265_record src/rs_t265_record.cpp src/device/rs_t265.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_rs_t265_record basalt realsense2::realsense2 ${ OpenCV_LIBS } pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_rs_t265_vio src/rs_t265_vio.cpp src/device/rs_t265.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_rs_t265_vio basalt realsense2::realsense2 pangolin ) endif () install ( TARGETS basalt_calibrate basalt_calibrate_imu basalt_vio_sim basalt_mapper_sim basalt_mapper_sim_naive basalt_mapper basalt_opt_flow basalt_vio basalt_kitti_eval basalt_time_alignment basalt EXPORT BasaltTargets RUNTIME DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /bin LIBRARY DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /lib ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /lib ) if ( realsense2_FOUND ) install ( TARGETS basalt_rs_t265_record basalt_rs_t265_vio EXPORT BasaltTargets RUNTIME DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /bin LIBRARY DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /lib ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /lib ) endif () file ( GLOB SCRIPTS_TO_INSTALL "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/scripts/basalt_*.py" ) install ( PROGRAMS ${ SCRIPTS_TO_INSTALL } DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /bin ) file ( GLOB CONFIG_FILES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/data/*.json" ) install ( FILES ${ CONFIG_FILES } DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /etc/basalt ) # Replace install() to do-nothing macro. macro ( install ) endmacro () # Include subproject (or any other CMake code) with "disabled" install(). enable_testing () add_subdirectory ( thirdparty/basalt-headers/test ) add_subdirectory ( test ) # Restore original install() behavior. macro ( install ) _install ( ${ ARGN } ) endmacro ()

docs.text: cmake_minimum_required ( VERSION 3.10 ) include ( "thirdparty/basalt-headers/cmake_modules/PreProjectWorkarounds.cmake" ) project ( basalt ) set ( CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake_modules/" ${ CMAKE_MODULE_PATH } ) if ( NOT EIGEN_ROOT ) set ( EIGEN_ROOT "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/thirdparty/basalt-headers/thirdparty/eigen" ) endif () string ( TOLOWER "${PROJECT_NAME}" PROJECT_NAME_LOWERCASE ) find_program ( DPKG_PROGRAM dpkg DOC "dpkg program of Debian-based systems" ) if ( DPKG_PROGRAM ) execute_process ( COMMAND ${ DPKG_PROGRAM } --print-architecture OUTPUT_VARIABLE CPACK_DEBIAN_PACKAGE_ARCHITECTURE OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE ) endif ( DPKG_PROGRAM ) find_program ( LSB_RELEASE_PROGRAM lsb_release DOC "lsb_release program of Debian-based systems" ) if ( LSB_RELEASE_PROGRAM ) execute_process ( COMMAND ${ LSB_RELEASE_PROGRAM } -rs OUTPUT_VARIABLE LSB_RELEASE_ID_SHORT OUTPUT_STRIP_TRAILING_WHITESPACE ) if ( ${ LSB_RELEASE_ID_SHORT } EQUAL "20.04" ) set ( DEBIAN_DEPENDS "libtbb2, liblz4-1, libbz2-1.0, libboost-filesystem1.71.0, libboost-date-time1.71.0, libboost-program-options1.71.0, libboost-regex1.71.0, libopencv-dev, libglew2.1, libjpeg8, libpng16-16, librealsense2, librealsense2-dkms, librealsense2-gl, librealsense2-utils" ) elseif ( ${ LSB_RELEASE_ID_SHORT } EQUAL "18.04" ) set ( DEBIAN_DEPENDS "libtbb2, liblz4-1, libbz2-1.0, libboost-filesystem1.65.1, libboost-date-time1.65.1, libboost-program-options1.65.1, libboost-regex1.65.1, libopencv-dev, libglew2.0, libjpeg8, libpng16-16, librealsense2, librealsense2-dkms, librealsense2-gl, librealsense2-utils" ) elseif ( ${ LSB_RELEASE_ID_SHORT } EQUAL "16.04" ) set ( DEBIAN_DEPENDS "libtbb2, liblz4-1, libbz2-1.0, libboost-filesystem1.58.0, libboost-date-time1.58.0, libboost-program-options1.58.0, libboost-regex1.58.0, libopencv-dev, libglew1.13, libjpeg8, libpng12-0, libstdc++6, librealsense2, librealsense2-dkms, librealsense2-gl, librealsense2-utils" ) endif () endif ( LSB_RELEASE_PROGRAM ) string ( TIMESTAMP PROJECT_VERSION_REVISION "%Y%m%d%H%M" ) set ( CPACK_GENERATOR "DEB" ) set ( CPACK_DEBIAN_PACKAGE_MAINTAINER "Vladyslav Usenko <vlad.usenko@tum.de>" ) set ( CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_MAJOR "0" ) set ( CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_MINOR "1" ) set ( CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_PATCH "0-${PROJECT_VERSION_REVISION}~${LSB_RELEASE_ID_SHORT}" ) set ( CPACK_DEBIAN_PACKAGE_DEPENDS ${ DEBIAN_DEPENDS } ) set ( CPACK_PACKAGE_FILE_NAME "${PROJECT_NAME_LOWERCASE}_${CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_MAJOR}.${CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_MINOR}.${CPACK_PACKAGE_VERSION_PATCH}_${CPACK_DEBIAN_PACKAGE_ARCHITECTURE}" ) set ( CPACK_RESOURCE_FILE_LICENSE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/LICENSE" ) include ( CPack ) # Configure CCache if available if ( NOT CMAKE_C_COMPILER_LAUNCHER AND NOT CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_LAUNCHER ) find_program ( CCACHE_PROGRAM ccache ) if ( CCACHE_PROGRAM ) message ( STATUS "Found ccache: ${CCACHE_PROGRAM}" ) set ( CMAKE_C_COMPILER_LAUNCHER ${ CCACHE_PROGRAM } ) set ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_LAUNCHER ${ CCACHE_PROGRAM } ) else () message ( STATUS "Dind't find ccache" ) endif () else () message ( STATUS "Compiler launcher already set. Not configuring ccache." ) message ( STATUS "CMAKE_C_COMPILER_LAUNCHER: ${CMAKE_C_COMPILER_LAUNCHER}" ) message ( STATUS "CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_LAUNCHER: ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_LAUNCHER}" ) endif () if ( NOT CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE ) set ( CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Release ) endif () if ( NOT CXX_MARCH ) set ( CXX_MARCH native ) endif () set ( CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17 ) set ( CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON ) set ( CMAKE_CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF ) set ( CMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON ) # Flags used for CHECK_CXX_SOURCE_COMPILES set ( CMAKE_REQUIRED_FLAGS "-Wno-error" ) # save flags passed by user set ( BASALT_PASSED_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}" ) set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "-O0 -g -DEIGEN_INITIALIZE_MATRICES_BY_NAN" ) # cmake default: "-g" set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO "-O3 -g -DEIGEN_INITIALIZE_MATRICES_BY_NAN" ) # cmake default: "-O2 -g -DNDEBUG" set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "-O3 -DNDEBUG" ) # cmake default: "-O3 -DNDEBUG" set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_CIDEBUG "-O0 -DEIGEN_INITIALIZE_MATRICES_BY_NAN" ) # CI version with no debug symbols set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_CIRELWITHDEBINFO "-O3 -DEIGEN_INITIALIZE_MATRICES_BY_NAN" ) # CI version with no debug symbols # base set of compile flags set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "-Wall -Wextra -Werror -Wno-error=unused-parameter -ftemplate-backtrace-limit=0" ) # clang-specific compile flags if ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang" OR CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "AppleClang" ) set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -Wno-exceptions -fcolor-diagnostics -frelaxed-template-template-args -Wno-error=deprecated-declarations" ) if ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang" AND CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_VERSION VERSION_GREATER_EQUAL 10 ) # These are disabled to avoid lot's of warnings in Eigen code with clang 10 set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -Wno-misleading-indentation -Wno-error=deprecated-copy" ) endif () # - Added TBB_USE_GLIBCXX_VERSION macro to specify the version of GNU # libstdc++ when it cannot be properly recognized, e.g. when used # with Clang on Linux* OS. Adopted from https://github.com/wjakob/tbb if ( NOT TBB_USE_GLIBCXX_VERSION AND UNIX AND NOT APPLE ) if ( "${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" STREQUAL "Clang" ) string ( REPLACE "." "0" TBB_USE_GLIBCXX_VERSION ${ CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_VERSION } ) endif () add_definitions ( -DTBB_USE_GLIBCXX_VERSION= ${ TBB_USE_GLIBCXX_VERSION } ) endif () else () set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -Wno-error=maybe-uninitialized -Wno-error=implicit-fallthrough" ) if ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_VERSION VERSION_GREATER_EQUAL 9 ) # These are disabled to avoid lot's of warnings in Eigen code with gcc-9 set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -Wno-error=deprecated-copy" ) endif () endif () # Set platform / compiler specific compile flags and checks if ( APPLE ) # Need to investigate how to reliably detect and use OpenMP on macOS... set ( USE_OPENMP_DEFAULT OFF ) # Among others, setting CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK to LAST fixed issues # with installed Mono that contains old headers (libpng, ...). # See: https://github.com/openMVG/openMVG/issues/1349#issuecomment-401492811 set ( CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK LAST ) if ( CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION VERSION_LESS 19.0.0 ) # use brewed llvm's libc++ include_directories ( "/usr/local/opt/llvm/include/c++/v1" ) link_directories ( "/usr/local/opt/llvm/lib" ) add_compile_options ( "-nostdinc++" ) #set(STD_CXX_FS c++fs) # Workaround for cmake not to filter the manually added standard include path # See: https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/issues/19227#note_669894 list ( REMOVE_ITEM CMAKE_CXX_IMPLICIT_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES "/usr/local/opt/llvm/include/c++/v1" ) endif () if ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang" ) message ( STATUS "Detected macOS with non-Apple clang" ) elseif ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "AppleClang" ) message ( STATUS "Detected macOS with Apple clang" ) # Apple clang on macOS < 10.14 Mojave is too old if ( CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION VERSION_LESS 18.0.0 ) message ( WARNING "Detected Darwin version ${CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION}, which is earlier than macos 10.14 Mojave. Apple clang is too old and not supported. Use clang from homebrew." ) endif () else () message ( WARNING "Detected macOS with unsupported compiler ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" ) endif () elseif ( UNIX ) set ( USE_OPENMP_DEFAULT ON ) # assume libstdc++ set ( STD_CXX_FS stdc++fs ) if ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang" ) set ( LINUX_CLANG 1 ) message ( STATUS "Detected Linux with clang." ) message ( WARNING "Clang on Linux is currently not fully supported. You'll likely need to get a recent version of TBB." ) elseif ( CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU" ) message ( STATUS "Detected Linux with gcc." ) else () message ( WARNING "Detected Linux with unsupported compiler ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID}" ) endif () else () message ( WARNING "Only Linux and macOS are currently supported" ) endif () # OpenMP option and compile flags option ( USE_OPENMP "Use OpenMP (e.g. for parallel computation in Eigen)" ${ USE_OPENMP_DEFAULT } ) if ( USE_OPENMP ) message ( STATUS "OpenMP Enabled" ) set ( BASALT_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -fopenmp" ) else () message ( STATUS "OpenMP Disabled" ) endif () # setup combined compiler flags set ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${BASALT_CXX_FLAGS} -march=${CXX_MARCH} ${BASALT_PASSED_CXX_FLAGS}" ) set ( EIGEN_INCLUDE_DIR_HINTS ${ EIGEN_ROOT } ) find_package ( Eigen3 3.3.7 EXACT REQUIRED MODULE ) include_directories ( ${ EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR } ) message ( STATUS "Found Eigen headers in: ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR}" ) if ( NOT EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR MATCHES "^${EIGEN_ROOT}" ) message ( WARNING "Found Eigen headers are outside of specified EIGEN_ROOT '${EIGEN_ROOT}'" ) endif () find_package ( TBB REQUIRED ) include_directories ( ${ TBB_INCLUDE_DIR } ) message ( STATUS "TBB_INTERFACE_VERSION: ${TBB_INTERFACE_VERSION}" ) if ( TBB_INTERFACE_VERSION LESS 11004 ) # enable global_control header for earlier TBB versions (Ubuntu 16.04, 18.04) add_definitions ( -DTBB_PREVIEW_GLOBAL_CONTROL ) endif () find_package ( OpenCV REQUIRED core imgproc calib3d highgui ) include_directories ( ${ OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIR } ) message ( STATUS "Found OpenCV headers in: ${OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIR}" ) message ( STATUS "Found OpenCV_LIBS: ${OpenCV_LIBS}" ) add_subdirectory ( thirdparty ) include_directories ( thirdparty/basalt-headers/thirdparty/Sophus ) include_directories ( thirdparty/basalt-headers/thirdparty/cereal/include ) include_directories ( thirdparty/basalt-headers/include ) include_directories ( thirdparty/CLI11/include ) include_directories ( thirdparty/fast/include ) include_directories ( include ) add_library ( basalt SHARED src/io/dataset_io.cpp src/io/marg_data_io.cpp src/calibration/aprilgrid.cpp src/calibration/calibraiton_helper.cpp src/calibration/vignette.cpp src/utils/vio_config.cpp src/optical_flow/optical_flow.cpp src/vi_estimator/keypoint_vio.cpp src/vi_estimator/keypoint_vio_linearize.cpp src/vi_estimator/keypoint_vo.cpp src/vi_estimator/vio_estimator.cpp src/vi_estimator/ba_base.cpp src/vi_estimator/nfr_mapper.cpp src/vi_estimator/landmark_database.cpp src/utils/keypoints.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt PUBLIC ${ TBB_LIBRARIES } ${ STD_CXX_FS } ${ OpenCV_LIBS } PRIVATE rosbag apriltag opengv ) add_executable ( basalt_calibrate src/calibrate.cpp src/calibration/cam_calib.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_calibrate basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_calibrate_imu src/calibrate_imu.cpp src/calibration/cam_imu_calib.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_calibrate_imu basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_vio_sim src/vio_sim.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_vio_sim basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_mapper_sim src/mapper_sim.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_mapper_sim basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_mapper_sim_naive src/mapper_sim_naive.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_mapper_sim_naive basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_mapper src/mapper.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_mapper basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_opt_flow src/opt_flow.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_opt_flow basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_vio src/vio.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_vio basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_time_alignment src/time_alignment.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_time_alignment basalt pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_kitti_eval src/kitti_eval.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_kitti_eval ) find_package ( realsense2 QUIET ) if ( realsense2_FOUND ) add_executable ( basalt_rs_t265_record src/rs_t265_record.cpp src/device/rs_t265.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_rs_t265_record basalt realsense2::realsense2 ${ OpenCV_LIBS } pangolin ) add_executable ( basalt_rs_t265_vio src/rs_t265_vio.cpp src/device/rs_t265.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( basalt_rs_t265_vio basalt realsense2::realsense2 pangolin ) endif () install ( TARGETS basalt_calibrate basalt_calibrate_imu basalt_vio_sim basalt_mapper_sim basalt_mapper_sim_naive basalt_mapper basalt_opt_flow basalt_vio basalt_kitti_eval basalt_time_alignment basalt EXPORT BasaltTargets RUNTIME DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /bin LIBRARY DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /lib ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /lib ) if ( realsense2_FOUND ) install ( TARGETS basalt_rs_t265_record basalt_rs_t265_vio EXPORT BasaltTargets RUNTIME DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /bin LIBRARY DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /lib ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /lib ) endif () file ( GLOB SCRIPTS_TO_INSTALL "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/scripts/basalt_*.py" ) install ( PROGRAMS ${ SCRIPTS_TO_INSTALL } DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /bin ) file ( GLOB CONFIG_FILES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/data/*.json" ) install ( FILES ${ CONFIG_FILES } DESTINATION ${ CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX } /etc/basalt ) # Replace install() to do-nothing macro. macro ( install ) endmacro () # Include subproject (or any other CMake code) with "disabled" install(). enable_testing () add_subdirectory ( thirdparty/basalt-headers/test ) add_subdirectory ( test ) # Restore original install() behavior. macro ( install ) _install ( ${ ARGN } ) endmacro ()

docs.title: 升级cmake

docs.text: 需要先安装openssl ： sudo apt-get install libssl-dev 然后 cmake --version sudo apt-get remove cmake cd ~ wget https://cmake.org/files/v3.13/cmake-3.16.0.tar.gz tar xvf cmake-3.13.2.tar.gz cd cmake-3.13.2 ./bootstrap --prefix=/usr make sudo make install
docs.title: 升级cmake

docs.text: New Horizons 文献阅读 ¶ 参考资料 ¶ [[INDEX-refs#^185658|New Horizons Guidance and Control System Performance During Early Operations]] [[INDEX-refs#^185658|New Horizons Guidance and Control System Performance During Early Operations]] 阅读笔记 ¶ G&C系统作用：估计和控制姿态（自旋、三轴稳定），并进行轨迹修正（TCM） 介绍 ¶ 新视野号探测目标： Pluto-Charon系统 Kuiper belt 对2002JF56小行星进行飞越，校正仪器、测试目标跟踪软件 敏感器配置： ![[Pasted image 20210325094821.png]] 推力器 12个用于姿态控制，4个用于TCM 如果探测器丢失姿态基准和位置基准，则进入安全模式，并用于太阳敏感器用于姿态控制 事件约束：热约束、通信约束和轨迹约束 主要操作： ![[Pasted image 20210325095208.png]] 系统组成 ¶ two Galileo Avionica ASTRs, two Honeywell Miniature Inertial Measurement Units (IMUs), a single mechanically and electrically redundant custom built Adcole Sun Sensor consisting of one Fine Sun Sensor (FSS) assembly and one Sun Pulse Sensor (SPS) assembly, twelve 0.8N Aerojet MR-103H thrusters used primarily for attitude control, four 4.4N Aerojet MR-111C thrusters used exclusively for TCMs two G&C processor cards for executing the G&C flight software. 控制模式 大多数时间都是处于自旋稳定状态，在encounter和checkout activities的时候处于三轴姿态控制模式。 巡航时，自旋速率5RPM，一些场景： - 需要和DSN通信时，高增益天线HGA指向地球，指向精度0.3° - 太阳捕获时，指向太阳 - TCMS的EMEJ2000 right ascension and declination指向 - 休眠时用 - 科学观测时 三轴控制： - During 3-axis encounter and checkout activities the spacecraft can point any body axis (or instrument boresight) to any inertial vector - target a celestial body whose ephemeris is loaded into the flight software. Scans and image mosaics as well as an inertial hold mode are also available pointing options. GNC单机介绍 ¶ 执行频率 精度 姿态估计 1Hz 制导算法 1Hz 姿态控制 25Hz 星敏感器 10Hz（最大自旋速率10RPM） 三轴模式：97角秒（3sigma,每轴） 自旋模式(97角秒绕spin轴，1093角秒在spin phase angle方向) IMU 200Hz（数管以100Hz采样） Adcole太敏 25Hz LORRI成像敏感器 保持10s内的指向精度为10mrad(1sigma) 这一需求是因为要进行长曝光或者搜索小天体KBO Aerojet MR-111C C4/D4 TCM主推力器 Aerojet MR-111C F1/F2 TCM备推力器 Aerojet MR-103H thrusters 姿态控制，控制精度34mrad/s 关于星敏感器的文献： Haley, D.R., Strikwerda, T.E., and Ailinger, K.G., “Autonomous Star Tracker Development for the ew Horizons Mission.” AAS-03-607, Proceedings, AAS-AIAA Astrodynamics Specialist Conference , Big ky MT, 2003. Haley, D.R., Strikwerda, T.E., and Ailinger, K.G., “Star Tracker Scan Mode Capability for the New Horizons Mission,” Proceedings, Fifth IAA Conference on Low-cost Planetary Missions , Noordwijk NL,2003. Haley, D.R., Strikwerda, T.E., Ailinger, K.G., Casini, R. Landi, A., et al, “Autonomous Star Tracker Development for the New Horizons Mission,” AAS-05-01, *Proceedings, AAS Guidance and Control Conference, Breckenridge CO, 2005. ![[Pasted image 20210326061916.png]] TCMS的时候两个0.8N的ACS推力器工作+两个4.4N的TCM推力器工作；其余的时候在一个控制周期内最多只有两个0.8N的ACS推力器工作（受功耗约束） ![[Pasted image 20210326062105.png]] ![[Pasted image 20210326062533.png]] G&C控制算法和目标 ¶ 自旋模式：只控制自旋轴和自旋速率； 被动自旋: 地面发出指令 主动自旋：G&C发出指令，改变自旋速率或者将自旋轴（惯量主轴）指向地球、太阳或者惯性固定的RA和DEC方向（用于TCM时的休眠操作或者科学操作）。 三轴控制：相平面 指向时的速率要求 34mrad/s（每轴）， IMU的数据用2阶Butterworth低通滤波 相对控制模式？ 姿态估计：3个姿态向量+3个陀螺零偏 （Joseph形式）；如果陀螺数据不合适，则直接采用星敏，利用两个时刻的四元素得到角速度；如果没有星敏感器数据可用，则直接将四元数和角速度重置。 Early Spin Mode Operations ¶
