docs.text: gazebo tutorial 1之roslaunch ¶ ![toc] ros #gazebo #roslaunch ¶ gazebo tutorial http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=connect_ros Tutorial: Using roslaunch to start Gazebo, world files and URDF models ¶ Tutorial: Using roslaunch to start Gazebo, world files and URDF models 给出了 roslaunch 启动 gazebo_ros 的一些参数变量 首先给出demo world的启动方式，终端输入任意一个下面的命令 roslaunch gazebo_ros mud_world.launch roslaunch gazebo_ros shapes_world.launch roslaunch gazebo_ros rubble_world.launch TIPS : - 运行roslaunch会自动运行roscore - roscd gazebo_ros/launch && ls -la 可以看到所有的launch清单 [[launch#roslaunch]]和[[launch]]文件剖析 ¶ 首先 roscd gazebo_ros , 然后 sudo nano lanuch/mud_world.launch 打开 launch 文件, 内容如下： <launch> <!-- We resume the logic in empty_world.launch, changing only the name of the world to be launched --> <include file= "$(find gazebo_ros)/launch/empty_world.launch" > <arg name= "world_name" value= "worlds/mud.world" /> <!-- Note: the world_name is with respect to GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH environmental variable --> <arg name= "paused" value= "false" /> <arg name= "use_sim_time" value= "true" /> <arg name= "gui" value= "true" /> <arg name= "recording" value= "false" /> <arg name= "debug" value= "false" /> </include> </launch> 该luanch文件的解析可以参见[[launch]] world_name 变量的值未 worlds/mud.world ，关于world文件的位置，可以参考[[0-gazebo里的world]] world内容如下 <sdf version= "1.4" > <world name= "default" > <include> <uri> model://sun </uri> </include> <include> <uri> model://ground_plane </uri> </include> <include> <uri> model://double_pendulum_with_base </uri> <name> pendulum_thick_mud </name> <pose> -2.0 0 0 0 0 0 </pose> </include> ... </world> </sdf> SDF模型 ¶ gazebo用的模型为SDF模型，后缀为gazebo，详细介绍见[[2-URDF建模和SDF建模]] 出现的问题 ¶ gazebo 报错 [Err] [REST.cc:205] Error in REST request ¶ ROS:~$ sudo nano .ignition/fuel/config.yaml 将 url: https://api.ignitionfuel.org 改为 url: https://api.ignitionrobotics.org
docs.title: gazebo tutorial 1之roslaunch

docs.text: Rviz中显示urdf模型 ¶ 参考书籍ROS机器人编程实战 p159 6.2 前期准备，将第6章代码上传至树莓派 catkin_ws_pi/src/ 目录下 catkin_make 得到了两个功能包 robot_description robot_gazebo 运行下面的语句即可 roslaunch robot_description simulation.launch model:="$(rospack find robot_description)/urdf/mobile_robot.urdf" simulation.launch 内容如下： <?xml version="1.0"?> <launch> <arg name= "model" /> <arg name= "gui" default= "False" /> <param name= "robot_description" textfile= "$(arg model)" /> <param name= "use_gui" value= "$(arg gui)" /> <node name= "joint_state_publisher" pkg= "joint_state_publisher" type= "joint_state_publisher" ></node> <node name= "robot_state_publisher" pkg= "robot_state_publisher" type= "robot_state_publisher" /> <node name= "rviz" pkg= "rviz" type= "rviz" args= "-d $(find robot_description)/robot.rviz" /> </launch> <!--roslaunch robot_description simulation.launch model:="$(rospack find robot_description)/urdf/mobile_robot.urdf" --> 其中： - <param name="robot_description" textfile="$(arg model)" /> 里的 robot_description 是模型描述参数名，这个名称是固定的。 <node name="rviz" pkg="rviz" type="rviz" args="-d $(find robot_description)/robot.rviz" /> 里的 robot_description 为包名。 roslaunch robot_description arm_state_xacro.launch model:="$(rospack find robot_description)/urdf/arm_robot.xacro"
docs.title: Rviz中显示urdf模型

docs.text: URDF建模和SDF建模 ¶ [toc] UDRF建模 ¶ urdf模型格式 ¶ <?xml version='1.0'?> <robot name= "model_name" > <link name = "base_link" > <!--主link--> </link> <link name = "link1" > <!--其他link--> </link> <joint name= "base-to-link1" > <!--关节--> </joint> </robot> 最顶层的tag是 <robot> </robot> 每个部件用 <link name=""> </link> 区分 - link 下又可以分为若干个 <visual> </visual> 的小部件，这些小部件, visual 的一些常用tag origin : 描述visual坐标系相对于link坐标系的转换关系 geometry : visual部件的形状：比如sphere, box,cylinder material : visual部件的材质 <joint></joint> 用于连接不同的link 没有弄懂的 ： <origin xyz="0 0 0" rpy="1.570795 0 0" /> 旋转没有弄懂 示例1 ¶ Hands-On ROS for Robotics Programming 的第4章 <?xml version='1.0'?> <robot name= "gopigoMinimal" > <!-- Base Link --> <link name= "base_link" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> <material name= "blue" > <color rgba= "0 0.5 1 1" /> </material> </visual> <!-- Caster --> <visual name= "caster" > <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </visual> </link> <!-- Right Wheel --> <link name= "right_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" > <color rgba= "0.05 0.05 0.05 1" /> </material> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_right_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "right_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 -0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> <!-- Left Wheel --> <link name= "left_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" /> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_left_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "left_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> </robot> 简单实例 ¶ Building a Visual Robot Model with URDF from Scratch SDF建模 ¶ SDF（Simulation Description Format） 用于[[1-gazebo tutorial 1之roslaunch|gazebo]]的仿真。 在URDF建模的基础上，SDF有如下要素 - link 元素下有 <inertia> 元素 - link 元素下有 gazebo 元素用于将visual colors转换成gazebo格式，将STL文件翻译成DAE文件。而且 gazebo 标签下可以定义敏感器插件 - joint 元素下添加了 gazebo 标签用于指定摩擦、弹簧等特性，还可以添加驱动控制插件 更多资料参考 Using a URDF in Gazebo SDF模型的后缀是 gazebo SDF相关命令 ¶ roscd gazebo_basics/urdf gz sdf --print gopigo.gazebo #在终端显示模型内容 gz sdf --check gopigo.gazebo #检查模型是否完整 示例1 ¶ hands on ros 一书第5章的 gopigo.gazebo <?xml version='1.0'?> <robot name= "gopigo" > <!-- Base Link --> <link name= "base_link" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Base collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.13" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.21" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.13" /> </inertial> <!-- Caster --> <visual name= "caster" > <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Caster collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "0.5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.0001" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.0001" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.0001" /> </inertial> </link> <gazebo reference= "base_link" > <material> Gazebo/Blue </material> <pose> 0 0 3 0 0 0 </pose> </gazebo> <!-- Right Wheel --> <link name= "right_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Right Wheel collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "0.5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.01" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.005" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.005" /> </inertial> </link> <gazebo reference= "right_wheel" > <material> Gazebo/Black </material> </gazebo> <!-- Right Wheel joint --> <joint name= "joint_right_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "right_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 -0.30 0.025" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> <!-- Left Wheel --> <link name= "left_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Left Wheel collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "0.5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.01" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.005" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.005" /> </inertial> </link> <gazebo reference= "left_wheel" > <material> Gazebo/Black </material> </gazebo> <!-- Left Wheel joint --> <joint name= "joint_left_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "left_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 0.30 0.025" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> </robot> 其中 <gazebo reference= "base_link" > <material> Gazebo/Blue </material> <pose> 0 0 3 0 0 0 </pose> </gazebo> 给出了初始位姿 urdf模型检查和显示 ¶ check_urdf mobile_robot.urdf urdf_to_graphiz mobile_robot.urdf 会生成 mobile.pdf （mobile对应urdf里的名称），输入 evince mobile.pdf 会显示link和关节关系图。

docs.text: <?xml version='1.0'?> <robot name= "model_name" > <link name = "base_link" > <!--主link--> </link> <link name = "link1" > <!--其他link--> </link> <joint name= "base-to-link1" > <!--关节--> </joint> </robot> 最顶层的tag是 <robot> </robot> 每个部件用 <link name=""> </link> 区分 - link 下又可以分为若干个 <visual> </visual> 的小部件，这些小部件, visual 的一些常用tag origin : 描述visual坐标系相对于link坐标系的转换关系 geometry : visual部件的形状：比如sphere, box,cylinder material : visual部件的材质 <joint></joint> 用于连接不同的link 没有弄懂的 ： <origin xyz="0 0 0" rpy="1.570795 0 0" /> 旋转没有弄懂
docs.title: urdf模型格式

docs.text: Hands-On ROS for Robotics Programming 的第4章 <?xml version='1.0'?> <robot name= "gopigoMinimal" > <!-- Base Link --> <link name= "base_link" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> <material name= "blue" > <color rgba= "0 0.5 1 1" /> </material> </visual> <!-- Caster --> <visual name= "caster" > <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </visual> </link> <!-- Right Wheel --> <link name= "right_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" > <color rgba= "0.05 0.05 0.05 1" /> </material> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_right_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "right_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 -0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> <!-- Left Wheel --> <link name= "left_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" /> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_left_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "left_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> </robot>

docs.text: SDF（Simulation Description Format） 用于[[1-gazebo tutorial 1之roslaunch|gazebo]]的仿真。 在URDF建模的基础上，SDF有如下要素 - link 元素下有 <inertia> 元素 - link 元素下有 gazebo 元素用于将visual colors转换成gazebo格式，将STL文件翻译成DAE文件。而且 gazebo 标签下可以定义敏感器插件 - joint 元素下添加了 gazebo 标签用于指定摩擦、弹簧等特性，还可以添加驱动控制插件 更多资料参考 Using a URDF in Gazebo SDF模型的后缀是 gazebo
docs.title: SDF建模

docs.text: 2-gazebo tutorial 2之RRBot总结 ¶ 本笔记主要对官方的如下4个教程进行一个汇总和总结: - [[1-Tutorial Using a URDF in Gazebo]] - [[2-Tutorial Using Gazebo plugins with ROS]] - [[3-Tutorial ROS Control]] - [[4-Tutorial ROS Communication]] 需要下载RRBot工具包: cd ~/catkin_ws/src/ git clone https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_demos.git cd .. catkin_make 文件说明 ¶ . ├── README.md ├── gazebo_tutorials │ ├── CMakeLists.txt │ ├── launch │ │ └── hello.launch │ ├── package.xml │ ├── src │ │ └── simple_world_plugin.cpp │ └── worlds │ └── hello.world ├── rrbot_control │ ├── CMakeLists.txt │ ├── config │ │ └── rrbot_control.yaml │ ├── launch │ │ ├── rrbot_control.launch │ │ ├── rrbot_rqt.launch │ │ └── rrbot_rqt.perspective │ └── package.xml ├── rrbot_description │ ├── CMakeLists.txt │ ├── launch │ │ ├── rrbot.rviz │ │ └── rrbot_rviz.launch │ ├── meshes │ │ └── hokuyo.dae │ ├── package.xml │ └── urdf │ ├── materials.xacro │ ├── rrbot.gazebo │ ├── rrbot.xacro │ └── rrbot.xml └── rrbot_gazebo ├── CMakeLists.txt ├── launch │ └── rrbot_world.launch ├── package.xml └── worlds └── rrbot.world 首先看 robot_description ├── rrbot_description │ ├── CMakeLists.txt │ ├── launch │ │ ├── rrbot.rviz │ │ └── rrbot_rviz.launch │ ├── meshes │ │ └── hokuyo.dae │ ├── package.xml │ └── urdf │ ├── materials.xacro │ ├── rrbot.gazebo │ ├── rrbot.xacro │ └── rrbot.xml rrbot.xacro 为机器人的模型文件, 调用了 rrbot.gazebo 文件和 materials.xacro rrbot.gazebo 中的元素用于Gazebo仿真 materials.xacro 中的元素则是用于RViz显示 更详细的解读见[[1-Tutorial Using a URDF in Gazebo#^23c4ed| rrbot.xacro 文件解析]] 在Rviz中显示 ¶ 运行如下命令: roslaunch rrbot_description rrbot_rviz.launch 该launch文件中的主要原理是运行rviz包的rviz节点,调用的是 rrbot.rviz 文件, 其中该文件中的参数 robot_description 里给出了机器人的模型 rrbot.xacro ,该参数是传递给 rrbot.rviz 在Gazebo中显示 ¶ 运行如下的命令 roslaunch rrbot_gazebo rrbot_world.launch rrbot_world.launch 中的主要流程 - 将 rrbot.world 世界文件传递到 $(find gazebo_ros)/launch/empty_world.launch 中显示world - rrbot.xacro 赋值给 robot_description 参数 - 运行 spwan_model 节点生成机器人, 该机器人模型由 robot_description 给出. 运行完以后会在Gazebo显示该模型, 并会随着重力的作用运动. 在Gazebo里控制机器人运动 ¶ 首先启动仿真 roslaunch rrbot_gazebo rrbot_world.launch 然后启动控制器 roslaunch rrbot_control rrbot_control.launch 给控制器发送命令就可以控制机械臂运动了 rostopic pub -1 /rrbot/joint1_position_controller/command std_msgs/Float64 "data: 1.5" rostopic pub -1 /rrbot/joint2_position_controller/command std_msgs/Float64 "data: 1.0" 更详细的解读见[[3-Tutorial ROS Control#^ae67a5|RRBot 实践]] 添加可乐瓶并控制运动 ¶ 首先启动仿真 roslaunch rrbot_gazebo rrbot_world.launch 添加一个可乐瓶模型到场景中 rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -sdf -database coke_can -model coke_can -y 1 利用rostopic发布器,设置可乐瓶的初始状态 rosservice call /gazebo/set_model_state '{model_state: { model_name: coke_can, pose: { position: { x: 0.3, y: 0.2 ,z: 0 }, orientation: {x: 0, y: 0.491983115673, z: 0, w: 0.870604813099 } }, twist: { linear: {x: 0.0 , y: 0 ,z: 0 } , angular: { x: 0.0 , y: 0 , z: 0.0 } } , reference_frame: world } }' Gazebo会发布 model_states 和 link_states 输出模型或者模型里的link状态,因此可以查看这些状态: rostopic echo -n 1 /gazebo/model_states rostopic echo -n 1 /gazebo/link_states 利用rosservice call对rrbot模型进行设置,rrbot在初始状态和重力的作用下会运动, 踢飞可乐瓶 5 . ``` bash rosservice call /gazebo/set_model_state '{model_state: { model_name: rrbot, pose: { position: { x: 1, y: 1 ,z: 10 }, orientation: {x: 0, y: 0.491983115673, z: 0, w: 0.870604813099 } }, twist: { linear: {x: 0.0 , y: 0 ,z: 0 } , angular: { x: 0.0 , y: 0 , z: 0.0 } } , reference_frame: world } }' 可以查看可乐瓶的状态 rosservice call gazebo/get_model_state '{model_name: coke_can}' 对可乐瓶施加力矩 rosservice call /gazebo/apply_body_wrench '{body_name: "coke_can::link" , wrench: { torque: { x: 0.01, y: 0 , z: 0 } }, start_time: 10000000000, duration: 1000000000 }' 得到仿真世界和目标的属性 rosservice call gazebo/get_world_properties 删除模型 rosservice call gazebo/delete_model '{model_name: coke_can}' 详细解读见[[4-Tutorial ROS Communication]]
docs.title: 2 gazebo tutorial 2之RRBot总结

docs.text: 首先启动仿真 roslaunch rrbot_gazebo rrbot_world.launch 添加一个可乐瓶模型到场景中 rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -sdf -database coke_can -model coke_can -y 1 利用rostopic发布器,设置可乐瓶的初始状态 rosservice call /gazebo/set_model_state '{model_state: { model_name: coke_can, pose: { position: { x: 0.3, y: 0.2 ,z: 0 }, orientation: {x: 0, y: 0.491983115673, z: 0, w: 0.870604813099 } }, twist: { linear: {x: 0.0 , y: 0 ,z: 0 } , angular: { x: 0.0 , y: 0 , z: 0.0 } } , reference_frame: world } }' Gazebo会发布 model_states 和 link_states 输出模型或者模型里的link状态,因此可以查看这些状态: rostopic echo -n 1 /gazebo/model_states rostopic echo -n 1 /gazebo/link_states 利用rosservice call对rrbot模型进行设置,rrbot在初始状态和重力的作用下会运动, 踢飞可乐瓶 5 . ``` bash rosservice call /gazebo/set_model_state '{model_state: { model_name: rrbot, pose: { position: { x: 1, y: 1 ,z: 10 }, orientation: {x: 0, y: 0.491983115673, z: 0, w: 0.870604813099 } }, twist: { linear: {x: 0.0 , y: 0 ,z: 0 } , angular: { x: 0.0 , y: 0 , z: 0.0 } } , reference_frame: world } }' 可以查看可乐瓶的状态 rosservice call gazebo/get_model_state '{model_name: coke_can}' 对可乐瓶施加力矩 rosservice call /gazebo/apply_body_wrench '{body_name: "coke_can::link" , wrench: { torque: { x: 0.01, y: 0 , z: 0 } }, start_time: 10000000000, duration: 1000000000 }' 得到仿真世界和目标的属性 rosservice call gazebo/get_world_properties 删除模型 rosservice call gazebo/delete_model '{model_name: coke_can}' 详细解读见[[4-Tutorial ROS Communication]]

docs.text: 理解关节状态发布器和机器人状态发布器 ¶ 参考书籍：ROS机器人编程实践 6.4jie 操作流程 ¶ 远程连接、文件准备 下载源码 异步图书 的第6章源码 xftp登录（xshell登录：192.168.0.152:22 ubuntu/h..1...1)，利用xftp将源码传输到树莓派 ~\catkin_ws_pi\src 目录下 由于需要显示，因此利用vncview也登录进去，具体参考[[1-运行树莓派上的ROS温习#^7eb6bf]] 安装map-server和fake-localization工具包 sudo apt-get install ros-noetic-map-server sudo apt-get install ros-noetic-fake-localization tips : rosparam get /rosdistro 可以查看ros的版本 **编译工具包* cd ~ \c atkin_ws_pi catkin_make 确保 robot_description 编译成功： cd devel\lib 可以查看是否有该工具包，如果没有则需要删除build文件夹，重新编译 运行仿真 在vncview的终端运行： roslaunch robot_description arm_state_xacro.launch model:="$(rospack find robot_description)/urdf/arm_robot.xacro" 即可。 如果提示： 3ERROR: cannot launch node of type [robot_state_publisher/state_publisher]: Cannot locate node of type [state_publisher] in package [robot_state_publisher]. Make sure file exists in package path and permission is set to executable (chmod +x) 这是因为launch文件写错了。 ubuntu@ubuntu:/opt/ros/noetic/share/robot_state_publisher$ roscd robot_state_publisher ubuntu@ubuntu:/opt/ros/noetic/share/robot_state_publisher$ cd ../../lib ubuntu@ubuntu:/opt/ros/noetic/lib$ cd robot_state_publisher/ ubuntu@ubuntu:/opt/ros/noetic/lib/robot_state_publisher$ ls robot_state_publisher ubuntu@ubuntu:/opt/ros/noetic/lib/robot_state_publisher$ 将 <!--node name="robot_state_publisher" pkg="robot_state_publisher" type="state_publisher" /--> 改成 <node name="robot_state_publisher" pkg="robot_state_publisher" type="robot_state_publisher" /> 即可。
docs.title: 理解关节状态发布器和机器人状态发布器

docs.text: RotorS 安装和demo ¶ mav #ros #rotorS ¶ 安装和demo运行 ¶ 安装一些必要的包： 安装glog sudo apt install libgoogle-glog-dev 安装 gazebo_ros_pkgs 工具包 sudo apt-get install ros-melodic-gazebo-ros-pkgs ros-melodic-gazebo-ros-control 安装完的位置位于 /opt/ros/melodic/share/gazebo_ros 安装octomap 参考 sudo apt-get install ros-melodic-octomap 安装 octomap_ros cd ~/catkin_ws/src git clone https://github.com/OctoMap/octomap_ros cd .. catkin_make 安装 octomap-msgs sudo apt-get install ros-melodic-octomap-msgs -的 下载和安装rotorS，把如下的4个文件夹下载至 catkin_ws/src/rotorS 目录下 catkin_simple ethzasl_msf glog_catkin mav_comm rotors_simulator rotors_simulator_demos catkin_simple 下载地址 后面的下载地址 安装 cd ~/catkin_ws catkin_make source devel/setup 将 ~/.ignition/fuel/config.yaml 中的 api.ignitionfuel.org 替换为 fuel.ignitionrobotics.org 运行demo mdeng1985@LAPTOP-T9AM7QKA:~/catkin_ws$ roslaunch rotors_gazebo mav_hovering_example.launch 注意 ： 在wsl下，只有采用vcxsrv方式才能显示gazebo，采用mobaxterm和xming都无法正常显示。安装过程见[[6-linux远程桌面连接#^dc0292]] 再开启一个窗口运行gazebo的时候需要输入 export GAZEBO_IP=127.0.0.1 #也很关键 export DISPLAY=$(cat /etc/resolv.conf | grep nameserver | awk '{print $2}'):0 export LIBGL_ALWAYS_INDIRECT=0 # 这个很关键 export DISPLAY=127.0.0.1:0.0 奇怪的是每次需要都需要重新运行这4个命令，然后再运行roslanuch才能显示；放到bashrc里是不行的。 关于launch文件的详细解读见[[2-mav_hovering_example.launch详解]] 总结 ¶ 下次运行demo的操作如下： export GAZEBO_IP=127.0.0.1 #也很关键 export DISPLAY=$(cat /etc/resolv.conf | grep nameserver | awk '{print $2}'):0 export LIBGL_ALWAYS_INDIRECT=0 # 这个很关键 export DISPLAY=127.0.0.1:0.0 cd ~/catkin_ws source devel/setup.bash roslaunch rotors_gazebo mav_hovering_example.launch 扩展知识 ¶ 输入 rosnode list rqt_graph rosnode info gazebo 可以查看一些节点的信息 错误记录 ¶ 错误1 ¶ CMake Error at /opt/ros/melodic/share/catkin/cmake/catkinConfig.cmake:83 (find_package): Could not find a package configuration file provided by "octomap_msgs" with any of the following names: 这时候需要按照： sudo apt-get install ros-melodic-octomap-msgs ， 然后 sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get upgrade source devel/setup.bash 错误2 ¶ CMake Error at /home/mdeng1985/catkin_ws/devel/share/glog_catkin/cmake/glog_catkinConfig.cmake:173 (message): Project 'msf_core' tried to find library 'glog'. The library is neither a target nor built/installed properly. Did you compile project 'glog_catkin'? Did you find_package() it before the subdirectory containing its code is included? Call Stack (most recent call first): /opt/ros/melodic/share/catkin/cmake/catkinConfig.cmake:76 (find_package) rotorS/ethzasl_msf/msf_core/CMakeLists.txt:17 (find_package) -- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred! See also "/mnt/d/Dropbox/mdeng/WORK/MyCode/linux_wsl/CODE/catkin_ws/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeOutput.log". See also "/mnt/d/Dropbox/mdeng/WORK/MyCode/linux_wsl/CODE/catkin_ws/build/CMakeFiles/CMakeError.log". Makefile:866: recipe for target 'cmake_check_build_system' failed make: *** [cmake_check_build_system] Error 1 sudo apt install libgoogle-glog-dev 错误3 ¶ sudo apt-get install ros-melodic-gazebo-ros-pkgs ros-melodic-gazebo-ros-control gazebo_msgs 错误4 ¶ CMake Error at /opt/ros/melodic/share/catkin/cmake/catkinConfig.cmake:83 (find_package): Could not find a package configuration file provided by "octomap_ros" with any of the following names: octomap_rosConfig.cmake octomap_ros-config.cmake sudo apt-get install ros-melodic-octomap_ros 错误5 ¶ [ Err ] [ REST.cc:205 ] Error in REST request libcurl: ( 51 ) SSL: no alternative certificate subject name matches target host name 'api.ignitionfuel.org' Open ~/.ignition/fuel/config.yaml , replace api.ignitionfuel.org with fuel.ignitionrobotics.org gazebo ¶ gazebo 显示下面的内容没关系，不影响显示 shared memfd open () failed: Function not implemented shared memfd open () failed: Function not implemented ALSA lib confmisc.c:767: ( parse_card ) cannot find card '0' ALSA lib conf.c:4528: ( _snd_config_evaluate ) function snd_func_card_driver returned error: No such file or directory ALSA lib confmisc.c:392: ( snd_func_concat ) error evaluating strings ALSA lib conf.c:4528: ( _snd_config_evaluate ) function snd_func_concat returned error: No such file or directory ALSA lib confmisc.c:1246: ( snd_func_refer ) error evaluating name ALSA lib conf.c:4528: ( _snd_config_evaluate ) function snd_func_refer returned error: No such file or directory ALSA lib conf.c:5007: ( snd_config_expand ) Evaluate error: No such file or directory ALSA lib pcm.c:2495: ( snd_pcm_open_noupdate ) Unknown PCM default AL lib: ( EE ) ALCplaybackAlsa_open: Could not open playback device 'default' : No such file or directory

docs.text: mav_hovering_example.launch详解 ¶ launch文件 ¶ <launch> <arg name= "mav_name" default= "firefly" /> <arg name= "world_name" default= "basic" /> <arg name= "enable_logging" default= "false" /> <arg name= "enable_ground_truth" default= "true" /> <arg name= "log_file" default= "$(arg mav_name)" /> <arg name= "debug" default= "false" /> <arg name= "gui" default= "true" /> <arg name= "paused" default= "true" /> <!-- The following line causes gzmsg and gzerr messages to be printed to the console (even when Gazebo is started through roslaunch) --> <arg name= "verbose" default= "false" /> <env name= "GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH" value= "${GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH}:$(find rotors_gazebo)/models" /> <env name= "GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH" value= "${GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH}:$(find rotors_gazebo)/models" /> <include file= "$(find gazebo_ros)/launch/empty_world.launch" > <arg name= "world_name" value= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/worlds/$(arg world_name).world" /> <arg name= "debug" value= "$(arg debug)" /> <arg name= "paused" value= "$(arg paused)" /> <arg name= "gui" value= "$(arg gui)" /> <arg name= "verbose" value= "$(arg verbose)" /> </include> <group ns= "$(arg mav_name)" > <include file= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/launch/spawn_mav.launch" > <arg name= "mav_name" value= "$(arg mav_name)" /> <arg name= "model" value= "$(find rotors_description)/urdf/mav_generic_odometry_sensor.gazebo" /> <arg name= "enable_logging" value= "$(arg enable_logging)" /> <arg name= "enable_ground_truth" value= "$(arg enable_ground_truth)" /> <arg name= "log_file" value= "$(arg log_file)" /> </include> <node name= "lee_position_controller_node" pkg= "rotors_control" type= "lee_position_controller_node" output= "screen" > <rosparam command= "load" file= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/resource/lee_controller_$(arg mav_name).yaml" /> <rosparam command= "load" file= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/resource/$(arg mav_name).yaml" /> <remap from= "odometry" to= "odometry_sensor1/odometry" /> </node> <node name= "hovering_example" pkg= "rotors_gazebo" type= "hovering_example" output= "screen" /> <node name= "robot_state_publisher" pkg= "robot_state_publisher" type= "robot_state_publisher" /> <node name= "joint_state_publisher" pkg= "joint_state_publisher" type= "joint_state_publisher" /> </group> </launch> 结构分析 ¶ 该luanch文件可以分为如下个部分： 设置普通变量 <arg name= "mav_name" default= "firefly" /> <arg name= "world_name" default= "basic" /> <arg name= "enable_logging" default= "false" /> <arg name= "enable_ground_truth" default= "true" /> <arg name= "log_file" default= "$(arg mav_name)" /> <arg name= "debug" default= "false" /> <arg name= "gui" default= "true" /> <arg name= "paused" default= "true" /> <!-- The following line causes gzmsg and gzerr messages to be printed to the console (even when Gazebo is started through roslaunch) --> <arg name= "verbose" default= "false" /> 设置环境变量 <env name= "GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH" value= "${GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH}:$(find rotors_gazebo)/models" /> <env name= "GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH" value= "${GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH}:$(find rotors_gazebo)/models" /> ``` - 引用文件 ```xml <include file= "$(find gazebo_ros)/launch/empty_world.launch" > <arg name= "world_name" value= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/worlds/$(arg world_name).world" /> <arg name= "debug" value= "$(arg debug)" /> <arg name= "paused" value= "$(arg paused)" /> <arg name= "gui" value= "$(arg gui)" /> <arg name= "verbose" value= "$(arg verbose)" /> </include> 运行节点 <group ns= "$(arg mav_name)" > <include file= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/launch/spawn_mav.launch" > <arg name= "mav_name" value= "$(arg mav_name)" /> <arg name= "model" value= "$(find rotors_description)/urdf/mav_generic_odometry_sensor.gazebo" /> <arg name= "enable_logging" value= "$(arg enable_logging)" /> <arg name= "enable_ground_truth" value= "$(arg enable_ground_truth)" /> <arg name= "log_file" value= "$(arg log_file)" /> </include> <node name= "lee_position_controller_node" pkg= "rotors_control" type= "lee_position_controller_node" output= "screen" > <rosparam command= "load" file= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/resource/lee_controller_$(arg mav_name).yaml" /> <rosparam command= "load" file= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/resource/$(arg mav_name).yaml" /> <remap from= "odometry" to= "odometry_sensor1/odometry" /> </node> <node name= "hovering_example" pkg= "rotors_gazebo" type= "hovering_example" output= "screen" /> <node name= "robot_state_publisher" pkg= "robot_state_publisher" type= "robot_state_publisher" /> <node name= "joint_state_publisher" pkg= "joint_state_publisher" type= "joint_state_publisher" /> </group> 设置环境变量 ¶ <env name= "GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH" value= "${GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH}:$(find rotors_gazebo)/models" /> <env name= "GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH" value= "${GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH}:$(find rotors_gazebo)/models" /> ``` 主要作用就是将`rotors_gazebo`包下的模型添加到环境变量`GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH`和`GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH` （关于这两个环境变量的内容可以参考[[0-gazebo基础知识#^d51403]] ## 引用文件 ```xml <include file= "$(find gazebo_ros)/launch/empty_world.launch" > <arg name= "world_name" value= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/worlds/$(arg world_name).world" /> <arg name= "debug" value= "$(arg debug)" /> <arg name= "paused" value= "$(arg paused)" /> <arg name= "gui" value= "$(arg gui)" /> <arg name= "verbose" value= "$(arg verbose)" /> </include> 参考变量设置， empty_world.launch 里的变量内容设置如下： - world_name 变量的值为 rotors_gazebo 包里的 worlds/basic.world - debug 变量的值为false - paused 变量的值为true - gui 的值为true - verbose 的值为false 调用 spawn_mav.launch ¶ <include file= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/launch/spawn_mav.launch" > <arg name= "mav_name" value= "$(arg mav_name)" /> <arg name= "model" value= "$(find rotors_description)/urdf/mav_generic_odometry_sensor.gazebo" /> <arg name= "enable_logging" value= "$(arg enable_logging)" /> <arg name= "enable_ground_truth" value= "$(arg enable_ground_truth)" /> <arg name= "log_file" value= "$(arg log_file)" /> </include> spawn_mav.launch 内容如下： <?xml version="1.0"?> <launch> <arg name= "mav_name" default= "firefly" /> <arg name= "namespace" default= "$(arg mav_name)" /> <arg name= "model" default= "$(find rotors_description)/urdf/$(arg mav_name)_base.xacro" /> <arg name= "tf_prefix" default= "$(optenv ROS_NAMESPACE)" /> <arg name= "x" default= "0.0" /> <arg name= "y" default= "0.0" /> <arg name= "z" default= "0.1" /> <arg name= "enable_logging" default= "false" /> <arg name= "enable_ground_truth" default= "true" /> <arg name= "log_file" default= "$(arg mav_name)" /> <arg name= "wait_to_record_bag" default= "false" /> <arg name= "enable_mavlink_interface" default= "false" /> <!-- send the robot XML to param server --> <param name= "robot_description" command= " $(find xacro)/xacro '$(arg model)' enable_logging:=$(arg enable_logging) enable_ground_truth:=$(arg enable_ground_truth) enable_mavlink_interface:=$(arg enable_mavlink_interface) log_file:=$(arg log_file) wait_to_record_bag:=$(arg wait_to_record_bag) mav_name:=$(arg mav_name) namespace:=$(arg namespace)" /> <param name= "tf_prefix" type= "string" value= "$(arg tf_prefix)" /> <!-- push robot_description to factory and spawn robot in gazebo --> <node name= "spawn_$(arg namespace)" pkg= "gazebo_ros" type= "spawn_model" args= "-param robot_description -urdf -x $(arg x) -y $(arg y) -z $(arg z) -model $(arg namespace)" respawn= "false" output= "screen" > </node> </launch> 该launch文件的作用是调用 gazebo_ros 包里的 spawn_model 启动一个机器人， 具体使用可以参考[[0-Tutorial Using roslaunch to start Gazebo, world files and URDF models]]。 解读如下（不一定理解正确） 首先给出变量的定义： mav_name = firefly （等式左边为变量，右边为赋值） namespace = mav_name变量的值 = firefly model = firefly_base.xacro tf_prefix =$(optenv ROS_NAMESPACE) x =0.0 y = 0.0 z = 0.1 enable_logging = false enable_ground_truth = true log_file = mav_name变量的值 = firefly wait_to_record_bag = false enable_mavlink_interface = false 给出参数 robot_description 的定义 执行节点 spawn_model ： xml <node name="spawn_$(arg namespace)" pkg="gazebo_ros" type="spawn_model" args="-param robot_description -urdf -x $(arg x) -y $(arg y) -z $(arg z) -model $(arg namespace)" respawn="false" output="screen"> </node> 其中 -param robot_description 将前面 robot_description 参数的定义覆盖过来 model $(arg namespace)" 这个命令是给出model的别名，为namespace变量的值，也即firefly -x -y -z 后面的值为机器人在world里的坐标 运行节点 ¶ <group ns= "$(arg mav_name)" > <node name= "lee_position_controller_node" pkg= "rotors_control" type= "lee_position_controller_node" output= "screen" > <rosparam command= "load" file= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/resource/lee_controller_$(arg mav_name).yaml" /> <rosparam command= "load" file= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/resource/$(arg mav_name).yaml" /> <remap from= "odometry" to= "odometry_sensor1/odometry" /> </node> <node name= "hovering_example" pkg= "rotors_gazebo" type= "hovering_example" output= "screen" /> <node name= "robot_state_publisher" pkg= "robot_state_publisher" type= "robot_state_publisher" /> <node name= "joint_state_publisher" pkg= "joint_state_publisher" type= "joint_state_publisher" /> </group> 引用文件 ¶ 首先引用了 rotors_gazebo 包下的 spawn_mav.launch 文件，相应的变量值为： - mav_name 变量的值为 firefly - model 变量的值为 rotors_description 包下的 urdf/mav_generic_odometry_sensor.gazebo - enable_logging 变量的值为false - enable_ground_truth 变量的值为true - log_file 变量的值为firefly 运行节点 lee_position_controller_node ¶ <node name= "lee_position_controller_node" pkg= "rotors_control" type= "lee_position_controller_node" output= "screen" > <rosparam command= "load" file= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/resource/lee_controller_$(arg mav_name).yaml" /> <rosparam command= "load" file= "$(find rotors_gazebo)/resource/$(arg mav_name).yaml" /> <remap from= "odometry" to= "odometry_sensor1/odometry" /> </node> 运行的是 rotors_control 包里的 lee_position_controller_node 节点。 读取 rotors_gazebo 包下的 /resource/lee_controller_firefly.yaml 里的参数 读取 rotors_gazebo 包下的 /resource/firefly.yaml 里的参数 将 odometry 重映射为 odometry_sensor1/odometry 其他节点 ¶ <node name= "hovering_example" pkg= "rotors_gazebo" type= "hovering_example" output= "screen" /> <node name= "robot_state_publisher" pkg= "robot_state_publisher" type= "robot_state_publisher" /> <node name= "joint_state_publisher" pkg= "joint_state_publisher" type= "joint_state_publisher" /> hovering_example

docs.text: Overview ¶ 原文链接 [[gazebo学习|gazebo]] 能够通过编程或者GUI的形式载入模型用于仿真。本教程描述Gazebo的模型目录结构和模型目录中的必要文件 模型文件定义了： physical entity with dynamic, kinematic, and visual properties. 此外，模型还有插件。 The Model Database Repository ¶ 模型数据库位于 here . clone命令如下： git clone https://github.com/osrf/gazebo_models 模型数据库结构 ¶ 每个数据库有 database.config 进行描述，数据库下的每个模型有 model.config 进行描述。一个只含有 model_1 的模型数据目录如下所示： Database database.config : Meta data about the database. This is now populated automatically from CMakeLists.txt model_1 : A directory for model_1 model.config : Meta-data about model_1 model.sdf : SDF description of the model model.sdf.erb : Ruby embedded SDF model description meshes : A directory for all COLLADA and STL files [可选]描述模型的所有COLLADA 和/或 STL文件 materials : A directory which should only contain the textures and scripts subdirectories textures : A directory for image files (jpg, png, etc). scripts : A directory for OGRE material scripts plugins : [可选]用于描述模型的所有插件 Material 目录 ¶ [可选]用于描述模型的所有 textures, images, and OGRE scripts for the model. Texture images 必须放在 the textures 子目录, OGRE script files 放到 scripts 子目录。 数据库配置文件 ¶ database.config 主要包括： - license 信息 - 数据库名称 - 以及所有模型的列表。 对于本地计算机的模型，不需要数据库配置文件。数据库配置文件的格式如下: <?xml version='1.0'?> <database> <name>name_of_this_database</name> <license>Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported</license> <models> <uri>file://model_directory</uri> </models> </database> < name > The name of the database. This is used by the GUI and other tools. < license > The license for the models within the database. We highly recommend the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported license. < models > A listing of all the model URIs within the database. < uri > The URI for a model, this should be file://model_directory_name 模型配置文件 ¶ 模型配置文件 model.config 位于模型的根目录，格式如下： <?xml version="1.0"?> <model> <name>My Model Name</name> <version>1.0</version> <sdf version='1.5'>model.sdf</sdf> <author> <name>My name</name> <email>name@email.address</email> </author> <description> A description of the model </description> </model> < name > required Name of the model. < version > required Version of this model. Note: This is not the version of sdf that the model uses. That information is kept in the model.sdf file. < sdf > required The name of a SDF or URDF file that describes this model. The version attribute indicates what SDF version the file uses, and is not required for URDFs. Multiple < sdf > elements may be used in order to support multiple SDF versions. < author > required < name > required Name of the model author. < email > required Email address of the author. < description > required Description of the model should include: What the model is (e.g., robot, table, cup) What the plugins do (functionality of the model) < depend > optional All the dependencies for this model. This is typically other models. < model > optional < uri > required URI of the model dependency. < version > required Version of the model. SDF模型文件 ¶ model.sdf 用于描述模型的Simulator Description Format ，这一格式的详细信息见 SDF website . Model SDF.ERB ¶ SDF模型文件可用由 Embedded Ruby code 来生成。 Standard SDF file which can contain ruby code embedded. This option is used to programatically generate SDF files using Embedded Ruby code templates. Please note that the ruby conversion should be done manually ( erb model.sdf.erb > model.sdf ) and the final model.sdf file must be uploaded together with the model.sdf.erb (this one only for reference). Examples of sdf.erb files are available in the gazebo_models repository (some of them use the deprecated suffix .rsdf ). An easy ERB file is the flocking.world.erb which uses a simple loop.
docs.title: Overview

docs.title: SDF模型文件

docs.text: SDF模型文件可用由 Embedded Ruby code 来生成。 Standard SDF file which can contain ruby code embedded. This option is used to programatically generate SDF files using Embedded Ruby code templates. Please note that the ruby conversion should be done manually ( erb model.sdf.erb > model.sdf ) and the final model.sdf file must be uploaded together with the model.sdf.erb (this one only for reference). Examples of sdf.erb files are available in the gazebo_models repository (some of them use the deprecated suffix .rsdf ). An easy ERB file is the flocking.world.erb which uses a simple loop.
docs.title: Model SDF.ERB

docs.text: Creating the Virtual Two-Wheeled [[ROS]] Robot ¶ 书籍：hands-on ros for robotics progamming Chapter4_RViz_basics ## 编译过程中出现的问题 提示 CheckSymbolExists.c:(.text+0x1b): undefined reference to 'pthread_create 解决方案: 在CMakelists.txt里添加如下的语句即可： LINK_LIBRARIES(-pthread) 此外，编译完以后要执行 source devel/setup.bash ## 基本操作 git clone https://github.com/PacktPublishing/Hands-On-ROS-for-Robotics-Programming cp -R ~/Hands-On-ROS-for-Robotics-Programming/Chapter4_RViz_basics ~/CWorkspace/catkin_ws/src/ cd ~/CWorkspace/catkin_ws catkin_make source devel/setup.bash 然后就可以启动小车模型了： roslaunch rviz_basics gopigoMinimal_rviz.launch model:=gopigoMinimal 其中： - rviz_basics 为package名称，见 src/Chapter4_RViz_basics 里的 package.xml - gopigoMinimal 为URDF模型，在源文件目录下。 TIPS : 如果是在wsl下需要启动mobaxterm，并设置环境变量。 目录结构 ¶ 目录结构如下： mdeng1985@LAPTOP-HUFVUD3P:~/catkin_ws/src/Chapter4_RViz_basics$ tree . ├── CMakeLists.txt ├── README.md ├── launch │ ├── gopigoMinimal_rviz.launch │ └── gopigoMinimal_rviz_simple.launch ├── package.xml ├── rviz │ ├── default.rviz │ └── gopigoMinimal.rviz └── urdf └── gopigoMinimal.urdf 其中 package.xml 的内容如下： <?xml version="1.0"?> <package format= "2" > <name> rviz_basics </name> <version> 0.0.0 </version> <description> Code samples for "Chapter 3: Getting started with ROS" </description> <maintainer email= "brjapon@therobotacademy.com" > Bernardo R. Japon </maintainer> <buildtool_depend> catkin </buildtool_depend> <build_depend> rospy </build_depend> <build_export_depend> rospy </build_export_depend> <exec_depend> rospy </exec_depend> </package> gopigoMinimal.urdf 为小车模型，内容如下： <?xml version='1.0'?> <robot name= "gopigoMinimal" > <!-- Base Link --> <link name= "base_link" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> <material name= "blue" > <color rgba= "0 0.5 1 1" /> </material> </visual> <!-- Caster --> <visual name= "caster" > <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </visual> </link> <!-- Right Wheel --> <link name= "right_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" > <color rgba= "0.05 0.05 0.05 1" /> </material> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_right_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "right_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 -0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> <!-- Left Wheel --> <link name= "left_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" /> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_left_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "left_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> </robot> 具体解释参见[[2-URDF建模和SDF建模|URDF]]
docs.title: Creating the Virtual Two-Wheeled [[ROS]] Robot

docs.text: URDF建模和SDF建模 ¶ [toc] UDRF建模 ¶ 示例1 ¶ Hands-On ROS for Robotics Programming 的第4章 <?xml version='1.0'?> <robot name= "gopigoMinimal" > <!-- Base Link --> <link name= "base_link" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> <material name= "blue" > <color rgba= "0 0.5 1 1" /> </material> </visual> <!-- Caster --> <visual name= "caster" > <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </visual> </link> <!-- Right Wheel --> <link name= "right_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" > <color rgba= "0.05 0.05 0.05 1" /> </material> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_right_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "right_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 -0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> <!-- Left Wheel --> <link name= "left_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" /> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_left_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "left_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> </robot> 最顶层的tag是 <robot> </robot> 每个部件用 <link name=""> </link> 区分 - link 下又可以分为若干个 <visual> </visual> 的小部件，这些小部件, visual 的一些常用tag origin : 描述visual坐标系相对于link坐标系的转换关系 geometry : visual部件的形状：比如sphere, box,cylinder material : visual部件的材质 <joint></joint> 用于连接不同的link 没有弄懂的 ： <origin xyz="0 0 0" rpy="1.570795 0 0" /> 旋转没有弄懂 简单实例 ¶ Building a Visual Robot Model with URDF from Scratch SDF建模 ¶ SDF（Simulation Description Format） 用于[[gazebo学习|gazebo]]的仿真。 在URDF建模的基础上，SDF有如下要素 - link 元素下有 <inertia> 元素 - link 元素下有 gazebo 元素用于将visual colors转换成gazebo格式，将STL文件翻译成DAE文件。而且 gazebo 标签下可以定义敏感器插件 - joint 元素下添加了 gazebo 标签用于指定摩擦、弹簧等特性，还可以添加驱动控制插件 更多资料参考 Using a URDF in Gazebo SDF模型的后缀是 gazebo SDF相关命令 ¶ roscd gazebo_basics/urdf gz sdf --print gopigo.gazebo #在终端显示模型内容 gz sdf --check gopigo.gazebo #检查模型是否完整 示例1 ¶ hands on ros 一书第5章的 gopigo.gazebo <?xml version='1.0'?> <robot name= "gopigo" > <!-- Base Link --> <link name= "base_link" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Base collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.13" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.21" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.13" /> </inertial> <!-- Caster --> <visual name= "caster" > <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Caster collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "0.5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.0001" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.0001" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.0001" /> </inertial> </link> <gazebo reference= "base_link" > <material> Gazebo/Blue </material> <pose> 0 0 3 0 0 0 </pose> </gazebo> <!-- Right Wheel --> <link name= "right_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Right Wheel collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "0.5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.01" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.005" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.005" /> </inertial> </link> <gazebo reference= "right_wheel" > <material> Gazebo/Black </material> </gazebo> <!-- Right Wheel joint --> <joint name= "joint_right_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "right_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 -0.30 0.025" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> <!-- Left Wheel --> <link name= "left_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Left Wheel collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "0.5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.01" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.005" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.005" /> </inertial> </link> <gazebo reference= "left_wheel" > <material> Gazebo/Black </material> </gazebo> <!-- Left Wheel joint --> <joint name= "joint_left_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "left_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 0.30 0.025" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> </robot> 其中 <gazebo reference= "base_link" > <material> Gazebo/Blue </material> <pose> 0 0 3 0 0 0 </pose> </gazebo> 给出了初始位姿

docs.text: Tutorial: Using roslaunch to start Gazebo, world files and URDF models ¶ 利用 roslaunch 打开世界模型 ¶ 利用 roslaunch 打开空世界模型 roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch TIPS : 关于roslaunch启动时的传递变量见[[1-ROS常用命令#^6df690]]中的说明 启动其他demo 世界 ¶ Other demo worlds are already included in the gazebo_ros package, including: roslaunch gazebo_ros willowgarage_world.launch roslaunch gazebo_ros mud_world.launch roslaunch gazebo_ros shapes_world.launch roslaunch gazebo_ros rubble_world.launch Notice in mud_world.launch a simple jointed mechanism is launched. The launch file for mud_world.launch contains the following: <launch> <!-- We resume the logic in empty_world.launch, changing only the name of the world to be launched --> <include file="$(find gazebo_ros)/launch/empty_world.launch"> <arg name="world_name" value="worlds/mud.world"/> <!-- Note: the world_name is with respect to GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH environmental variable --> <arg name="paused" value="false"/> <arg name="use_sim_time" value="true"/> <arg name="gui" value="true"/> <arg name="recording" value="false"/> <arg name="debug" value="false"/> </include> </launch> 由此可见, mud_world.launch 里只是将 empty_world.launch 里的world模型改成了 mud.world 世界模型 ¶ mud_world.launch 场景文件里的世界模型为 mud.world ： <sdf version="1.4"> <world name="default"> <include> <uri>model://sun</uri> </include> <include> <uri>model://ground_plane</uri> </include> <include> <uri>model://double_pendulum_with_base</uri> <name>pendulum_thick_mud</name> <pose>-2.0 0 0 0 0 0</pose> </include> ... </world> </sdf> See the section below to view this full world file on your computer. 首先在本地Gazebo Model Database里搜索，如果搜索不到则自动从网上下载。更多帮助参考： Build A World tutorial. 关于世界模型的位置 ¶ ^6d297d 世界模型都存储在 GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH 路径的 /worlds 文件夹下，可以用下面的命令查看具体路径 env | grep GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH 或者 echo $grep GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH 实际上gazebo的环境变量都存储在 /usr/share/gazebo/setup.sh ，需要source一下。 创建属于自己的gazebo ros包 ¶ 包下面的子包： - 机器人模型和描述命名为 /MYROBOT_description - 用于描述世界文件和启动文件的包命名为 /MYROBOT_gazebo 文件结构如下： ../catkin_ws/src /MYROBOT_description package.xml CMakeLists.txt /urdf MYROBOT.urdf /meshes mesh1.dae mesh2.dae ... /materials /cad /MYROBOT_gazebo /launch MYROBOT.launch /worlds MYROBOT.world /models world_object1.dae world_object2.stl world_object3.urdf /materials /plugins TIPS: : catkin_create_pkg 用于创建包 创建世界模型 ¶ 创建一个ros包 MYROBOT_gazebo 在该包里创建 launch 子文件夹 在 launch 创建如下的 YOUROBOT.launch <launch> <!-- We resume the logic in empty_world.launch, changing only the name of the world to be launched --> <include file="$(find gazebo_ros)/launch/empty_world.launch"> <arg name="world_name" value="$(find MYROBOT_gazebo)/worlds/MYROBOT.world"/> <!-- more default parameters can be changed here --> </include> </launch> 在包下创建 worlds 文件夹，创建一个世界文件 MYROBOT.world <?xml version="1.0" ?> <sdf version="1.4"> <world name="default"> <include> <uri>model://ground_plane</uri> </include> <include> <uri>model://sun</uri> </include> <include> <uri>model://gas_station</uri> <name>gas_station</name> <pose>-2.0 7.0 0 0 0 0</pose> </include> </world> </sdf> 启动launch文件 . ~/catkin_ws/devel/setup.bash roslaunch MYROBOT_gazebo MYROBOT.launch Editing the World File Within Gazebo ¶ You can insert additional models into your robot's world file and use the File->Save As command to export your edited world back into your ROS package. 利用 roslaunch 产生 URDF 机器人 ¶ There are two ways to launch your URDF-based robot into Gazebo using roslaunch : ROS Service Call Spawn Method The first method keeps your robot's ROS packages more portable between computers and repository check outs. It allows you to keep your robot's location relative to a ROS package path, but also requires you to make a ROS service call using a small (python) script. Model Database Method The second method allows you to include your robot within the .world file, which seems cleaner and more convenient but requires you to add your robot to the Gazebo model database by setting an environment variable. We will go over both methods. Overall our recommended method is using the '''ROS Service Call Spawn Method''' "ROS Service Call" Robot Spawn Method ¶ 利用 gazebo_ros 包下的 spawn_model （python script）添加模型，如下： rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -file `rospack find MYROBOT_description`/urdf/MYROBOT.urdf -urdf -x 0 -y 0 -z 1 -model MYROBOT 查看 spawn_model 帮助 rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -h 我的操作 roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -file `rospack find rviz_basics`/urdf/gopigo.urdf -urdf -x 0 -y 0 -z 1 -model MYROBOTLI 可以成功导入，但是如果换成 gopigoMinimal.urdf 导入成功不显示。 从 Baxter上下载URDF ¶ 首先从Rethink Robotics's baxter_common 仓库里下载 baxter\_description 包，在 catkin_ws/src 下运行下面的命令 git clone https://github.com/RethinkRobotics/baxter_common.git You should now have a URDF file named baxter.urdf located in a within baxter_description/urdf/, and you can run: rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -file `rospack find baxter_description`/urdf/baxter.urdf -urdf -z 1 -model baxter 得到的图如下 ![[Pasted image 20210330184927.png]] 也可以直接在将其集成在launch文件中，比如 打开 MYROBOT_gazebo/launch/YOUROBOT.launch ，在 </launch> 前面添加如下的内容 <!-- Spawn a robot into Gazebo --> <node name="spawn_urdf" pkg="gazebo_ros" type="spawn_model" args="-file $(find baxter_description)/urdf/baxter.urdf -urdf -z 1 -model baxter" /> Launching this file, you should see the same results as when using rosrun . 导入XACRO 格式 ¶ If your URDF is not in XML format but rather in XACRO format, you can make a similar modification to your launch file. You can run this PR2 example by installing this package: ROS Jade: sudo apt-get install ros-jade-pr2-common Then adding this to your launch file created previously in this tutorial: <!-- Convert an xacro and put on parameter server --> <param name="robot_description" command="$(find xacro)/xacro.py $(find pr2_description)/robots/pr2.urdf.xacro" /> <!-- Spawn a robot into Gazebo --> <node name="spawn_urdf" pkg="gazebo_ros" type="spawn_model" args="-param robot_description -urdf -model pr2" /> Launching this file, you should see the PR2 in the gas station as pictured: Note: at this writing there are still a lot of errors and warnings from the console output that need to be fixed from the PR2's URDF due to Gazebo API changes. 基于模型数据库的方法 ¶ 直接在机器人模型描述在 .world 文件里，更为方便，但是同时也需要设置Gazebo模型数据库环境变量 （这是因为ROS和Gazebo是相互独立的，URDF包路径不能直接在 .world 文件里识别） 具体参考： Gazebo Model Database 在 MYROBOT_description 包下添加 model.config 文件： ../catkin_ws/src /MYROBOT_description package.xml CMakeLists.txt model.config /urdf MYROBOT.urdf /meshes mesh1.dae mesh2.dae ... /materials /plugins /cad 结构如下： /home/user/catkin_workspace/src - this is treated as the location of a Gazebo Model Database MYROBOT_description - Gazebo 模型文件夹 model.config - 配置文件，从而Gazebo可以在数据库里找到这里的模型 MYROBOT.urdf - 具体的模型文件 /meshes - 存放 .stl 或者 .dae文件 model.config配置文件 ¶ Each model must have a model.config file in the model's root directory that contains meta information about the model. Basically copy this into a model.config file, replacing MYROBOT.urdf with your file name: <?xml version="1.0"?> <model> <name>MYROBOT</name> <version>1.0</version> <sdf>urdf/MYROBOT.urdf</sdf> <author> <name>My name</name> <email>name@email.address</email> </author> <description> A description of the model </description> </model> Unlike for SDFs, no version is required for the tag when it is used for URDFs. See the Gazebo Model Database documentation for more info. 环境变量 ¶ 将 GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH 环境变量添加至"~/.bashrc"，假设工作空间为 ~/catkin_ws/ ，则： export GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH=/home/user/catkin_ws/src/ 在Gazebo里手动插入模型 ¶ Now test to see if your new Gazebo Model Database is properly configured by launching Gazebo: gazebo 在左侧点击 Insert ，看看能不能看到 我的实践没看到啥模型。 roslaunch 方法插入模型 ¶ The advantage of the model database method is that now you can include your robot directly within your world files, without using a ROS package path. We'll use the same setup from the section "Creating a world file" but modify the world file: 在 MYROBOT_description/launch 文件夹下，修改世界文件MYROBOT.world如下 <?xml version="1.0" ?> <sdf version="1.4"> <world name="default"> <include> <uri>model://ground_plane</uri> </include> <include> <uri>model://sun</uri> </include> <include> <uri>model://gas_station</uri> <name>gas_station</name> <pose>-2.0 7.0 0 0 0 0</pose> </include> <include> <uri>model://MYROBOT_description</uri> </include> </world> </sdf> 然后启动即可 roslaunch MYROBOT_gazebo MYROBOT.launch 注意 ：需要设置 GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH 环境变量。比如在launch文件里设置 <env name= "GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH" value= "${GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH}:$(find rotors_gazebo)/models" /> <env name= "GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH" value= "${GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH}:$(find rotors_gazebo)/models" /> 从 package.xml文件中输出模型路径 ¶ package.xml: <run_depend>gazebo_ros</run_depend> <export> <gazebo_ros gazebo_model_path="${prefix}/models"/> <gazebo_ros gazebo_media_path="${prefix}/models"/> </export> The '${prefix}` is something that new users might not immediately know about either, and necessary here. Also would be useful to have some info on how to debug these paths from the ROS side, e.g. that you can use rospack plugins --attrib="gazebo_media_path" gazebo_ros To check the media path that will be picked up by gazebo. 下一步 ¶ Now that you know how to create roslaunch files that open Gazebo, world files and URDF models, you are now ready to create your own Gazebo-ready URDF model in the tutorial Using A URDF In Gazebo 原网址: 访问 创建时间: 2021-03-30 17:57:47 目录: default 标签: 无

docs.text: Tutorial: Using a URDF in Gazebo ¶ Unified Robotic Description Format (URDF)为XML格式，用于在ROS中描述机器人。 Gazebo可以自动将URDF转换成SDF 背景 ¶ URDF格式 - 可以描述质点运动和动力学特性， - 不能描述机器人在世界里的pose - 不能描述oint loops (parallel linkages), and it lacks friction and other properties - 不能描述非机器人，比如光线、高程图等。 为了克服URDF格式的缺点，创建了 Simulation Description Format (SDF)格式用于Gazebo。 SDF格式描述了元素涵盖世界和机器人，格式为XML. RRBot 示例 ¶ 一般的步骤是首先在 Rviz 下测试URDF模型,然后再在Gazebo中对机器人模型进行配置. 参考: ROS URDF Tutorials . 下载 RRBot ¶ cd ~/catkin_ws/src/ git clone https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_demos.git cd .. catkin_make 其他参考： ROS Overview Tutorials . Rviz里和Gazebo里查看模型 ¶ 在Rviz下和Gazbo下查看的命令如下: roslaunch rrbot_description rrbot_rviz.launch roslaunch rrbot_gazebo rrbot_world.launch TIPS: - 可能需要安装 sudo apt install ros-melodic-joint-state-publisher-gui - 如果看不到，则试着强制关掉其他进程 killall roscore 再试试 (这个很有效) - gazebo_ros_control 教程里给出了如何利用Rviz来监视机器人利用 /joint_states 发布的状态。在本例中，Rviz里的RRbot接受虚拟的 joint_states_publisher 节点发布的 /joint_states Gazebo下的截图如下：![[Pasted image 20210331112544.png]] launch文件解析 ¶ rrbot_rviz.launch ¶ <launch> <param name= "robot_description" command= "$(find xacro)/xacro --inorder '$(find rrbot_description)/urdf/rrbot.xacro'" /> <!-- send fake joint values --> <node name= "joint_state_publisher" pkg= "joint_state_publisher" type= "joint_state_publisher" > <param name= "use_gui" value= "TRUE" /> </node> <!-- Combine joint values --> <node name= "robot_state_publisher" pkg= "robot_state_publisher" type= "robot_state_publisher" /> <!-- Show in Rviz --> <node name= "rviz" pkg= "rviz" type= "rviz" args= "-d $(find rrbot_description)/launch/rrbot.rviz" /> </launch> 主要功能见最后一个运行节点,运行rviz包的rviz节点,调用的是 rrbot.rviz 文件, 其中该文件中的参数 robot_description 里给出了机器人的模型,该参数是传递给 rrbot.rviz rrbot_world.launch ¶ 这个是Gazebo里的启动文件, 内容如下: <launch> <!-- these are the arguments you can pass this launch file, for example paused:=true --> <arg name= "paused" default= "false" /> <arg name= "use_sim_time" default= "true" /> <arg name= "gui" default= "true" /> <arg name= "headless" default= "false" /> <arg name= "debug" default= "false" /> <!-- We resume the logic in empty_world.launch, changing only the name of the world to be launched --> <include file= "$(find gazebo_ros)/launch/empty_world.launch" > <arg name= "world_name" value= "$(find rrbot_gazebo)/worlds/rrbot.world" /> <arg name= "debug" value= "$(arg debug)" /> <arg name= "gui" value= "$(arg gui)" /> <arg name= "paused" value= "$(arg paused)" /> <arg name= "use_sim_time" value= "$(arg use_sim_time)" /> <arg name= "headless" value= "$(arg headless)" /> </include> <!-- Load the URDF into the ROS Parameter Server --> <param name= "robot_description" command= "$(find xacro)/xacro --inorder '$(find rrbot_description)/urdf/rrbot.xacro'" /> <!-- Run a python script to the send a service call to gazebo_ros to spawn a URDF robot --> <node name= "urdf_spawner" pkg= "gazebo_ros" type= "spawn_model" respawn= "false" output= "screen" args= "-urdf -model rrbot -param robot_description" /> <!-- ros_control rrbot launch file --> <!--include file="$(find rrbot_control)/launch/rrbot_control.launch" /--> </launch> 其中 - 世界模型为: rrbot.world - 也就是说一个用于Gazebo, 一个用于Rviz 创建一个world的母link和joint将world和机器人连接 <link name= "world" /> <joint name= "fixed" type= "fixed" > <parent link= "world" /> <child link= "link1" /> </joint> TIPS : 如果是运动的，则不需要此操作 - 对 link1 进行定义 <link name= "link1" > <collision> <origin xyz= "0 0 ${height1/2}" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "${width} ${width} ${height1}" /> </geometry> </collision> <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 ${height1/2}" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "${width} ${width} ${height1}" /> </geometry> <material name= "orange" /> </visual> <inertial> <origin xyz= "0 0 ${height1/2}" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <mass value= "${mass}" /> <inertia ixx= "${mass / 12.0 * (width*width + height1*height1)}" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "${mass / 12.0 * (height1*height1 + width*width)}" iyz= "0.0" izz= "${mass / 12.0 * (width*width + width*width)}" /> </inertial> </link> 关于 link 的详细解读,见[[1-Tutorial Using a URDF in Gazebo#^efb6c3|xacro文件中link标签的详细解析]] - 定义 joint1 用于连接link1和link2 <joint name= "joint1" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "link1" /> <child link= "link2" /> <origin xyz= "0 ${width} ${height1 - axel_offset}" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> <dynamics damping= "0.7" /> </joint> <geometry> <box size= "0.1 0.1 0.1" /> </geometry> </collision> <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <mesh filename= "package://rrbot_description/meshes/hokuyo.dae" /> </geometry>
