docs.text: Tutorial: ROS Control ¶ 本教程利用 ros_control 工具包驱动机器人中的关节. 上一课程为: Using URDF in Gazebo 首先需要确保安装了ros_control, 安装过程见 installation instructions . Make sure you have already installed ros_control, ros_controllers, and their dependencies as described in the ros_control 介绍 ¶ We encourage you to read an overview of the documentation on ros_control before proceeding. ros_control 和 Gazebo 中的数据流 ¶ Simulating a robot's controllers in Gazebo can be accomplished using ros_control and a simple Gazebo plugin adapter. 仿真 硬件 控制器以及传动(transmissions)的大致关系如下图所示: ![[Pasted image 20210403115415.png]] 关系如下: 来自 ROS探索总结（三十一）——ros_control Controller Manager：每个机器人可能有多个controller，所以这里有一个控制器管理器的概念，提供一种通用的接口来管理不同的controller。controller manager的输入就是ROS上层应用的输出。 Controller：controller可以完成每个joint的控制，请求下层的硬件资源，并且提供了PID控制器，读取硬件资源接口中的状态，在发布控制命令。 Hardware Rescource：为上下两层提供硬件资源的接口。 RobotHW：硬件抽象层和硬件直接打交道，通过write和read方法来完成硬件的操作，这一层也包含关节限位、力矩转换、状态转换等功能。 Real Robot：实际的机器人上也需要有自己的嵌入式控制器，接收到命令后需要反映到执行器上，比如接收到位置1的命令后，那就需要让执行器快速、稳定的到达位置1。 RRBot 实践 ¶ ^ae67a5 主要步骤如下: 在URDF模型里添加传动部件(transmission elements) 在 .gazebo 里添加 gazebo_ros_control 插件 在 rrbot.xacro 里添加传动部件 ¶ 如下: <transmission name= "tran1" > <type> transmission_interface/SimpleTransmission </type> <joint name= "joint1" > <hardwareInterface> EffortJointInterface </hardwareInterface> </joint> <actuator name= "motor1" > <hardwareInterface> EffortJointInterface </hardwareInterface> <mechanicalReduction> 1 </mechanicalReduction> </actuator> </transmission> <transmission name= "tran2" > <type> transmission_interface/SimpleTransmission </type> <joint name= "joint2" > <hardwareInterface> EffortJointInterface </hardwareInterface> </joint> <actuator name= "motor2" > <hardwareInterface> EffortJointInterface </hardwareInterface> <mechanicalReduction> 1 </mechanicalReduction> </actuator> </transmission> 其中: joint name="joint1" 表明该传动部件是joint1的传动部件, transmission的标签的作用是将驱动机构和joint联系起来. <hardwareInterface> 定义在 <actuator> 和 <joint> 标签中的，它告诉gazebo_ros_control插件要加载哪些硬件接口（位置，速度或力度接口）。当前仅实现力度接口。 在 rrbot.gazebo 里添加 gazebo_ros_control 插件 ¶ 如下,添加插件可以读取 xacro 文件中的 <transmission> 标签里的内容 <gazebo> <plugin name= "gazebo_ros_control" filename= "libgazebo_ros_control.so" > <robotNamespace> /rrbot </robotNamespace> </plugin> </gazebo> In addition to the transmission tags, a Gazebo plugin needs to be added to your URDF that actually parses the transmission tags and loads the appropriate hardware interfaces and controller manager. By default the gazebo_ros_control plugin is very simple, though it is also extensible via an additional plugin architecture to allow power users to create their own custom robot hardware interfaces between ros_control and Gazebo. The default plugin XML should be added to your URDF: <gazebo> <plugin name="gazebo_ros_control" filename="libgazebo_ros_control.so"> <robotNamespace>/MYROBOT</robotNamespace> </plugin> </gazebo> gazebo_ros_control <plugin> 标签的相关选项 <robotNamespace> : The ROS namespace to be used for this instance of the plugin, defaults to robot name in URDF/SDF <controlPeriod> : The period of the controller update (in seconds), defaults to Gazebo's period <robotParam> : The location of the robot_description (URDF) on the parameter server, defaults to '/robot_description' <robotSimType> : The pluginlib name of a custom robot sim interface to be used (see below for more details), defaults to 'DefaultRobotHWSim' 创建 .yaml 配置文件 ¶ PID控制器的增益矩阵和控制器设置需要存储在yaml文件下, 用于被ros的参数服务器读取. 比如: MYROBOT_control/config/rrbot_control.yaml : rrbot : # Publish all joint states ----------------------------------- joint_state_controller : type : joint_state_controller/JointStateController publish_rate : 50 # Position Controllers --------------------------------------- joint1_position_controller : type : effort_controllers/JointPositionController joint : joint1 pid : { p : 100.0 , i : 0.01 , d : 10.0 } joint2_position_controller : type : effort_controllers/JointPositionController joint : joint2 pid : { p : 100.0 , i : 0.01 , d : 10.0 } 创建 roslaunch 启动文件 ¶ 如下所示: <launch> <!-- Load joint controller configurations from YAML file to parameter server --> <rosparam file= "$(find rrbot_control)/config/rrbot_control.yaml" command= "load" /> <!-- load the controllers --> <node name= "controller_spawner" pkg= "controller_manager" type= "spawner" respawn= "false" output= "screen" ns= "/rrbot" args= "joint1_position_controller joint2_position_controller joint_state_controller" /> <!-- convert joint states to TF transforms for rviz, etc --> <node name= "robot_state_publisher" pkg= "robot_state_publisher" type= "robot_state_publisher" respawn= "false" output= "screen" > <remap from= "/joint_states" to= "/rrbot/joint_states" /> </node> </launch> 解读 ¶ <rosparam file="$(find rrbot_control)/config/rrbot_control.yaml" command="load"/> 导入配置文件 启动controller_manager包里的节点spawner 作用是load三个控制器 joint1_position_controller joint2_position_controller joint_state_controller <!-- load the controllers --> <node name= "controller_spawner" pkg= "controller_manager" type= "spawner" respawn= "false" output= "screen" ns= "/rrbot" args= "joint1_position_controller joint2_position_controller joint_state_controller" /> 启动 robot_state _publisher , 该节点仅侦听来自 joint_state_controller 的 joint_states 消息，然后将转换发布到tf。 <!-- convert joint states to TF transforms for rviz, etc --> <node name= "robot_state_publisher" pkg= "robot_state_publisher" type= "robot_state_publisher" respawn= "false" output= "screen" > <remap from= "/joint_states" to= "/rrbot/joint_states" /> </node> 启动roslaunch ¶ 首先启动仿真 roslaunch rrbot_gazebo rrbot_world.launch 然后启动控制器 roslaunch rrbot_control rrbot_control.launch 进阶阅读 ¶ 手动发送命令 ¶ 输入如下的命令, 会发现gazebo里的机械臂关节动了 rostopic pub -1 /rrbot/joint1_position_controller/command std_msgs/Float64 "data: 1.5" rostopic pub -1 /rrbot/joint2_position_controller/command std_msgs/Float64 "data: 1.0" rostopic pub的用法: pub <topic-name> <topic-type> [data...] rostopic pub /topic_name std_msgs/String hello 没有想明白原理 下一步 ¶ Learn about ROS message and service calls that are available for use with Gazebo in the tutorial ROS Communication with Gazebo . 以下没看 ¶ Advanced: custom gazebo_ros_control Simulation Plugins ¶ The gazebo_ros_control Gazebo plugin also provides a pluginlib-based interface to implement custom interfaces between Gazebo and ros_control for simulating more complex mechanisms (nonlinear springs, linkages, etc). These plugins must inherit gazebo_ros_control::RobotHWSim which implements a simulated ros_control hardware_interface::RobotHW. RobotHWSim provides API-level access to read and command joint properties in the Gazebo simulator. The respective RobotHWSim sub-class is specified in a URDF model and is loaded when the robot model is loaded. For example, the following XML will load the default plugin (same behavior as when using no <robotSimType> tag): <gazebo> <plugin name="gazebo_ros_control" filename="libgazebo_ros_control.so"> <robotNamespace>/MYROBOT</robotNamespace> <robotSimType>gazebo_ros_control/DefaultRobotHWSim</robotSimType> </plugin> </gazebo> RRBot Example ¶ Using service calls manually ¶ If you first load the rrbot_control.yaml files to the parameter server, you could load the controllers manually through service requests. We'll include them here for reference though we usually prefer roslaunch: Load the controllers: rosservice call /rrbot/controller_manager/load_controller "name: 'joint1_position_controller'" rosservice call /rrbot/controller_manager/load_controller "name: 'joint2_position_controller'" Start the controllers: rosservice call /rrbot/controller_manager/switch_controller "{start_controllers: ['joint1_position_controller','joint2_position_controller'], stop_controllers: [], strictness: 2}" Stop the controllers: rosservice call /rrbot/controller_manager/switch_controller "{start_controllers: [], stop_controllers: ['joint1_position_controller','joint2_position_controller'], strictness: 2}" Use RQT To Send Commands ¶ In this section we'll go over tools to help you visualize the performance of your controller and tune any gains/parameters the controller might have, particularly PID gains. We'll be using RQT , ROS's plugin-based user interface, so be sure you first have that installed. Start RQT: rosrun rqt_gui rqt_gui Add a Command Publisher ¶ On the 'Plugins' menu of RQT add the 'Topics->Message Publisher' plugin then choose the topic from the drop down box that commands any particular controller that you want to publish to. For the RRBot, add the controller: /rrbot/joint1_position_controller/command Then press the green plus sign button at the top right. Enable the topic publisher by checking the check box on the left of the topic name. Set the rate column to 100 (the frequency we send it commands - 100hz in this case). Next, expand the topic so that you see the "data" row. In the expression column, on the data row, try different radian values between joint1's joint limits - in RRBot's case there are no limits because the joints are continuous, so any value works. You should be able to get the RRBot to swing around if you are doing this tutorial with that robot. Next, in that same expression box we'll have it automatically change values using a sine wave. Add the following: sin(i/100) For more advanced control, you can configure it to publish a sine wave to your robot's exact joint limits: sin(i/rate*speed)*diff + offset An explanation of variables: i - the RQT variable for time rate - the frequency that this expression is evaluated. This should be the same number as in the rate column of the topic publisher. Recommended value is 100. speed - how quick you want the join to actuate. Start off with just 1 for a slow speed upper_limit and lower_limits - the joint limits of the hardware being controlled by this controller diff = (upper_limit - lower_limit)/2 offset = upper_limit-diff Visualize the controller's performance ¶ Add a Plot plugin to RQT and add the same topic as the one you chose above for the topic publisher: /rrbot/joint1_position_controller/command/data Click the green add button. You should now see a sine wave being plotted on the screen. Add another topic to the Plot plugin that tracks the actual position of the actuator being controlled. You will want to the reduce the error between these two values by tuning the PID gains, as shown in the next step. For the RRBot: /rrbot/joint1_position_controller/state/process_value Your screen should look something like this: ![[Pasted image 20210403115439.png]] Note: the RQT plot plugin is known to have bugs after running for a while (>1min). The drawings start acting strangely. The current solution is to press the blue refresh button at the top right of the plugin. Tune the PID gains ¶ Finally, we'll use dynamic reconfigure to tune the proportional, derivative, and integral gains of the PID controller, assuming this is applicable to your robot. Add the 'Dynamic Reconfigure' plugin to RQT and click 'Expand All' to see the sub-options. Assuming your controller uses PID, you should use a "pid" option. Clicking on it should reveal 5 sliders that let you tune the controller, as pictured in the following screenshot. Adjust these values until you get the desired performance of your controller. ![[Pasted image 20210403115459.png]] Use roslaunch to save your RQT perspective ¶ A pre-configured RQT perspective for the rrbot can be easily launched with the following command: roslaunch rrbot_control rrbot_rqt.launch You can use that as a template for doing this with your own robot. Connect Rviz to Gazebo Simulation ¶ Now that you are using ros_control to send commands to your robot in simulation, you can also use the ros_control joint_state_controller to read the state of the robot from Gazebo. The idea behind a good simulator is that you should be able to use the same software on your real hardware as you do in simulation. A good starting point for that is visualizing your simulated robot in Rviz, similar to how it is done with real hardware. Assuming you are already starting a joint_state_controller as documented above in your rosparam and roslaunch files, your next step is to start Rviz: rosrun rviz rviz Under "Global Options" change your "Fixed Frame" to "world" to resolve any errors it might be giving you. Next, add a "RobotModel" display type to Rviz and you should then see your simulated robot in Gazebo being visualized in Rviz! Demo Code ¶ The example code used for the RRBot in this tutorial is available in the repository gazebo_ros_demos .
docs.title: Tutorial: ROS Control

docs.text: 首先启动仿真 roslaunch rrbot_gazebo rrbot_world.launch 然后启动控制器 roslaunch rrbot_control rrbot_control.launch
docs.title: 启动roslaunch

docs.text: 输入如下的命令, 会发现gazebo里的机械臂关节动了 rostopic pub -1 /rrbot/joint1_position_controller/command std_msgs/Float64 "data: 1.5" rostopic pub -1 /rrbot/joint2_position_controller/command std_msgs/Float64 "data: 1.0" rostopic pub的用法: pub <topic-name> <topic-type> [data...] rostopic pub /topic_name std_msgs/String hello 没有想明白原理
docs.title: 手动发送命令

docs.text: Learn about ROS message and service calls that are available for use with Gazebo in the tutorial ROS Communication with Gazebo .
docs.title: 下一步

docs.text: The gazebo_ros_control Gazebo plugin also provides a pluginlib-based interface to implement custom interfaces between Gazebo and ros_control for simulating more complex mechanisms (nonlinear springs, linkages, etc). These plugins must inherit gazebo_ros_control::RobotHWSim which implements a simulated ros_control hardware_interface::RobotHW. RobotHWSim provides API-level access to read and command joint properties in the Gazebo simulator. The respective RobotHWSim sub-class is specified in a URDF model and is loaded when the robot model is loaded. For example, the following XML will load the default plugin (same behavior as when using no <robotSimType> tag): <gazebo> <plugin name="gazebo_ros_control" filename="libgazebo_ros_control.so"> <robotNamespace>/MYROBOT</robotNamespace> <robotSimType>gazebo_ros_control/DefaultRobotHWSim</robotSimType> </plugin> </gazebo>
docs.title: Advanced: custom gazebo_ros_control Simulation Plugins

docs.text: If you first load the rrbot_control.yaml files to the parameter server, you could load the controllers manually through service requests. We'll include them here for reference though we usually prefer roslaunch: Load the controllers: rosservice call /rrbot/controller_manager/load_controller "name: 'joint1_position_controller'" rosservice call /rrbot/controller_manager/load_controller "name: 'joint2_position_controller'" Start the controllers: rosservice call /rrbot/controller_manager/switch_controller "{start_controllers: ['joint1_position_controller','joint2_position_controller'], stop_controllers: [], strictness: 2}" Stop the controllers: rosservice call /rrbot/controller_manager/switch_controller "{start_controllers: [], stop_controllers: ['joint1_position_controller','joint2_position_controller'], strictness: 2}"
docs.title: Using service calls manually

docs.text: In this section we'll go over tools to help you visualize the performance of your controller and tune any gains/parameters the controller might have, particularly PID gains. We'll be using RQT , ROS's plugin-based user interface, so be sure you first have that installed. Start RQT: rosrun rqt_gui rqt_gui
docs.title: Use RQT To Send Commands

docs.text: On the 'Plugins' menu of RQT add the 'Topics->Message Publisher' plugin then choose the topic from the drop down box that commands any particular controller that you want to publish to. For the RRBot, add the controller: /rrbot/joint1_position_controller/command Then press the green plus sign button at the top right. Enable the topic publisher by checking the check box on the left of the topic name. Set the rate column to 100 (the frequency we send it commands - 100hz in this case). Next, expand the topic so that you see the "data" row. In the expression column, on the data row, try different radian values between joint1's joint limits - in RRBot's case there are no limits because the joints are continuous, so any value works. You should be able to get the RRBot to swing around if you are doing this tutorial with that robot. Next, in that same expression box we'll have it automatically change values using a sine wave. Add the following: sin(i/100) For more advanced control, you can configure it to publish a sine wave to your robot's exact joint limits: sin(i/rate*speed)*diff + offset An explanation of variables: i - the RQT variable for time rate - the frequency that this expression is evaluated. This should be the same number as in the rate column of the topic publisher. Recommended value is 100. speed - how quick you want the join to actuate. Start off with just 1 for a slow speed upper_limit and lower_limits - the joint limits of the hardware being controlled by this controller diff = (upper_limit - lower_limit)/2 offset = upper_limit-diff
docs.title: Add a Command Publisher

docs.text: Add a Plot plugin to RQT and add the same topic as the one you chose above for the topic publisher: /rrbot/joint1_position_controller/command/data Click the green add button. You should now see a sine wave being plotted on the screen. Add another topic to the Plot plugin that tracks the actual position of the actuator being controlled. You will want to the reduce the error between these two values by tuning the PID gains, as shown in the next step. For the RRBot: /rrbot/joint1_position_controller/state/process_value Your screen should look something like this: ![[Pasted image 20210403115439.png]] Note: the RQT plot plugin is known to have bugs after running for a while (>1min). The drawings start acting strangely. The current solution is to press the blue refresh button at the top right of the plugin.
docs.title: Visualize the controller's performance

docs.text: Finally, we'll use dynamic reconfigure to tune the proportional, derivative, and integral gains of the PID controller, assuming this is applicable to your robot. Add the 'Dynamic Reconfigure' plugin to RQT and click 'Expand All' to see the sub-options. Assuming your controller uses PID, you should use a "pid" option. Clicking on it should reveal 5 sliders that let you tune the controller, as pictured in the following screenshot. Adjust these values until you get the desired performance of your controller. ![[Pasted image 20210403115459.png]]
docs.title: Tune the PID gains

docs.text: A pre-configured RQT perspective for the rrbot can be easily launched with the following command: roslaunch rrbot_control rrbot_rqt.launch You can use that as a template for doing this with your own robot.
docs.title: Use roslaunch to save your RQT perspective

docs.text: Now that you are using ros_control to send commands to your robot in simulation, you can also use the ros_control joint_state_controller to read the state of the robot from Gazebo. The idea behind a good simulator is that you should be able to use the same software on your real hardware as you do in simulation. A good starting point for that is visualizing your simulated robot in Rviz, similar to how it is done with real hardware. Assuming you are already starting a joint_state_controller as documented above in your rosparam and roslaunch files, your next step is to start Rviz: rosrun rviz rviz Under "Global Options" change your "Fixed Frame" to "world" to resolve any errors it might be giving you. Next, add a "RobotModel" display type to Rviz and you should then see your simulated robot in Gazebo being visualized in Rviz!
docs.title: Connect Rviz to Gazebo Simulation

docs.text: The example code used for the RRBot in this tutorial is available in the repository gazebo_ros_demos .
docs.title: Demo Code

docs.text: Tutorial: ROS Communication ¶ Gazebo provides a set of ROS API's that allows users to modify and get information about various aspects of the simulated world. In the following sections, we will demonstrate some of the utilities for manipulating the simulation world and objects. The complete list of ROS messages and services for gazebo can be found here also. 前期准备 ¶ 首先需要安装了RRBot示范例程, 见 Using URDF in Gazebo . 确保安装了Gazebo roscore & rosrun gazebo_ros gazebo 相关术语 ¶ 状态包括位置和姿态 一个对象具有固有属性,比如质量和摩擦系数等 Gazebo中的model就是通过joints将一些body连接在依靠 In the following context, the pose and twist of a rigid body object is referred to as its '''state''. An object also has intrinsic '''properties''', such as mass and friction coefficients. In Gazebo, a '''body''' refers to a rigid body, synonymous to '''link''' in the URDF context. A Gazebo '''model''' is a conglomeration of bodies connected by '''joints'''. gazebo_ros_api_plugin 插件 ¶ gazebo_ros_api_plugin 位于 gazebo_ros 工具包内, 用于对gazebo节点初始化. 该插件只和 gzserver 一起加载. 它将ROS回调调度程序（消息传递）与Gazebo的内部调度程序集成在一起，以提供以下所述的ROS接口。该ROS API使用户可以在ROS上操纵仿真环境的属性，以及在环境中生成和反思模型的状态。 关于 gazebo_ros_paths_plugin 插件 ¶ 该 gazebo_ros_paths_plugin 同样位于 gazebo_ros 工具包内, 用于允许Gazebo查找ROS资源, 也即解析ROS软件包路径名. 该插件和 gzserver and gzclient 一起加载. Gazebo 发布的参数 ¶ 参数： /use_sim_time ： Bool -通知ROS将 /clock 发布的话题用于ROS时间。 Gazebo uses the ROS parameter server to notify other applications, particularly Rviz, if simulation time should be used via the /use_sim_time parameter. This should be set automatically by Gazebo as true when you start gazebo_ros /use_sim_time is true if gazebo_ros is publishing to the ROS /clock topic in order to provide a ROS system with simulation-synchronized time. For more info on simulation time, see ROS C++ Time . 查看参数值 ¶ 查看参数 rosparam get /use_sim_time Gazebo 订阅的话题 ¶ 话题 ~/set_link_state : gazebo_msgs/LinkState - Sets the state (pose/twist) of a link. ~/set_model_state : gazebo_msgs/ModelState - Sets the state (pose/twist) of a model. 通过话题设置模型位置和姿态 ¶ 主题 可用于快速设置模型的姿势和扭曲，而无需等待姿势设置操作完成。为此，将所需的 模型状态消息 发布到主题。例如，要通过主题测试姿势设置，可通过从在线数据库中生成新模型来向模拟中添加可乐罐： /gazebo/set_model_state Topics 可用于快速设置模型的姿势和扭曲，而无需等待姿势设置操作完成。 首先可以发布一个 model state message 到 /gazebo/set_model_state 话题中. 比如,添加一个coke到仿真场景中, 然后通过发布话题的方式设置coke的位置 rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -sdf -database coke_can -model coke_can -y 1 rostopic pub -r 20 /gazebo/set_model_state gazebo_msgs/ModelState '{model_name: coke_can, pose: { position: { x: 1, y: 0, z: 2 }, orientation: {x: 0, y: 0.491983115673, z: 0, w: 0.870604813099 } }, twist: { linear: { x: 0, y: 0, z: 0 }, angular: { x: 0, y: 0, z: 0} }, reference_frame: world }' You should see the coke can hovering in front of the RRBot, just asking to be hit (we'll get there). Gazebo 发布的话题 ¶ /clock : rosgraph_msgs/Clock - 发布仿真时间, 和 /use_sim_time 参数一起使用 ~/link_states : gazebo_msgs/LinkStates - 发布所有link在仿真时的状态 ~/model_states : gazebo_msgs/ModelStates - 发布模型在仿真时的状态 利用话题查看模型和link状态 ¶ Gazebo发布的 /gazebo/link_states and /gazebo/model_states 话题包含又对象在gazebo世界坐标系的位置和姿态. 可以利用如下的命令进行查看: rostopic echo -n 1 /gazebo/model_states rostopic echo -n 1 /gazebo/link_states 重申一下，“链接”被定义为具有给定惯性，视觉和碰撞属性的刚体。而“模型”定义为链接和关节的集合。“”模型”的状态是其规范“”链接””的状态。假定URDF强制采用树结构，则模型的规范链接由其根链接定义。 服务：在仿真中创建和销毁模型 ¶ 下面的services可以用于产生或者销毁模型 ~/spawn_urdf_model : gazebo_msgs/SpawnModel - Use this service to spawn a Universal Robotic Description Format (URDF) ~/spawn_sdf_model : gazebo_msgs/SpawnModel - Use this service to spawn a model written in Gazebo Simulation Description Format (SDF) ~/delete_model : gazebo_msgs/DeleteModel - This service allows the user to delete a model from simulation. Spawn Model 用法 ¶ 相关教程: Using roslaunch Files to Spawn Models A helper script called spawn_model is provided for calling the model spawning services offered by gazebo_ros . The most practical method for spawning a model using the service call method is with a roslaunch file. Details are provided in the tutorial. There are many ways to use spawn_model to add URDFs and SDFs to Gazebo. The following are a few of the examples: Spawn a URDF from file - first convert .xacro file to .xml then spawn: rosrun xacro xacro `rospack find rrbot_description`/urdf/rrbot.xacro >> `rospack find rrbot_description`/urdf/rrbot.xml rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -file `rospack find rrbot_description`/urdf/rrbot.xml -urdf -y 1 -model rrbot1 -robot_namespace rrbot1 URDF from parameter server using roslaunch and xacro: See Using roslaunch Files to Spawn Models SDF from local model database: rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -file `echo $GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH`/coke_can/model.sdf -sdf -model coke_can1 -y 0.2 -x -0.3 SDF from the online model database: rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -database coke_can -sdf -model coke_can3 -y 2.2 -x -0.3 To see all of the available arguments for spawn_model including namespaces, trimesh properties, joint positions and RPY orientation run: rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -h TIPS : spwan_mode的用法 mdeng1985@LAPTOP-T9AM7QKA:~/catkin_ws$ rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -h usage: spawn_model [ -h ] ( -urdf | -sdf ) ( -file FILE_NAME | -param PARAM_NAME | -database MODEL_NAME | -stdin ) -model MODEL_NAME [ -reference_frame REFERENCE_FRAME ] [ -gazebo_namespace GAZEBO_NAMESPACE ] [ -robot_namespace ROBOT_NAMESPACE ] [ -unpause ] [ -wait MODEL_NAME ] [ -x X ] [ -y Y ] [ -z Z ] [ -R R ] [ -P P ] [ -Y Y ] [ -J JOINT_NAME JOINT_POSITION ] [ -package_to_model ] [ -b ] Spawn a model in gazebo using the ROS API optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -urdf Incoming xml is in urdf format -sdf Incoming xml is in sdf format -file FILE_NAME Load model xml from file -param PARAM_NAME Load model xml from ROS parameter -database MODEL_NAME Load model XML from specified model in Gazebo Model Database -stdin Load model from stdin -model MODEL_NAME Name of model to spawn -reference_frame REFERENCE_FRAME Name of the model/body where initial pose is defined. If left empty or specified as "world" , gazebo world frame is used -gazebo_namespace GAZEBO_NAMESPACE ROS namespace of gazebo offered ROS interfaces. Defaults to /gazebo/ -robot_namespace ROBOT_NAMESPACE change ROS namespace of gazebo-plugins -unpause !!!Experimental!!! unpause physics after spawning model -wait MODEL_NAME !!!Experimental!!! wait for model to exist -x X x component of initial position, meters -y Y y component of initial position, meters -z Z z component of initial position, meters -R R roll angle of initial orientation, radians -P P pitch angle of initial orientation, radians -Y Y yaw angle of initial orientation, radians -J JOINT_NAME JOINT_POSITION initialize the specified joint at the specified position -package_to_model convert urdf <mesh filename = "package://..." to <mesh filename = "model://..." -b bond to gazebo and delete the model when this program is interrupted mdeng1985@LAPTOP-T9AM7QKA:~/catkin_ws$ 删除模型 ¶ Deleting models that are already in Gazebo is easier as long as you know the model name you gave the object. If you spawned a rrbot named "rrbot1" as described in the previous section, you can remove it with: rosservice call gazebo/delete_model '{model_name: rrbot1}' 服务: 设置状态和属性 ¶ These services allow the user to set state and property information about simulation and objects in simulation: ~/set_link_properties : gazebo_msgs/SetLinkProperties ~/set_physics_properties : gazebo_msgs/SetPhysicsProperties ~/set_model_state : gazebo_msgs/SetModelState ~/set_model_configuration : gazebo_msgs/SetModelConfiguration - This service allows the user to set model joint positions without invoking dynamics. ~/set_joint_properties : gazebo_msgs/SetJointProperties` ~/set_link_state : gazebo_msgs/SetLinkState ~/set_link_state : gazebo_msgs/LinkState ~/set_model_state : gazebo_msgs/ModelState 示例 ¶ 添加一个coke_can1模型 rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -sdf -database coke_can -model coke_can1 -y 1 设置coke_can1的状态 rosservice call /gazebo/set_model_state '{model_state: { model_name: coke_can, pose: { position: { x: 0.3, y: 0.2 ,z: 0 }, orientation: {x: 0, y: 0.491983115673, z: 0, w: 0.870604813099 } }, twist: { linear: {x: 0.0 , y: 0 ,z: 0 } , angular: { x: 0.0 , y: 0 , z: 0.0 } } , reference_frame: world } }' 驱动rrbot踢飞coke_can1 rosservice call /gazebo/set_model_state '{model_state: { model_name: rrbot, pose: { position: { x: 1, y: 1 ,z: 10 }, orientation: {x: 0, y: 0.491983115673, z: 0, w: 0.870604813099 } }, twist: { linear: {x: 0.0 , y: 0 ,z: 0 } , angular: { x: 0.0 , y: 0 , z: 0.0 } } , reference_frame: world } }' 服务: 获取状态和属性 ¶ ~/get_model_properties : gazebo_msgs/GetModelProperties - This service returns the properties of a model in simulation. ~/get_model_state : gazebo_msgs/GetModelState - This service returns the states of a model in simulation. ~/get_world_properties : gazebo_msgs/GetWorldProperties - This service returns the properties of the simulation world. ~/get_joint_properties : gazebo_msgs/GetJointProperties - This service returns the properties of a joint in simulation. ~/get_link_properties : gazebo_msgs/GetLinkProperties - This service returns the properties of a link in simulation. ~/get_link_state : gazebo_msgs/GetLinkState - This service returns the states of a link in simulation. ~/get_physics_properties : gazebo_msgs/GetPhysicsProperties - This service returns the properties of the physics engine used in simulation. ~/link_states : gazebo_msgs/LinkStates - Publish complete link states in world frame ~/model_states : gazebo_msgs/ModelStates - Publish complete model states in world frame 注意 ¶ link_names are in gazebo scoped name notation, [model_name::body_name] 获取模型状态示例 ¶ 要得到刚才踢走的可乐瓶状态 rosservice call gazebo/get_model_state '{model_name: coke_can}' 可以得到类似如下的信息 pose: position: x: -10.3172263825 y: -1.95098702647 z: -0.00413857755159 orientation: x: -0.0218349987011 y: -0.00515029763403 z: 0.545795377598 w: 0.83761811887 twist: linear: x: -0.000385525262354 y: -0.000344915539911 z: -0.00206406538336 angular: x: -0.104256200218 y: 0.0370371098566 z: 0.0132837766211 success: True 得到仿真世界和目标的属性 ¶ You can get a list of models (ground_plane, coke cane, rrbot) in the world by running: rosservice call gazebo/get_world_properties sim_time: 1013.366 model_names: ['ground_plane', 'rrbot', 'coke_can'] rendering_enabled: True success: True status_message: GetWorldProperties: got properties and retrieve details of a specific model by rosservice call gazebo/get_model_properties '{model_name: rrbot}' parent_model_name: '' canonical_body_name: '' body_names: ['link1', 'link2', 'link3'] geom_names: ['link1_geom', 'link2_geom', 'link3_geom', 'link3_geom_camera_link', 'link3_geom_hokuyo_link'] joint_names: ['fixed', 'joint1', 'joint2'] child_model_names: [] is_static: False success: True status_message: GetModelProperties: got properties 服务: 力控制 ¶ ~/apply_body_wrench : gazebo_msgs/ApplyBodyWrench - Apply wrench to a body in simulation. All active wrenches applied to the same body are cumulative. ~/apply_joint_effort : gazebo_msgs/ApplyJointEffort - Apply effort to a joint in simulation. All active efforts applied to the same joint are cumulative. ~/clear_joint_forces : gazebo_msgs/JointRequest - Clear applied efforts to a joint. ~/clear_body_wrenches : gazebo_msgs/ClearBodyWrenches - Clear applied wrench to a body. 对link施加力矩 ¶ 首先把前面的可乐对象删除了 rosservice call gazebo/delete_model '{model_name: coke_can}' rosservice call gazebo/delete_model '{model_name: coke_can1}' 添加新的可乐对象 rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -sdf -database coke_can -model coke_can -y 1 给o /gazebo/set_physics_properties 发送一个服务, 关闭引力 rosservice call /gazebo/set_physics_properties " time_step: 0.001 max_update_rate: 1000.0 gravity: x: 0.0 y: 0.0 z: 0.0 ode_config: auto_disable_bodies: False sor_pgs_precon_iters: 0 sor_pgs_iters: 50 sor_pgs_w: 1.3 sor_pgs_rms_error_tol: 0.0 contact_surface_layer: 0.001 contact_max_correcting_vel: 100.0 cfm: 0.0 erp: 0.2 max_contacts: 20" 调用 /gazebo/apply_body_wrench 服务,给可乐施加0.01 Nm的扭矩，持续1秒钟，您将看到可乐罐沿x轴正方向旋转： rosservice call /gazebo/apply_body_wrench '{body_name: "coke_can::link" , wrench: { torque: { x: 0.01, y: 0 , z: 0 } }, start_time: 10000000000, duration: 1000000000 }' 施加负向力矩 清除力矩 rosservice call /gazebo/clear_body_wrenches '{body_name: "coke_can::link"}' 对关节施加力矩 ¶ Call /gazebo/apply_joint_effort to apply torque to the joint rosservice call /gazebo/apply_joint_effort "joint_name: 'joint2' effort: 10.0 start_time: secs: 0 nsecs: 0 duration: secs: 10 nsecs: 0" 清除力矩: rosservice call /gazebo/clear_joint_forces '{joint_name: joint2}' 服务: 仿真控制 ¶ These services allow the user to pause and unpause physics in simulation: ~/pause_physics : std_srvs/Empty - Pause physics updates. ~/unpause_physics : std_srvs/Empty - Resume physics updates. ~/reset_simulation : std_srvs/Empty - Resets the entire simulation including the time ~/reset_world : std_srvs/Empty - Resets the model's poses 暂停仿真 ¶ Say you want to get a good screenshot of your soda can flying in the air. You can pause the physics engine by calling: rosservice call gazebo/pause_physics When simulation is paused, simulation time is stopped and objects become static. However, Gazebo's internal update loop (such as custom dynamic plugin updates) are still running, but given that the simulation time is not changing, anything throttled by simulation time will not update. To resume simulation, unpause the physic engine by calling: rosservice call gazebo/unpause_physics 下一步 ¶ Learn how to create custom ROS plugins for Gazebo .
docs.title: Tutorial: ROS Communication

docs.text: 话题 ~/set_link_state : gazebo_msgs/LinkState - Sets the state (pose/twist) of a link. ~/set_model_state : gazebo_msgs/ModelState - Sets the state (pose/twist) of a model.
docs.title: Gazebo 订阅的话题

docs.text: 主题 可用于快速设置模型的姿势和扭曲，而无需等待姿势设置操作完成。为此，将所需的 模型状态消息 发布到主题。例如，要通过主题测试姿势设置，可通过从在线数据库中生成新模型来向模拟中添加可乐罐： /gazebo/set_model_state Topics 可用于快速设置模型的姿势和扭曲，而无需等待姿势设置操作完成。 首先可以发布一个 model state message 到 /gazebo/set_model_state 话题中. 比如,添加一个coke到仿真场景中, 然后通过发布话题的方式设置coke的位置 rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -sdf -database coke_can -model coke_can -y 1 rostopic pub -r 20 /gazebo/set_model_state gazebo_msgs/ModelState '{model_name: coke_can, pose: { position: { x: 1, y: 0, z: 2 }, orientation: {x: 0, y: 0.491983115673, z: 0, w: 0.870604813099 } }, twist: { linear: { x: 0, y: 0, z: 0 }, angular: { x: 0, y: 0, z: 0} }, reference_frame: world }' You should see the coke can hovering in front of the RRBot, just asking to be hit (we'll get there).
docs.title: 通过话题设置模型位置和姿态

docs.text: /clock : rosgraph_msgs/Clock - 发布仿真时间, 和 /use_sim_time 参数一起使用 ~/link_states : gazebo_msgs/LinkStates - 发布所有link在仿真时的状态 ~/model_states : gazebo_msgs/ModelStates - 发布模型在仿真时的状态
docs.title: Gazebo 发布的话题

docs.text: Gazebo发布的 /gazebo/link_states and /gazebo/model_states 话题包含又对象在gazebo世界坐标系的位置和姿态. 可以利用如下的命令进行查看: rostopic echo -n 1 /gazebo/model_states rostopic echo -n 1 /gazebo/link_states 重申一下，“链接”被定义为具有给定惯性，视觉和碰撞属性的刚体。而“模型”定义为链接和关节的集合。“”模型”的状态是其规范“”链接””的状态。假定URDF强制采用树结构，则模型的规范链接由其根链接定义。
docs.title: 利用话题查看模型和link状态

docs.text: 下面的services可以用于产生或者销毁模型 ~/spawn_urdf_model : gazebo_msgs/SpawnModel - Use this service to spawn a Universal Robotic Description Format (URDF) ~/spawn_sdf_model : gazebo_msgs/SpawnModel - Use this service to spawn a model written in Gazebo Simulation Description Format (SDF) ~/delete_model : gazebo_msgs/DeleteModel - This service allows the user to delete a model from simulation.
docs.title: 服务：在仿真中创建和销毁模型

docs.text: 相关教程: Using roslaunch Files to Spawn Models A helper script called spawn_model is provided for calling the model spawning services offered by gazebo_ros . The most practical method for spawning a model using the service call method is with a roslaunch file. Details are provided in the tutorial. There are many ways to use spawn_model to add URDFs and SDFs to Gazebo. The following are a few of the examples: Spawn a URDF from file - first convert .xacro file to .xml then spawn: rosrun xacro xacro `rospack find rrbot_description`/urdf/rrbot.xacro >> `rospack find rrbot_description`/urdf/rrbot.xml rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -file `rospack find rrbot_description`/urdf/rrbot.xml -urdf -y 1 -model rrbot1 -robot_namespace rrbot1 URDF from parameter server using roslaunch and xacro: See Using roslaunch Files to Spawn Models SDF from local model database: rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -file `echo $GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH`/coke_can/model.sdf -sdf -model coke_can1 -y 0.2 -x -0.3 SDF from the online model database: rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -database coke_can -sdf -model coke_can3 -y 2.2 -x -0.3 To see all of the available arguments for spawn_model including namespaces, trimesh properties, joint positions and RPY orientation run: rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -h TIPS : spwan_mode的用法 mdeng1985@LAPTOP-T9AM7QKA:~/catkin_ws$ rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -h usage: spawn_model [ -h ] ( -urdf | -sdf ) ( -file FILE_NAME | -param PARAM_NAME | -database MODEL_NAME | -stdin ) -model MODEL_NAME [ -reference_frame REFERENCE_FRAME ] [ -gazebo_namespace GAZEBO_NAMESPACE ] [ -robot_namespace ROBOT_NAMESPACE ] [ -unpause ] [ -wait MODEL_NAME ] [ -x X ] [ -y Y ] [ -z Z ] [ -R R ] [ -P P ] [ -Y Y ] [ -J JOINT_NAME JOINT_POSITION ] [ -package_to_model ] [ -b ] Spawn a model in gazebo using the ROS API optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit -urdf Incoming xml is in urdf format -sdf Incoming xml is in sdf format -file FILE_NAME Load model xml from file -param PARAM_NAME Load model xml from ROS parameter -database MODEL_NAME Load model XML from specified model in Gazebo Model Database -stdin Load model from stdin -model MODEL_NAME Name of model to spawn -reference_frame REFERENCE_FRAME Name of the model/body where initial pose is defined. If left empty or specified as "world" , gazebo world frame is used -gazebo_namespace GAZEBO_NAMESPACE ROS namespace of gazebo offered ROS interfaces. Defaults to /gazebo/ -robot_namespace ROBOT_NAMESPACE change ROS namespace of gazebo-plugins -unpause !!!Experimental!!! unpause physics after spawning model -wait MODEL_NAME !!!Experimental!!! wait for model to exist -x X x component of initial position, meters -y Y y component of initial position, meters -z Z z component of initial position, meters -R R roll angle of initial orientation, radians -P P pitch angle of initial orientation, radians -Y Y yaw angle of initial orientation, radians -J JOINT_NAME JOINT_POSITION initialize the specified joint at the specified position -package_to_model convert urdf <mesh filename = "package://..." to <mesh filename = "model://..." -b bond to gazebo and delete the model when this program is interrupted mdeng1985@LAPTOP-T9AM7QKA:~/catkin_ws$
docs.title: Spawn Model 用法

docs.text: Deleting models that are already in Gazebo is easier as long as you know the model name you gave the object. If you spawned a rrbot named "rrbot1" as described in the previous section, you can remove it with: rosservice call gazebo/delete_model '{model_name: rrbot1}'
docs.title: 删除模型

docs.text: These services allow the user to set state and property information about simulation and objects in simulation: ~/set_link_properties : gazebo_msgs/SetLinkProperties ~/set_physics_properties : gazebo_msgs/SetPhysicsProperties ~/set_model_state : gazebo_msgs/SetModelState ~/set_model_configuration : gazebo_msgs/SetModelConfiguration - This service allows the user to set model joint positions without invoking dynamics. ~/set_joint_properties : gazebo_msgs/SetJointProperties` ~/set_link_state : gazebo_msgs/SetLinkState ~/set_link_state : gazebo_msgs/LinkState ~/set_model_state : gazebo_msgs/ModelState
docs.title: 服务: 设置状态和属性

docs.text: 添加一个coke_can1模型 rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -sdf -database coke_can -model coke_can1 -y 1 设置coke_can1的状态 rosservice call /gazebo/set_model_state '{model_state: { model_name: coke_can, pose: { position: { x: 0.3, y: 0.2 ,z: 0 }, orientation: {x: 0, y: 0.491983115673, z: 0, w: 0.870604813099 } }, twist: { linear: {x: 0.0 , y: 0 ,z: 0 } , angular: { x: 0.0 , y: 0 , z: 0.0 } } , reference_frame: world } }' 驱动rrbot踢飞coke_can1 rosservice call /gazebo/set_model_state '{model_state: { model_name: rrbot, pose: { position: { x: 1, y: 1 ,z: 10 }, orientation: {x: 0, y: 0.491983115673, z: 0, w: 0.870604813099 } }, twist: { linear: {x: 0.0 , y: 0 ,z: 0 } , angular: { x: 0.0 , y: 0 , z: 0.0 } } , reference_frame: world } }'
docs.title: 示例

docs.text: ~/get_model_properties : gazebo_msgs/GetModelProperties - This service returns the properties of a model in simulation. ~/get_model_state : gazebo_msgs/GetModelState - This service returns the states of a model in simulation. ~/get_world_properties : gazebo_msgs/GetWorldProperties - This service returns the properties of the simulation world. ~/get_joint_properties : gazebo_msgs/GetJointProperties - This service returns the properties of a joint in simulation. ~/get_link_properties : gazebo_msgs/GetLinkProperties - This service returns the properties of a link in simulation. ~/get_link_state : gazebo_msgs/GetLinkState - This service returns the states of a link in simulation. ~/get_physics_properties : gazebo_msgs/GetPhysicsProperties - This service returns the properties of the physics engine used in simulation. ~/link_states : gazebo_msgs/LinkStates - Publish complete link states in world frame ~/model_states : gazebo_msgs/ModelStates - Publish complete model states in world frame
docs.title: 服务: 获取状态和属性

docs.text: link_names are in gazebo scoped name notation, [model_name::body_name]
docs.title: 注意

docs.text: You can get a list of models (ground_plane, coke cane, rrbot) in the world by running: rosservice call gazebo/get_world_properties sim_time: 1013.366 model_names: ['ground_plane', 'rrbot', 'coke_can'] rendering_enabled: True success: True status_message: GetWorldProperties: got properties and retrieve details of a specific model by rosservice call gazebo/get_model_properties '{model_name: rrbot}' parent_model_name: '' canonical_body_name: '' body_names: ['link1', 'link2', 'link3'] geom_names: ['link1_geom', 'link2_geom', 'link3_geom', 'link3_geom_camera_link', 'link3_geom_hokuyo_link'] joint_names: ['fixed', 'joint1', 'joint2'] child_model_names: [] is_static: False success: True status_message: GetModelProperties: got properties
docs.title: 得到仿真世界和目标的属性

docs.text: ~/apply_body_wrench : gazebo_msgs/ApplyBodyWrench - Apply wrench to a body in simulation. All active wrenches applied to the same body are cumulative. ~/apply_joint_effort : gazebo_msgs/ApplyJointEffort - Apply effort to a joint in simulation. All active efforts applied to the same joint are cumulative. ~/clear_joint_forces : gazebo_msgs/JointRequest - Clear applied efforts to a joint. ~/clear_body_wrenches : gazebo_msgs/ClearBodyWrenches - Clear applied wrench to a body.
docs.title: 服务: 力控制

docs.text: 首先把前面的可乐对象删除了 rosservice call gazebo/delete_model '{model_name: coke_can}' rosservice call gazebo/delete_model '{model_name: coke_can1}' 添加新的可乐对象 rosrun gazebo_ros spawn_model -sdf -database coke_can -model coke_can -y 1 给o /gazebo/set_physics_properties 发送一个服务, 关闭引力 rosservice call /gazebo/set_physics_properties " time_step: 0.001 max_update_rate: 1000.0 gravity: x: 0.0 y: 0.0 z: 0.0 ode_config: auto_disable_bodies: False sor_pgs_precon_iters: 0 sor_pgs_iters: 50 sor_pgs_w: 1.3 sor_pgs_rms_error_tol: 0.0 contact_surface_layer: 0.001 contact_max_correcting_vel: 100.0 cfm: 0.0 erp: 0.2 max_contacts: 20" 调用 /gazebo/apply_body_wrench 服务,给可乐施加0.01 Nm的扭矩，持续1秒钟，您将看到可乐罐沿x轴正方向旋转： rosservice call /gazebo/apply_body_wrench '{body_name: "coke_can::link" , wrench: { torque: { x: 0.01, y: 0 , z: 0 } }, start_time: 10000000000, duration: 1000000000 }' 施加负向力矩 清除力矩 rosservice call /gazebo/clear_body_wrenches '{body_name: "coke_can::link"}'
docs.title: 对link施加力矩

docs.text: Call /gazebo/apply_joint_effort to apply torque to the joint rosservice call /gazebo/apply_joint_effort "joint_name: 'joint2' effort: 10.0 start_time: secs: 0 nsecs: 0 duration: secs: 10 nsecs: 0" 清除力矩: rosservice call /gazebo/clear_joint_forces '{joint_name: joint2}'
docs.title: 对关节施加力矩

docs.text: These services allow the user to pause and unpause physics in simulation: ~/pause_physics : std_srvs/Empty - Pause physics updates. ~/unpause_physics : std_srvs/Empty - Resume physics updates. ~/reset_simulation : std_srvs/Empty - Resets the entire simulation including the time ~/reset_world : std_srvs/Empty - Resets the model's poses
docs.title: 服务: 仿真控制

docs.text: Say you want to get a good screenshot of your soda can flying in the air. You can pause the physics engine by calling: rosservice call gazebo/pause_physics When simulation is paused, simulation time is stopped and objects become static. However, Gazebo's internal update loop (such as custom dynamic plugin updates) are still running, but given that the simulation time is not changing, anything throttled by simulation time will not update. To resume simulation, unpause the physic engine by calling: rosservice call gazebo/unpause_physics
docs.title: 暂停仿真

docs.text: Learn how to create custom ROS plugins for Gazebo .
docs.title: 下一步

docs.text: Overview ¶ 原文链接 [[1-gazebo tutorial 1之roslaunch|gazebo]] 能够通过编程或者GUI的形式载入模型用于仿真。本教程描述Gazebo的模型目录结构和模型目录中的必要文件 模型文件定义了： physical entity with dynamic, kinematic, and visual properties. 此外，模型还有插件。 The Model Database Repository ¶ 模型数据库位于 here . clone命令如下： git clone https://github.com/osrf/gazebo_models 模型数据库结构 ¶ 每个数据库有 database.config 进行描述，数据库下的每个模型有 model.config 进行描述。一个只含有 model_1 的模型数据目录如下所示： Database database.config : Meta data about the database. This is now populated automatically from CMakeLists.txt model_1 : A directory for model_1 model.config : Meta-data about model_1 model.sdf : SDF description of the model model.sdf.erb : Ruby embedded SDF model description meshes : A directory for all COLLADA and STL files [可选]描述模型的所有COLLADA 和/或 STL文件 materials : A directory which should only contain the textures and scripts subdirectories textures : A directory for image files (jpg, png, etc). scripts : A directory for OGRE material scripts plugins : [可选]用于描述模型的所有插件 Material 目录 ¶ [可选]用于描述模型的所有 textures, images, and OGRE scripts for the model. Texture images 必须放在 the textures 子目录, OGRE script files 放到 scripts 子目录。 数据库配置文件 ¶ database.config 主要包括： - license 信息 - 数据库名称 - 以及所有模型的列表。 对于本地计算机的模型，不需要数据库配置文件。数据库配置文件的格式如下: <?xml version='1.0'?> <database> <name>name_of_this_database</name> <license>Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported</license> <models> <uri>file://model_directory</uri> </models> </database> < name > The name of the database. This is used by the GUI and other tools. < license > The license for the models within the database. We highly recommend the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported license. < models > A listing of all the model URIs within the database. < uri > The URI for a model, this should be file://model_directory_name 模型配置文件 ¶ 模型配置文件 model.config 位于模型的根目录，格式如下： <?xml version="1.0"?> <model> <name>My Model Name</name> <version>1.0</version> <sdf version='1.5'>model.sdf</sdf> <author> <name>My name</name> <email>name@email.address</email> </author> <description> A description of the model </description> </model> < name > required Name of the model. < version > required Version of this model. Note: This is not the version of sdf that the model uses. That information is kept in the model.sdf file. < sdf > required The name of a SDF or URDF file that describes this model. The version attribute indicates what SDF version the file uses, and is not required for URDFs. Multiple < sdf > elements may be used in order to support multiple SDF versions. < author > required < name > required Name of the model author. < email > required Email address of the author. < description > required Description of the model should include: What the model is (e.g., robot, table, cup) What the plugins do (functionality of the model) < depend > optional All the dependencies for this model. This is typically other models. < model > optional < uri > required URI of the model dependency. < version > required Version of the model. SDF模型文件 ¶ model.sdf 用于描述模型的Simulator Description Format ，这一格式的详细信息见 SDF website . Model SDF.ERB ¶ SDF模型文件可用由 Embedded Ruby code 来生成。 Standard SDF file which can contain ruby code embedded. This option is used to programatically generate SDF files using Embedded Ruby code templates. Please note that the ruby conversion should be done manually ( erb model.sdf.erb > model.sdf ) and the final model.sdf file must be uploaded together with the model.sdf.erb (this one only for reference). Examples of sdf.erb files are available in the gazebo_models repository (some of them use the deprecated suffix .rsdf ). An easy ERB file is the flocking.world.erb which uses a simple loop.
docs.title: Overview

docs.text: Creating the Virtual Two-Wheeled [[ROS]] Robot ¶ 书籍：hands-on ros for robotics progamming Chapter4_RViz_basics ## 编译过程中出现的问题 提示 CheckSymbolExists.c:(.text+0x1b): undefined reference to 'pthread_create 解决方案: 在CMakelists.txt里添加如下的语句即可： LINK_LIBRARIES(-pthread) 此外，编译完以后要执行 source devel/setup.bash ## 基本操作 git clone https://github.com/PacktPublishing/Hands-On-ROS-for-Robotics-Programming cp -R ~/Hands-On-ROS-for-Robotics-Programming/Chapter4_RViz_basics ~/CWorkspace/catkin_ws/src/ cd ~/CWorkspace/catkin_ws catkin_make source devel/setup.bash 然后就可以启动小车模型了： roslaunch rviz_basics gopigoMinimal_rviz.launch model:=gopigoMinimal 其中： - rviz_basics 为package名称，见 src/Chapter4_RViz_basics 里的 package.xml - gopigoMinimal 为URDF模型，在源文件目录下。 TIPS : 如果是在wsl下需要启动mobaxterm，并设置环境变量。 目录结构 ¶ 目录结构如下： mdeng1985@LAPTOP-HUFVUD3P:~/catkin_ws/src/Chapter4_RViz_basics$ tree . ├── CMakeLists.txt ├── README.md ├── launch │ ├── gopigoMinimal_rviz.launch │ └── gopigoMinimal_rviz_simple.launch ├── package.xml ├── rviz │ ├── default.rviz │ └── gopigoMinimal.rviz └── urdf └── gopigoMinimal.urdf 其中 package.xml 的内容如下： <?xml version="1.0"?> <package format= "2" > <name> rviz_basics </name> <version> 0.0.0 </version> <description> Code samples for "Chapter 3: Getting started with ROS" </description> <maintainer email= "brjapon@therobotacademy.com" > Bernardo R. Japon </maintainer> <buildtool_depend> catkin </buildtool_depend> <build_depend> rospy </build_depend> <build_export_depend> rospy </build_export_depend> <exec_depend> rospy </exec_depend> </package> gopigoMinimal.urdf 为小车模型，内容如下： <?xml version='1.0'?> <robot name= "gopigoMinimal" > <!-- Base Link --> <link name= "base_link" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> <material name= "blue" > <color rgba= "0 0.5 1 1" /> </material> </visual> <!-- Caster --> <visual name= "caster" > <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </visual> </link> <!-- Right Wheel --> <link name= "right_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" > <color rgba= "0.05 0.05 0.05 1" /> </material> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_right_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "right_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 -0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> <!-- Left Wheel --> <link name= "left_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" /> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_left_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "left_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> </robot> 具体解释参见[[2-URDF建模和SDF建模|URDF]]
docs.title: Creating the Virtual Two-Wheeled [[ROS]] Robot

docs.text: URDF建模和SDF建模 ¶ [toc] UDRF建模 ¶ 示例1 ¶ Hands-On ROS for Robotics Programming 的第4章 <?xml version='1.0'?> <robot name= "gopigoMinimal" > <!-- Base Link --> <link name= "base_link" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> <material name= "blue" > <color rgba= "0 0.5 1 1" /> </material> </visual> <!-- Caster --> <visual name= "caster" > <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </visual> </link> <!-- Right Wheel --> <link name= "right_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" > <color rgba= "0.05 0.05 0.05 1" /> </material> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_right_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "right_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 -0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> <!-- Left Wheel --> <link name= "left_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> <material name= "black" /> </visual> </link> <joint name= "joint_left_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "left_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 0.30 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> </robot> 最顶层的tag是 <robot> </robot> 每个部件用 <link name=""> </link> 区分 - link 下又可以分为若干个 <visual> </visual> 的小部件，这些小部件, visual 的一些常用tag origin : 描述visual坐标系相对于link坐标系的转换关系 geometry : visual部件的形状：比如sphere, box,cylinder material : visual部件的材质 <joint></joint> 用于连接不同的link 没有弄懂的 ： <origin xyz="0 0 0" rpy="1.570795 0 0" /> 旋转没有弄懂 简单实例 ¶ Building a Visual Robot Model with URDF from Scratch SDF建模 ¶ SDF（Simulation Description Format） 用于[[1-gazebo tutorial 1之roslaunch|gazebo]]的仿真。 在URDF建模的基础上，SDF有如下要素 - link 元素下有 <inertia> 元素 - link 元素下有 gazebo 元素用于将visual colors转换成gazebo格式，将STL文件翻译成DAE文件。而且 gazebo 标签下可以定义敏感器插件 - joint 元素下添加了 gazebo 标签用于指定摩擦、弹簧等特性，还可以添加驱动控制插件 更多资料参考 Using a URDF in Gazebo SDF模型的后缀是 gazebo SDF相关命令 ¶ roscd gazebo_basics/urdf gz sdf --print gopigo.gazebo #在终端显示模型内容 gz sdf --check gopigo.gazebo #检查模型是否完整 示例1 ¶ hands on ros 一书第5章的 gopigo.gazebo <?xml version='1.0'?> <robot name= "gopigo" > <!-- Base Link --> <link name= "base_link" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Base collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <box size= "0.5 0.5 0.25" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.13" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.21" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.13" /> </inertial> <!-- Caster --> <visual name= "caster" > <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Caster collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0.2 0 -0.125" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <geometry> <sphere radius= "0.05" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "0.5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.0001" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.0001" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.0001" /> </inertial> </link> <gazebo reference= "base_link" > <material> Gazebo/Blue </material> <pose> 0 0 3 0 0 0 </pose> </gazebo> <!-- Right Wheel --> <link name= "right_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Right Wheel collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "0.5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.01" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.005" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.005" /> </inertial> </link> <gazebo reference= "right_wheel" > <material> Gazebo/Black </material> </gazebo> <!-- Right Wheel joint --> <joint name= "joint_right_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "right_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 -0.30 0.025" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> <!-- Left Wheel --> <link name= "left_wheel" > <visual> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </visual> <!-- Left Wheel collision, mass and inertia --> <collision> <origin xyz= "0 0 0" rpy= "1.570795 0 0" /> <geometry> <cylinder length= "0.1" radius= "0.2" /> </geometry> </collision> <inertial> <mass value= "0.5" /> <inertia ixx= "0.01" ixy= "0.0" ixz= "0.0" iyy= "0.005" iyz= "0.0" izz= "0.005" /> </inertial> </link> <gazebo reference= "left_wheel" > <material> Gazebo/Black </material> </gazebo> <!-- Left Wheel joint --> <joint name= "joint_left_wheel" type= "continuous" > <parent link= "base_link" /> <child link= "left_wheel" /> <origin xyz= "0 0.30 0.025" rpy= "0 0 0" /> <axis xyz= "0 1 0" /> </joint> </robot> 其中 <gazebo reference= "base_link" > <material> Gazebo/Blue </material> <pose> 0 0 3 0 0 0 </pose> </gazebo> 给出了初始位姿

docs.text: Opencv学习与实践 ¶ [toc] TAGS_OPENCV_NOTES 标签 ¶ opencv ¶ 参考文献 ¶ 官方tutorial WSL下的安装 ¶ Installation in Linux 该网站还给出了一些可选设置，我没有去试。 其中测试的时候需要设置环境变量 set OPENCV_TEST_DATA_PATH environment variable to <path to opencv_extra/testdata>. execute tests from build directory. 我设置环境变量的方法为： sudo nano ~/.bashrc ,在末尾加上 export OPENCV_TEST_DATA_PATH = ~/CworkSpace/opencv/opencv-3.4.10/build/opencv_extra/testdata 然后 source ~/.bashrc 弄完以后确认下是否添加了环境变量 echo $OPENCV_TEST_DATA_PATH 如果不添加环境变量，则会有的3个地方失败 [ FAILED ] 3 tests, listed below: [ FAILED ] Core_InputOutput.filestorage_base64_basic_read_XML [ FAILED ] Core_InputOutput.filestorage_base64_basic_read_YAML [ FAILED ] Core_InputOutput.filestorage_base64_basic_read_JSON 其他环境变量: export OPENCV_TEST_DATA_PATH=~/CworkSpace/opencv/opencv-3.4.10/build/opencv_extra/testdata export OPENCV_SAMPLES_DATA_PATH=~/CworkSpace/opencv/opencv-3.4.10/samples/data 开发环境搭建 ¶ 创建opencv工作目录 ¶ 主要参考cmake工作目录创建方法， see TAGS_CMAKE_PRACTICE 创建一个的demo项目 mkdir opencv_ws mkdir src build bin lib cd src mkdir demo1 vscode wsl打开目录 opencv_ws 编辑的demo1的源文件 DisplayImage.cpp ，相应的 CMakeLists.txt 内容如下 cmake_minimum_required ( VERSION 2.8 ) project ( DisplayImage ) SET ( CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE "Debug" ) SET ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "$ENV{CXXFLAGS} -O0 -Wall -g2 -ggdb" ) SET ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "$ENV{CXXFLAGS} -O3 -Wall" ) find_package ( OpenCV REQUIRED ) SET ( EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /../../bin ) include_directories ( ${ OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIRS } ) add_executable ( DisplayImage DisplayImage.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( DisplayImage ${ OpenCV_LIBS } ) 把 lena.jpg 放到 opencv_ws/bin 目录下 bash下进行编译运行 cd build cmake ../src/demo1 make 这样在 opencv_ws/bin 下生存了可执行文件 DisplayImage 设置显示环境变量 开启MobtaXtem，查看display的ip，比如192.168.1.106:0.0 wsl远程终端bash下设置DISPLAY环境变量export DISPLAY=192.168.1.106:0.0 运行程序，bash下回到 opencv_ws 目录, 然后运行 ../bin/DisplayImage bin/lena.jpg 注意 ：执行程序时, lena.jpg 应为相对于bash的当前目录的路径，而不是相对于DisplayImage的路径，因此后面的 bin 不能少。 VSCODE-WSL调试环境搭建 ¶ 首先存储vscode workspace, 路径为 opencv_ws/opencv.code-workspace ,内容默认即可 { "folders" : [ { "path" : "." } ], "settings" : {} } ctrl+shift+p调出 c_cpp_properties.json ,内容为 { "configurations" : [ { "name" : "Linux" , "includePath" : [ "${workspaceFolder}/**" ], "defines" : [], "compilerPath" : "/usr/bin/gcc" , "cStandard" : "gnu11" , "cppStandard" : "gnu++14" , "intelliSenseMode" : "clang-x64" } ], "version" : 4 } 首先点击vscode左侧的debug按钮,然后点 create a launch.json (有两个选项一个是 opencv_ws 另外一个是 workspace ,我选的是workspace),内容如下: { // Use I ntell iSe nse t o lear n abou t possible a ttr ibu tes . // Hover t o view descrip t io ns o f exis t i n g a ttr ibu tes . // For more i nf orma t io n , visi t : h tt ps : //go.microso ft .com/ f wli n k/?li n kid= 830387 "version" : "0.2.0" , "configurations" : [ { "name" : "(gdb) Launch" , "type" : "cppdbg" , "request" : "launch" , "program" : "${workspaceFolder}/bin/DisplayImage" , "args" : [ "bin/lena.jpg" ], "stopAtEntry" : false , "cwd" : "${workspaceFolder}" , "environment" : [], "externalConsole" : false , "MIMode" : "gdb" , "setupCommands" : [ { "description" : "Enable pretty-printing for gdb" , "text" : "-enable-pretty-printing" , "ignoreFailures" : true } ] } ] } 注意 : program 为可执行文件路径, args 为传递的参数, bin/lena.jpg 即为 argv[1] 然后生成可执行文件, bash切换到 opencv_ws 目录下,调试即可. vs2019远程开发环境的搭建 ¶ 参考 see TAGS_CMAKE_PRACTICE 主要在 opencv_ws 目录下创建一个 CMakeLists.txt 文件用于vs2019打开用，内容如下： cmake_minimum_required ( VERSION 3.5.1 ) project ( cmake_ws ) add_subdirectory ( "src/demo1/src" )

docs.text: Installation in Linux 该网站还给出了一些可选设置，我没有去试。 其中测试的时候需要设置环境变量 set OPENCV_TEST_DATA_PATH environment variable to <path to opencv_extra/testdata>. execute tests from build directory. 我设置环境变量的方法为： sudo nano ~/.bashrc ,在末尾加上 export OPENCV_TEST_DATA_PATH = ~/CworkSpace/opencv/opencv-3.4.10/build/opencv_extra/testdata 然后 source ~/.bashrc 弄完以后确认下是否添加了环境变量 echo $OPENCV_TEST_DATA_PATH 如果不添加环境变量，则会有的3个地方失败 [ FAILED ] 3 tests, listed below: [ FAILED ] Core_InputOutput.filestorage_base64_basic_read_XML [ FAILED ] Core_InputOutput.filestorage_base64_basic_read_YAML [ FAILED ] Core_InputOutput.filestorage_base64_basic_read_JSON 其他环境变量: export OPENCV_TEST_DATA_PATH=~/CworkSpace/opencv/opencv-3.4.10/build/opencv_extra/testdata export OPENCV_SAMPLES_DATA_PATH=~/CworkSpace/opencv/opencv-3.4.10/samples/data

docs.text: 主要参考cmake工作目录创建方法， see TAGS_CMAKE_PRACTICE 创建一个的demo项目 mkdir opencv_ws mkdir src build bin lib cd src mkdir demo1 vscode wsl打开目录 opencv_ws 编辑的demo1的源文件 DisplayImage.cpp ，相应的 CMakeLists.txt 内容如下 cmake_minimum_required ( VERSION 2.8 ) project ( DisplayImage ) SET ( CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE "Debug" ) SET ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "$ENV{CXXFLAGS} -O0 -Wall -g2 -ggdb" ) SET ( CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "$ENV{CXXFLAGS} -O3 -Wall" ) find_package ( OpenCV REQUIRED ) SET ( EXECUTABLE_OUTPUT_PATH ${ PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR } /../../bin ) include_directories ( ${ OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIRS } ) add_executable ( DisplayImage DisplayImage.cpp ) target_link_libraries ( DisplayImage ${ OpenCV_LIBS } ) 把 lena.jpg 放到 opencv_ws/bin 目录下 bash下进行编译运行 cd build cmake ../src/demo1 make 这样在 opencv_ws/bin 下生存了可执行文件 DisplayImage 设置显示环境变量 开启MobtaXtem，查看display的ip，比如192.168.1.106:0.0 wsl远程终端bash下设置DISPLAY环境变量export DISPLAY=192.168.1.106:0.0 运行程序，bash下回到 opencv_ws 目录, 然后运行 ../bin/DisplayImage bin/lena.jpg 注意 ：执行程序时, lena.jpg 应为相对于bash的当前目录的路径，而不是相对于DisplayImage的路径，因此后面的 bin 不能少。

docs.text: 欧式变换及其在eigen中的实践 ¶ [toc] TAGS_ISOMETRY_EIGEN 标签 ¶ isometry , #eigen ¶ 预备知识： TAGS_EIGEN3_PRACTICE 关于欧式变换 ¶ \[ \newcommand \bm \mathbf \] $$ \begin{align} \bm{b} =\bm{R}_A^B\bm{a} + \bm{t}^B \end{align} $$ 其中： \(\bm{a}\) 为某一点在A坐标系下的坐标 \(\bm{b}\) 为某一点在B坐标系下的坐标 \(\bm{R}_A^B\) 为A坐标系到B坐标系下的姿态转换矩阵 \(\bm{t}^B\) 为B坐标系原点到A坐标系原点的矢量在B坐标系下的投影 上式的物理意义据说：A坐标系先旋转，然后平移 \(-\bm{t}_B\) 上式可以写成欧氏变换的矩阵形式 $$ \begin{align}\label{atob} \bm{b}=\bm{T}\bm{a} \end{align} $$ 其中 $$ \begin{align} \bm{T} = \left[\begin{array}{cc} \bm{R} A^B & \bm{t}^B \ \bm{0} & 1 \end{array} \right] \end{align} $$ 实践 ¶ 关于**视觉SLAM十四讲**里的例3.6.2中的几点说明 \(q_1\) 对应的是R1到W世界坐标系的姿态四元数 \(t_1\) 为R1坐标系原点到W世界坐标系原点的矢量在R1坐标系下的投影 关于EIGEN库的几点说明 Quaterniond q1(0.35, 0.2, 0.3, 0.1) 第一个数为标量，后3个为矢量 Eigen中的矩阵默认是列优先 假设q1为A到B的姿态四元数，则 q1.toRotationMatrix() 得到的B到A的姿态矩阵。 Eigen构建欧氏变换的方法 ¶ 比如得到W到R1的欧氏变换 首先给出R1到W的姿态四元数 \(q_1\) ，得到一个欧氏变换矩阵 Isometry3d T1w(q1)​ 然后平移即可 T1w.pretranslate(t1) 另外一种方法 ：就是直接利用旋转+平移去计算。 两种方法的代码如下：(路径 D:\Dropbox\mdeng\WORK\MyCode\linux_wsl\CODE\cmake_ws\src\slambook2\ch3\src 可以在vs2019下远程编译) #include <iostream> #include <vector> #include <algorithm> #include <Eigen/Core> #include <Eigen/Geometry> using namespace std ; using namespace Eigen ; int main ( int argc , char ** argv ){ // 坐标变换的例子 Vector3d t1 ( 0.3 , 0.1 , 0.1 ), t2 ( -0.1 , 0.5 , 0.3 ); Vector3d p1 ( 0.5 , 0 , 0.2 ); Quaterniond q1 ( 0.35 , 0.2 , 0.3 , 0.1 ), q2 ( -0.5 , 0.4 , -0.1 , 0.2 ); q1 . normalize (); q2 . normalize (); //方法1 Matrix3d Cr1tw = q1 . toRotationMatrix (). inverse (); Vector3d tmp3 = p1 - t1 ; Vector3d xw = Cr1tw * tmp3 ; Matrix3d Cwtr2 = q2 . toRotationMatrix (); Vector3d pR2 = Cwtr2 * ( xw ) + t2 ; cout << pR2 << endl ; //slambook2中的方法 Isometry3d T1w ( q1 ), T2w ( q2 ); T1w . pretranslate ( t1 ); T2w . pretranslate ( t2 ); Vector3d ptmp = T1w . inverse () * p1 ; Vector3d p2 = T2w * T1w . inverse () * p1 ; cout << p2 << endl ; }
docs.title: 欧式变换及其在eigen中的实践

docs.text: [toc] Linux常用命令 ¶ 标签 ¶ linux ¶ 用户切换 ¶ 普通用户切换到root | sudo su. 或者sudo -i root切换到用户ubuntu: su ubuntu 软件安装卸载、系统清理等 ¶ 更新软件源 ¶ 软件源的地址位于/etc/apt/sources.list，在修改地址以后可以采用 apt-get update对软件包列表进行 更新已安装软件 apt-get upgrade ¶ ### 安装一个新软件包 apt-get install packagename ### 卸载软件包 - apt-get remove packagename （保留配置文件） - apt-get --purge remove packagename （删除配置文件） - sudo apt-get autoremove sudo apt-get remove --auto-remove python # 卸载python3及其依赖,慎重使用，可能把其他的包(比如ros)也给卸载了 清理磁盘空间 ¶ 定期运行这个命令： apt-get autoclean 来清除那些已经卸载的软件包的.deb文件 参考资料 http://man.linuxde.net/apt-get 从 0 开始学习 Linux 系列之「01.安装 Linux 软件的 3 种方法」 系统相关 ¶ 查看系统版本 ¶ 查看ubuntu版本 sudo lsb_release -a 自动执行程序的命令cron ¶ 参考资料：Sense HAT data logger _ Raspberry Pi Projects Sense HAT data logger 目录创建 ¶ 创建多个目录 ： mkdir test1 test2 test3 切换目录 ¶ cd ~ 到home目录 打印串口数据 ¶ 打印串口数据 stty -F /dev/ttyS7 ispeed 115200 ospeed 115200 cs8 cat /dev/ttyS7 文件操作 ¶ 调出终端快捷键:ctrl+alt+t ¶ 寻找某个文件 ¶ find / -name "xorg.conf.d" 查看文件相关 ¶ 查看当前目录 pwd 查看当前目录下的文件文件夹 ls -lt 查看文件大小 ls -hl 查看所有文件 ls -a （可以显示隐藏文件，比如 .bashrc ) 查看帮助： man mkdir 查看mkdir命令的帮助 显示隐藏文件夹: ctrl+h 复制粘贴 ¶ cp ~/test . 将test拷贝到当前目录 文件编辑 ¶ nano命令 如果你要保存所做的修改，按下Ctrl+O。想要退出，按下Ctrl+X From https://www.cnblogs.com/haichuan3000/articles/2125943.html 对文件进行编辑 创建软链接 ¶ ln -s 源地址 目的地址 比如我把linux文件系统rootfs_dir软链接到/home/jyg/目录下 ln -s /opt/linux/rootfs_dir /home/jyg/rootfs_dir就可以了

docs.text: linux系统知识学习 ¶ 标签 ¶ linux ¶ 关于环境变量 ¶ source /etc/profile 用户环境变量通常被存储在下面的文件中： ~/.profile ~/.bash_profile 或者 ~./bash_login ~/.bashrc 系统环境变量一般保存在下面的文件中： /etc/environment # 有PATH环境变量的值 /etc/profile /etc/bash.bashrc 要使得 /etc/profile 里的环境变量立即生效，则 source /etc/profile 环境变量介绍见 EnvironmentVariables

docs.text: linux系统备份与恢复 ¶ raspberrry ¶ 具体操作 ¶ 参考资料 备份过程 ¶ 设置root账户密码： sudo passwd root 设置密码为hit1....1 切换到root账户： su 切换到根目录： cd / 进行备份 tar cvpzf backup20201017V1.tar.gz --warning=no-file-changed --exclude=/proc --exclude=/lost+found --exclude=/backup20201017V1.tar.gz --exclude=/backup.tar.gz --exclude=/mnt --exclude=/sys --exclude=/media --exclude=/mnt/nas2 --exclude=/mnt/nas --exclude=/var/tmp --exclude=/var/cache / > /dev/null 将备份的东西挪到挂载的nas网盘里，如何挂载见[[1-树莓派系统安装与基本配置#树莓派linux挂载NAS共享文件]]。假设挂载完以后的是 /mnt/nas2/，则 cd /mnt/nas2/raspberryPi_backup/ cp /backup2020...tar.gz . 然后回到 / 目录下删除掉备份文件就可以了。 rm -rf` 几点注意： 1. exclude 要和忽略到本次备份后得到的文件，也即 backup20201017V1.tar.gz 2. 会提示： tar: /run/systemd/inaccessible/sock: socket ignored tar: /run/udev/control: socket ignored tar: /var/snap/lxd/common/lxd/unix.socket: socket ignored Exiting with failure status due to previous errors 应该没事。 参考 恢复过程 ¶ 还未实践 su切换到根目录下。 恢复完成后别忘了创建那些exclude的目录 （可以先删除掉除了exclude目录以外的其他目录，然后解压缩，这样就不用创建了。） 注意： 1. 恢复是采用覆盖的形式，没有格式化过程。所以如果现有系统有，备份里没有的资料，覆盖完以后这些资料还在盘里。 树莓派备份版本记录 ¶ 20201016V1 ¶ 更改了软件源 安装了桌面环境 配置了无线网络 /etc/netplan/50-clound-init.yaml 2.安装了中文输入法fcitx backup20201017V1.tar.gz ¶ 在20201016V1的基础上 安装了retext (但是不是很好用，不支持中文、公式和高亮) 实现了自动登录 v11vnc安装，但是没有配置成功 tar cvpzf backup20201017V1.tar.gz --warning = no-file-changed --exclude = /proc --exclude = /lost+found --exclude = /backup20201017V1.tar.gz --exclude = /backup.tar.gz --exclude = /mnt --exclude = /sys --exclude = /media --exclude = /mnt/nas2 --exclude = /mnt/nas --exclude = /var/tmp --exclude = /var/cache / > /dev/null backup20201017V2.tar.gz ¶ 在 backup20201017V1.tar.gz 的基础上配置了x11vnc远程登录，可用。具体操作见 tar cvpzf backup20201017V2.tar.gz --warning = no-file-changed --exclude = /proc --exclude = /lost+found --exclude = /backup20201017V2.tar.gz --exclude = /backup.tar.gz --exclude = /mnt --exclude = /sys --exclude = /media --exclude = /mnt/nas2 --exclude = /mnt/nas --exclude = /var/tmp --exclude = /var/cache / > /dev/null backup20201023V1.tar.gz ¶ 在 backup20201017V2.tar.gz 的基础上安装了ros tar cvpzf backup20201023V1.tar.gz --warning = no-file-changed --exclude = /proc --exclude = /lost+found --exclude = /backup20201023V1.tar.gz --exclude = /backup.tar.gz --exclude = /mnt --exclude = /sys --exclude = /media --exclude = /mnt/nas2 --exclude = /mnt/nas --exclude = /var/tmp --exclude = /var/cache / > /dev/null

docs.text: linux挂载NAS网盘 ¶ 标签 ¶ nas #linux #raspberrry ¶ 前提需要将设置ubuntu用户权限设置成root一致，见上文。 方式一 (推荐) ¶ sudo mount -o username=admin,password=Hitxd1xxxxx6 //192.168.0.139/NAS /mnt/nas2 如果提示read-only则： apt-get install cifs-utils sudo mount -o username="admin",password="Hitxd1..密码6" //192.168.0.139/NAS /mnt/nas2 方式2 (不推荐) ¶ 没有方式1方便。因为只能切换成root账户才能编辑和访问。 NAS里的设置：选择文件夹：设置访问权限NFS主机访问，勾选访问权限，点加入按钮后填入允许访问的IP段（192.168.0.151），并指定读写权限，点击应用。 (no_root_squash: 有root的权限) raspberry pi里的步骤： sudo apt install nfs-common showmount -e 192.168.0.139 sudo mount -t nfs 192.168.0.139:/NAS /mnt/nas chmod go+w /mnt/nas 如果编辑文件则需要su 如果卸载则： umount /mnt/nas 注意：客户端需要是root账户才能编辑文件，也就是su 否则会出现permission denied的情况 关于nfs权限:现exports目录权限中，参数no_root_squash的其作用是：NFS客户端使用共享目录的用户，如果是root 的话，所有的操作均在服务器端映射为root用户，拥有共享目录的root权限！ 默认情况使用的是相反参数root_squash：在登入 NFS 主机export目录的使用者如果当root时，那么这个使用者的权限将被压缩成为匿名使用者，通常他的 UID 与 GID 都会变成 nobody 那个身份。 因为客户端是使用root登录的，自然权限被压缩为nobody了，难怪无法写入。 将配置信息改为： /mnt/cephfs 192.168.192.0/8(rw,no_root_squash) 据说有点不安全，但问题是解决了。 https://blog.csdn.net/fitnig/article/details/106522822 https://kangyucheng.blog.csdn.net/article/details/108280853?utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant_t0.none-task-blog-BlogCommendFromMachineLearnPai2-1.channel_param&depth_1-utm_source=distribute.pc_relevant_t0.none-task-blog-BlogCommendFromMachineLearnPai2-1.channel_param

docs.text: linux远程桌面连接 ¶ 标签 ¶ raspberrry #remote-control #vnc #linux ¶ xfc4+xrdp的方式 ¶ 安装xfc4轻量级桌面环境: sudo apt-get install xfce4 -y 安装xrdp（an open-source Remote Desktop Protocol server）： sudo apt-get install xrdp -y 启动xrdp： sudo service xrdp start 设置端口: sudo sed -i 's/port=3389/port=3390/g' /etc/xrdp/xrdp.ini 向.xsession中写入xfce4-session: sudo echo xfce4-session >~/.xsession 。如果显示permission deined,则直接 sudo vim /home/mdeng/.xsession 进入到 .xsession 文件里，把 xfce4-session 输入进去保存就可以了。 重启xrdp服务 sudo service xrdp restart 查看ip: ifconfig ： eth0对应的那个ip 远程登录: 172.20.9.229:3390 登录以后在apperance--setting里设置字体大小 参考资料： https://www.cnblogs.com/Jimc/p/10303951.html https://askubuntu.com/questions/993225/whats-the-easiest-way-to-run-gui-apps-on-windows-subsystem-for-linux-as-of-2018 x11vnc （推荐，适用树莓派） ¶ 首选需要确认下 /etc/net-plan 里的配置文件删除了wlan0的配置项，见[[1-树莓派系统安装与基本配置#上网设置]]。（不这么做好像也可以） sudo apt-get install lightdm (如果gdm则有问题) dpkg-reconfigure lightdm 配置成lightdm 首先安装x11vnc: $ sudo apt-get install x11vnc 设置登录密码，如果不设置密码，会导致任意人都可以登录 $ sudo x11vnc - storepasswd / etc / x11vnc . pass 我设置为h...1..1 设置端口 $ sudo x11vnc - auth guess - rfbauth / etc / x11vnc . pass - rfbport 5900 - forever - display : 0 '-rfbport' 参数指定监听端口，'-forever' 参数指定客户端断开后不要停止服务而是继续等待下一次的连接请求 '-rfbauth' 参数指定验证密码的存储文件 这时候如果提示找不到 display :0 ，这是因为树莓派连接显示器造成的。这需要安装一个虚拟显示器。 安装虚拟显示器并配置： sudo apt-get install xserver-xorg-core sudo apt-get install xserver-xorg-video-dummy sudo find / -name "xorg.conf.d" 返回路径为 /usr/share/X11/xorg.conf.d ，则编辑 cd /usr/share/X11/xorg.conf.d/xorg.conf ，内容如下： Section "Device" Identifier "Configured Video Device" Driver "dummy" EndSection Section "Monitor" Identifier "Configured Monitor" HorizSync 31.5-48.5 VertRefresh 50-70 EndSection Section "Screen" Identifier "Default Screen" Monitor "Configured Monitor" Device "Configured Video Device" DefaultDepth 24 SubSection "Display" Depth 24 Modes "1280x720" EndSubSection EndSection 重启即可。see: kali linux树莓派配置踩坑之旅③ x11vnc 真·窗口可视化 编辑服务文件 sudo nano /etc/systemd/system/x11vnc.service 内容如下 [Unit] Description=x11vnc (Remote access) After=network-online.target [Service] Type=simple ExecStart=/usr/bin/x11vnc -auth guess -rfbauth /etc/x11vnc.pass -rfbport 5900 -forever -display :0 ExecStop=/bin/kill -TERM $MAINPID ExecReload=/bin/kill -HUP $MAINPID KillMode=control-group Restart=on-failure [Install] WantedBy=graphical.target 9.启动服务 $ sudo systemctl daemon-reload $ sudo systemctl start x11vnc windows下下载tiny vncviewer，然后连接 192.168.0.152:5900 ，密码为我设置的 h...1 登录进去，测试下 roscore（终端1） rosrun rviz rviz （终端2） 下次开机后直接运行 sudo systemctl start x11vnc 即可。 如果是设置分辨率，vnc进去以后，用bash设置 xrandr --fb 1920x1080 如果要每次开机自动开启服务的话，设置如下 (测试不管用) 4：sudo x11vnc -storepasswd in /etc/x11vnc.pass 5：sudo cp ~/.vnc/passwd /etc/x11vnc.pass （认为你是非root的其它管理员） 6：sudo vim /etc/init/x11vnc.conf （如果没有这个文件则创建一个） 7：把以下代码复制到x11vnc.conf（这样你就不用每次都要去手动启用了） start on login-session-start script x11vnc -display :0 -auth /var/run/lightdm/root/:0 -forever -bg -o /var/log/x11vnc.log -rfbauth /etc/x11vnc.pass -rfbport 5900 end script 参考文献： ubuntu 16.04/18.04配置远程桌面访问 关于x11vnc在ubuntu14.04服务器版上开启远程桌面的使用(作为自己备忘) # ubuntu 18.04 默认使用gdm3，导致VNC工作异常，需要切换到 lightdm # ubuntu 16.04 默认使用 lightdm 因此一般不需要调整 $ sudo apt install lightdm ubuntu server 20.00自带的屏幕共享 ¶ 首选需要确认下 /etc/net-plan 里的配置文件删除了wlan0的配置项，见[[1-树莓派系统安装与基本配置#上网设置]]。 进入桌面环境-setting-share设置屏幕共享即可，默认的端口为5900 wsl下的图形显示 ¶ 注意有三种方式 - mobaxterm ^b3dd43 - xming - vcxsrv 20210401 更新:目前在wsl2下是采用mobaxterm的方法. 安装MobaXterm ¶ 该软件的好处是能够显示ros的rviz、小海龟，且能够开好几个终端 参考资料： Extra setup on WSL for ROS ROS 基础学习笔记1——Windows WSL安装ROS 首先下载MobaXterm, 并安装打开软件 点击settings，然后 Full X11 remote access Display offset: default is 0, you can also use 0 Disable extension RANDR: otherwise RViz cannot be launched due to some errors 双击WSL-ubuntu的终端，可以看到DISPLAY的IP和端口，如下 设置DISPLAY环境变量 export DISPLAY=192.168.1.105:0.0 echo $DISPLAY 确保环境变量设置正确。 运行 rosrun rviz rviz 看看能不能正常显示（前提是在wsl2上安装了ros） 如果显示ｇａｚｅｂｏ则需要设置GAZEBO_IP: 首先查看 gazebo --verbose Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 9 .0.0 Copyright ( C ) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation. Released under the Apache 2 License. http://gazebosim.org [ Msg ] Waiting for master. [ Msg ] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345 [ Msg ] Publicized address: 127 .0.0.1 Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 9 .0.0 Copyright ( C ) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation. Released under the Apache 2 License. http://gazebosim.org [ Msg ] Waiting for master. [ Msg ] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345 [ Msg ] Publicized address: 127 .0.0.1 如果Publicized address的IP和master的IP不一致,则需要设置GAZEBO_IP export GAZEBO_IP = 127 .0.0.1 LIBGL_ALWAYS_INDIRECT = 0 echo $GAZEBO_IP https://iamncj.github.io/2020/02/20/2020-02-20_ROS_WSL/ 总结 : bash export DISPLAY=192.168.1.105:0.0 export GAZEBO_IP=127.0.0.1 LIBGL_ALWAYS_INDIRECT=0 echo $GAZEBO_IP xming图形化显示 ¶ ^1d69bc 参考资料 Install Ubuntu on Win10.txt 首先设置在wsl下显示GUI windows下载并安装Xming from SourceForge.net 打开Xming看显示的server是啥，我的是0.0 wsl下安装xterm, sudo apt-get xterm 测试：DISPLAY=:0 gvim #check that opens a xming display window 如果是运行ros，则一个终端输入roslaunch, 另外一个终端输入 DISPLAY=:0 rosrun rviz rviz vcxsrv图形显示 ¶ ^dc0292 参考资料： https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DW7l9LHdK5c # How to run Gazebo + RVIZ on Windows 10 using WSL2 https://janbernloehr.de/2017/06/10/ros-windows 安装vcxsrv，参考资料 https://blog.csdn.net/u011138447/article/details/78262369 以常规模式运行 ¶ 以管理员模式启动xlaunch,设置如下： a large window 窗口数为0.0 navtive opengl不要选 bash下的操作： export GAZEBO_IP = 127 .0.0.1 export DISPLAY = $( cat /etc/resolv.conf | grep nameserver | awk '{print $2}' ) :0 export LIBGL_ALWAYS_INDIRECT = 0 # 这个很关键 export DISPLAY = 127 .0.0.1:0.0 TIPS : 其他类似的操作 ^b17cc1 bash下运行gazebo即可显示 ​ 如果要显示其他界面 显示软件界面，比如geany 安装gcc编辑器gean 然后在window的bash命令终端输入geany，即可在vcxsrv中显示编辑器 显示文件管理器nautilus，直接输入nautilus就行了。这个比较合适，在这里面也可以打开geany 以IP模式监听 ¶ 如果在输入ccsm的时候，提示错误 AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'get_default_screen' 的解决方案：（改成ip模式监听） 首先运行xlaunch的时候加上额外的参数 -ac （其他设置和上面的一样） 然后在bash下运行 export DISPLAY=$(cat /etc/resolv.conf | grep nameserver | awk '{print $2}'):0 然后继续运行ccsm和compiz 参考资料 HOWTO: Enable WSL2 and Convert Existing Pengwin Installations Windows使用Linux下编程的IDE Can't use X-Server in WSL 2 https://leibnizhu.gitlab.io/2016/07/16/Bash-on-Windows%E5%BC%80%E5%90%AFUbuntu-unity%E6%A1%8C%E9%9D%A2%E7%9A%84%E6%96%B9%E6%B3%95/ 目前没采用这种策略 https://www.jianshu.com/p/aca81f8c7f08 这篇文章对这些命令的含义进行了详细解释。比如echo $DISPLAY - xluanch启动后，右键hide root window不要选中。 其他 ¶ c. 其他参考资料: win10创建Ubuntu16.04子系统，安装常用软件以及图形界面（包括win10远程桌面连接Ubuntu） https://blog.csdn.net/li528405176/article/details/82263534%3e 设置好以后，每次要进入linux的图形界面的步骤如下： i. 打开xlaunch ii. 在Bash on Ubuntu on Windows界面下输入nautilus（显示文件管理器），直接输入nautilus就行了。这个比较合适，在这里面也可以打开geany 不推荐的几种方式 ¶ tightvncserver （不推荐使用） ¶ 树莓派安装 sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install tightvncserver vncserver :1 -geometry 1920x1080 -depth 24 会提示 New 'X' desktop is ubuntu:1 Starting applications specified in /home/ubuntu/.vnc/xstartup 并提示设置密码，我的密码为h..1...1 这时候windows下下载 tightvnc-2.8.27-gpl-setup-32bit , 连接 192.168.1.108:1 密码即可 其他问题 1. 不显示图标：将 /home/ubuntu/.vnc/xstartup 文件修改为 #!/bin/sh [ -r $HOME/.Xresources ] && xrdb $HOME/.Xresources xsetroot -solid grey xterm -geometry 80x24+10+10 -ls -title "$VNCDESKTOP Desktop" & startxfce4 & 2. 关闭vncservcer： vncserver -kill :1 参考文献： 1. https://blog.csdn.net/qq_33446100/article/details/104849614?utm_medium=distribute.pc_relevant.none-task-blog-baidujs-1 注意: tightvncserver 不支持opengl，所以不能显示 rosrun rviz rviz
docs.title: linux远程桌面连接

docs.text: 安装xfc4轻量级桌面环境: sudo apt-get install xfce4 -y 安装xrdp（an open-source Remote Desktop Protocol server）： sudo apt-get install xrdp -y 启动xrdp： sudo service xrdp start 设置端口: sudo sed -i 's/port=3389/port=3390/g' /etc/xrdp/xrdp.ini 向.xsession中写入xfce4-session: sudo echo xfce4-session >~/.xsession 。如果显示permission deined,则直接 sudo vim /home/mdeng/.xsession 进入到 .xsession 文件里，把 xfce4-session 输入进去保存就可以了。 重启xrdp服务 sudo service xrdp restart 查看ip: ifconfig ： eth0对应的那个ip 远程登录: 172.20.9.229:3390 登录以后在apperance--setting里设置字体大小 参考资料： https://www.cnblogs.com/Jimc/p/10303951.html https://askubuntu.com/questions/993225/whats-the-easiest-way-to-run-gui-apps-on-windows-subsystem-for-linux-as-of-2018
docs.title: xfc4+xrdp的方式

docs.text: 首选需要确认下 /etc/net-plan 里的配置文件删除了wlan0的配置项，见[[1-树莓派系统安装与基本配置#上网设置]]。（不这么做好像也可以） sudo apt-get install lightdm (如果gdm则有问题) dpkg-reconfigure lightdm 配置成lightdm 首先安装x11vnc: $ sudo apt-get install x11vnc 设置登录密码，如果不设置密码，会导致任意人都可以登录 $ sudo x11vnc - storepasswd / etc / x11vnc . pass 我设置为h...1..1 设置端口 $ sudo x11vnc - auth guess - rfbauth / etc / x11vnc . pass - rfbport 5900 - forever - display : 0 '-rfbport' 参数指定监听端口，'-forever' 参数指定客户端断开后不要停止服务而是继续等待下一次的连接请求 '-rfbauth' 参数指定验证密码的存储文件 这时候如果提示找不到 display :0 ，这是因为树莓派连接显示器造成的。这需要安装一个虚拟显示器。 安装虚拟显示器并配置： sudo apt-get install xserver-xorg-core sudo apt-get install xserver-xorg-video-dummy sudo find / -name "xorg.conf.d" 返回路径为 /usr/share/X11/xorg.conf.d ，则编辑 cd /usr/share/X11/xorg.conf.d/xorg.conf ，内容如下： Section "Device" Identifier "Configured Video Device" Driver "dummy" EndSection Section "Monitor" Identifier "Configured Monitor" HorizSync 31.5-48.5 VertRefresh 50-70 EndSection Section "Screen" Identifier "Default Screen" Monitor "Configured Monitor" Device "Configured Video Device" DefaultDepth 24 SubSection "Display" Depth 24 Modes "1280x720" EndSubSection EndSection 重启即可。see: kali linux树莓派配置踩坑之旅③ x11vnc 真·窗口可视化 编辑服务文件 sudo nano /etc/systemd/system/x11vnc.service 内容如下 [Unit] Description=x11vnc (Remote access) After=network-online.target [Service] Type=simple ExecStart=/usr/bin/x11vnc -auth guess -rfbauth /etc/x11vnc.pass -rfbport 5900 -forever -display :0 ExecStop=/bin/kill -TERM $MAINPID ExecReload=/bin/kill -HUP $MAINPID KillMode=control-group Restart=on-failure [Install] WantedBy=graphical.target 9.启动服务 $ sudo systemctl daemon-reload $ sudo systemctl start x11vnc windows下下载tiny vncviewer，然后连接 192.168.0.152:5900 ，密码为我设置的 h...1 登录进去，测试下 roscore（终端1） rosrun rviz rviz （终端2） 下次开机后直接运行 sudo systemctl start x11vnc 即可。 如果是设置分辨率，vnc进去以后，用bash设置 xrandr --fb 1920x1080 如果要每次开机自动开启服务的话，设置如下 (测试不管用) 4：sudo x11vnc -storepasswd in /etc/x11vnc.pass 5：sudo cp ~/.vnc/passwd /etc/x11vnc.pass （认为你是非root的其它管理员） 6：sudo vim /etc/init/x11vnc.conf （如果没有这个文件则创建一个） 7：把以下代码复制到x11vnc.conf（这样你就不用每次都要去手动启用了） start on login-session-start script x11vnc -display :0 -auth /var/run/lightdm/root/:0 -forever -bg -o /var/log/x11vnc.log -rfbauth /etc/x11vnc.pass -rfbport 5900 end script 参考文献： ubuntu 16.04/18.04配置远程桌面访问 关于x11vnc在ubuntu14.04服务器版上开启远程桌面的使用(作为自己备忘) # ubuntu 18.04 默认使用gdm3，导致VNC工作异常，需要切换到 lightdm # ubuntu 16.04 默认使用 lightdm 因此一般不需要调整 $ sudo apt install lightdm
docs.title: x11vnc （推荐，适用树莓派）
